82b1(mdo sde): nus pa/ bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag 'dis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lha dang mi'i 'byor bdag gis mchod pa bgyis pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
82b2(mdo sde): stsal pa/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen gru nga ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas
82b3(mdo sde): shing brtsegs pas na/ nga nyid kyis las byas shing bstsags pa 'di dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bstsags pa rnams ni/ 
82b4(mdo sde): phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dag
82b5(mdo sde): ba byas shing bstsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams
82b6(mdo sde): ni/ bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi ze// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
82b7(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med
82b8(mdo sde): pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang po ljongs
83a1(mdo sde): rgyu ning gshegs pa las/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhig tu byon te/ rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang
83a2(mdo sde): po ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor der byon to zhes thos so// thos nas kyang rgyal po'i 'i byor pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pas yang
83a3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig
83a4(mdo sde): tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po des yang dag pa ngar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang pos byang chub thob par
83a5(mdo sde): byed pa'i chos rnams yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go// de nas rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgya la po des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang
83a6(mdo sde): po nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la zla ba gsum gyi bar du na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams la spyan
83a7(mdo sde): drangs so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang pos kyang cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas rgyal rigs smra bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po des yang dag par rdzogs
83a8(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas gang pos cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ zla ba gsum gyi bar du na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / sun gsos dang / sman mo// 
83b1(mdo sde): rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs kyang rin po che las byas so// sangs rgyas kyi dga' ston byas nas/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dad pa chen po
83b2(mdo sde): skyes te/ rgyu de dang rkyen dri de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/ ngas yang dag par
83b3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang po la de lta bu'i mchod pa byas pa des na/ ngas 'khor ba na bde ba mtha' yas pa nyam su myong ste/ de nyid kyi rgyus da ltar de bzhin gshegs par gyur pa na yang
83b4(mdo sde): nga la tshong dpon dang / brgya byin gyis 'di lta bu'i mchod pa bya/ sa so// dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ston pa la bkur bsti bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mo bya'o// 
83b5(mdo sde): mchod pa bya'o// ston pa la bkur bstir byas/ bla mar byas/ mo byas/ mchod pa byas nas/ brten te gnas par bya'o// zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan
83b6(mdo sde): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// gang po la sogs pa rtogs pa rjod pa las sdom gyi tshigs
83b7(mdo sde): su bcad pa gnyis pa rdzogs so// / sdom ni tsan dan dang ni pad+ma dang // de bzhin 'khor lo mgo bcu pa// mdog 'jam dang ni 'od bsil dang // mnyan pa dang ni spos dang
83b8(mdo sde): ldang / dri med gdangs snyan zhes bya ba// snga tshan dag tu bstan pa yin// tsan dan zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams
84a1(mdo sde): rnams dang / drug po rnams dang / pho blang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / chang dpan rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rdungs dang / klu rnams dang / gnod
84a2(mdo sde): sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bstibs/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchid pa byas te/ 
84a3(mdo sde): dog klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen
84a4(mdo sde): po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / nal zas dang / gzims chad dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams rnyed pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ yul ma glan
84a5(mdo sde): ljongs rgyu zhing gshag pa wag d+hI klung gi 'bram du byon to/ de'i tshig b+hI k+Sha/ dag 'gram nA phrag mi ring ba zhig na mchod rten zhig ral du gyur/ pa/ rlung dang nyi tshan gyis bshig pa zhig 'dug pa de dag
84a6(mdo sde): dge slong rnams kyis mthod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das mchod rten 'di su'i lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang sangs rgyas can
84a7(mdo sde): dan zhes bya ba zhig byung ste de'i yin no// dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas tsan dan ga las byung lags/ ming ni ci las btags lags bcom
84a8(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed rang sangs rgyas tsan dan ga las byung ba dang / ming ci las btags pa nyan par 'dod dam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa nyan par
84b1(mdo sde): 'tshal lags so// bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer bA ra na sI na/ 
84b2(mdo sde): rgyal po tshangs byin zhig rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba
84b3(mdo sde): dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrugs dang / chom rkun dang / mu ga dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sa lu dang / bu ramra shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug go// 
84b4(mdo sde): rgyal po de yang chos can chos drang ldan pa'i rgyal po/ chos bzhin du rgyal po byed do// de bu med nas bu 'dod/ de/ gu lang dang / chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / brgya byin dang / 
84b5(mdo sde): tshangs pa la sogs pa dang / lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs te// 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang / nag tshal gyi lha dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lho dang / 
84b6(mdo sde): sum gdo'i lha dang / gtor ma len pa'i lha dang / lhan cig smras pa'i lha dang / chos 'thun pa dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs so// 'jig rten na yang
84b7(mdo sde): gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi/ de yang de lta na ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba gtab pa'i rgyas bu dang bu mo
84b8(mdo sde): skyes par 'gyur du zin na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du ra ro la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so// ya ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo sku
85a1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa ste/ gnas
85a2(mdo sde): 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro// de yang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug la de'i bskyed mos tshal gyi rdzing chen po zhig yod pa de'i nang nas kyang
85a3(mdo sde): pad+ma tshad las 'das par che ba zhig skyes te/ de nyid ni cig bzhin du cher skra la/ kha cig ni mi 'bye ba zhig yod do// de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs mas rgyal po la gsol to// 
85a4(mdo sde): de nas rgyal pos kyang pad+ma de legs par srungs shig ce/ sa bsgre'o// phyis re shig na nyi ma 'chor kar pad+ma de kha nas/ pad+ma de'i snying po la khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta
85a5(mdo sde): na sdug la mdzes pa mdog bzang ba gser gyi kha dog tsa na mgo bos gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ lag pa ring ba/ 'phral ba'i dbyes che ba/ sna mtho ba/ sA legs
85a6(mdo sde): pa/ smin ma stug pa/ lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis lus legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa zhig skyil mo krung
85a7(mdo sde): bcas shing 'dug ste/ de'i kha nas ni pad+ma'i dri 'byung la/ lus las ni tsan dan gyi dri'i byung ngo // de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs mas kyang rgyal po la gsol te// de nas
85a8(mdo sde): rgyal po blon po dang / btsun mo dang bcas pa/ bskyed mos tshal du dong nas// khye'u des mthong ma thag tu rgyal po la smras pa/ yab tshur gshegs bdag ni khyod sras mi mnga' ba'i sras
85b1(mdo sde): lags so// de nas rgyal po dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs nas/ smras pa/ bu de ni khyod ji skad zer ba bzhin no// de nas rgyal po rdzing gi nang du zhugs nas/ pad+ma'i snying po/ las khye'u byung
85b2(mdo sde): te/ lag par gzhag go// de nas khye'u des gang dang gang du rkang pa banag pa de dang der pad+ma dag byung ngo // de nas de'i ming tsan dan zhes btags so// gang gi tshe khye'u can dan
85b3(mdo sde): khad kyis char skyes pa de'i tshe/ grong khyer gyi mi rnams kyis rgyal po la gsol pa/ lha bdag cag gi grong khyer 'dir dus ston byung na/ lha sras tsan dan btang ba'i rigs so// 'on tang
85b4(mdo sde): bdag cag dang lhan cig tu dus ston myong bar 'gyur la/ ga nas thams cad kyang pad+mas brgyan par 'gyur lags so// rgyal pos smras pa da ltar ba'o// de nas tsan dan rgyan thams
85b5(mdo sde): cad kyis brgyan pa/ blon po'i bu rnams kyi g.yog 'a khor dang bcas pa/ rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs byed cing / grong khyer gyi dus ston myong bar bya ba'i phyir/ rgyal
85b6(mdo sde): po'i pho brang nas phyi rol tu byung ngo // de nas de der 'gro ba na gom pa re re la pad+ma ltan sdug cing yid 'phrog pa dag byung ste/ de dag nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis phog ma thag tu rnyes shing ska mo// 
85b7(mdo sde): de nas sems can dag pa/ bsam pa dag ga sngon sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba skad sked pa des de mthong nas/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa skyes te/ ji ltar pad+ma 'di dag skyes pa'i mod/ 
85b8(mdo sde): la ni mdzes pas 'dug la/ nyi ma'i 'od gzar gyis gdungs pas ni rnyes shing skam par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ lus 'di yang de dang 'dra'o snyam mo// de de ltar sems
86a1(mdo sde): shing 'jal la nye bar rtog pa na/ byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon du gyur te/ des skye bo'i tshogs kyi nang na 'dug bzhin du rang sangs rgyas
86a2(mdo sde): kyi byang chub mngon sum du byas so// de nas re shig na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis de la gos tshon can dag phul te/ de dag bgos nas na mkha' la 'phags te/ cho
86a3(mdo sde): 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas/ de mthong bas rgyal po dang / blon po dang / grong rdal gyi mi rnams dang bcas par dga' ba chen po thob ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyang
86a4(mdo sde): bskyed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rang sangs rgyas tsan dan ni de las byung ste/ ming yang de las btags so// dge slong rnams kyis
86a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rang sangs rgyas tsan dan gyis las gang dag bgyis shig/ bstsags na des de'i lus kyang dri gda' la dbang po yang
86a6(mdo sde): rno bar gyur lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des der dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la spos chu'i dbang
86a7(mdo sde): bskur ba yang phul me tog dag kyang btags te/ der rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi lam yang bsgoms so// dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ston pa la bkur
86a8(mdo sde): bsti bya'o// mar bya'o//  mo bya'o/ chod phyo'o// ston pa la bkur bsti byas// bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas nas brtan te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par
86b1(mdo sde): bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 
86b2(mdo sde): pad+ma zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded
86b3(mdo sde): dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas// bla
86b4(mdo sde): mar byas/ rI mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / granod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding drang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod
86b5(mdo sde): cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nam/ sa chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / ga/ zims cha dang / gdan dang / sun gsos dang / sman zong
86b6(mdo sde): rnams rnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcwa pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyul bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zos sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe yul dbus
86b7(mdo sde): na 'khod pa rnams kyi lags kyis na/ kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma rnams kyis pad+ma dag blangs te/ srang du song zhing 'tshong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ 
86b8(mdo sde): lhung bzed bsnams nas/ mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs so// bud med zhig kyang khye'u zhig pang na thogs te/ srang du song ba las khye'u des sangs rgyas bcom
87a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis
87a2(mdo sde): brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun+da nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dga' ba skyes te/ glo tor tu lag pa brkyang nas/ 
87a3(mdo sde): kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma las pad+ma blangs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la bor ro// de nas pad+ma de shing rta'i phang lo tsam du gyur te/ stang gi na mkha' la 'dug nas/ 
87a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gshegs na ni 'gro la/ bzhes na ni sdod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ba'i 'od zer dag bkye nas/ des mnyan du
87a5(mdo sde): yod pa ril gyis snang bar byas so// rgyu des na rgyal po dang / blon po dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams drad parabyas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa
87a6(mdo sde): mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / 
87a7(mdo sde): dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig na steng du 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sas can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / 
87a8(mdo sde): bdud 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud
87b1(mdo sde): zer dang / a tsu zer dang / ud pa ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur/ 
87b2(mdo sde): te 'bab bo// grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo// de nas sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to// de
87b3(mdo sde): nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kyo ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du smras sam snyam mo// de nas de dag drang po bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'dra/ 
87b4(mdo sde): sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis stsal pa mtho dang nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di na/ sa kyang shi 'phos por ma gyur la/ gzhan du yang ma
87b5(mdo sde): skye sa mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sa mas can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo// de nas de dag sprul
87b6(mdo sde): po la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myeng bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba dang nying
87b7(mdo sde): mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro// steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan
87b8(mdo sde): rnams dang / 'phral dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i 'dun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po// 
88a1(mdo sde): rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin
88a2(mdo sde): med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og
88a3(mdo sde): min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so// tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de// nges par
88a4(mdo sde): 'byung ba brtsam par gyis// sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyi das// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin// 'tshe bdag snga ni gzhom par gyis// gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ 
88a5(mdo sde): bag yod spyod par byed pa ni// skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur// zhes brjod pa ra byed do// de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi
88a6(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste// gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhad na ni/ bcom ldan 'das
88a7(mdo sde): kyi sam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ong ba'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun log su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi
88a8(mdo sde): mthil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro// dud 'gror ska bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro// yi dgas su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni// zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang
88b1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// mir skye bar lung stong par band na ni/ pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i
88b2(mdo sde): mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ 
88b3(mdo sde): lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhad na ni/ smin
88b4(mdo sde): mtshams kyi mdzod pur mi snang bar 'gyur ro// bla na med/ pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa dAr bzhad na naM/ dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar
88b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod pur mi snang bar gyur to// / 
88b6(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshen sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can// mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur// de yis
88b7(mdo sde): phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis// nyi mo shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin// yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi// 
88b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa// rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par// pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston// brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis
89a1(mdo sde): dus bab mkhyen lags na// dge slong rgyal dang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams// thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang // bzang po dag gis the tsom
89a2(mdo sde): skyes pa bstsal bar gsol// rgya mtsho dang nar rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams sbyin 'da' 'dzum mi ston// gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa skyon ma
89a3(mdo sde): po// de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa
89a4(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam/ des ni rgyu med rgyun med par 'dzum mi mi mdzad do// ngan dga' bo khye'u 'di dang pa skyes pas/ de bzhin gsheg
89a5(mdo sde): pa lnga pad+ma 'thor ba mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lag so// kun dga' bo khye'u 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong
89a6(mdo sde): ba 'dis/ bskal pa bco lnga'i bar du log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/ lha dang mi'i bde ba nyams su myong nas/ rang sangs rgyas pad+ma'i bla ma zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ de'i spyan
89a7(mdo sde): par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga lA sems dpa' bar gyur pa 'di yin no// dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos
89a8(mdo sde): rnams la bkur bsti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan
89b1(mdo sde): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'khor zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams
89b2(mdo sde): dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / 
89b3(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding rnams dang / ma 'am ca rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ blo mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas
89b4(mdo sde): tenalha dang / klu dang / gnod sprin dang / lha ma yi/ da na dang / nam mkha' lding dong / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas
89b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza 'a dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang // sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dag
89b6(mdo sde): 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lana? da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab nas dad dpen+da zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs nas/ de'i chung ma
89b7(mdo sde): ljang tshwa la bab de khyim thub la gdung zhing yongasu yi tshad la/ smre sngags 'don kyang / de'i khyim thab ma 'ongs nas des sred med kyi bu la phyag 'tshal te/ dam bcas pa gal te dadag/ 
89b8(mdo sde): gi khyim thab myur du 'ongs na bdag gis khyod la gsar gyi 'khor lo dbul lo zhes bya'o// de nas de'i khyim thab rgya mtsho'i nang nas myur du phyir 'khor te/ nye zho med par bde bar 'ong // 
90a1(mdo sde): de nas des gser gyi 'khor le byed du gtsug ste/ de 'bran po'i tshigs kyis bskor bas/ 'khor lo dang / spos dang / gdug pa dang / me tog khyer te lha khang du chas
90a2(mdo sde): so// de'i skabasu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa 'am/ mi gzigs pa 'am/ mi rtogs pa 'am/ thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom
90a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhus pa/ srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' gazla med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung gzhi gnas dang
90a4(mdo sde): lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang bar mdzadra pa/ bslab pa gsum la lags par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las rgal
90a5(mdo sde): ba rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu ba rten pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po na 'dri sa par byas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ 
90a6(mdo sde): khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu/ 
90a7(mdo sde): phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyis/ 
90a8(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par
90b1(mdo sde): du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum/ mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni rgud/ su ni dang / su ni phongs shing 'dug/ 
90b2(mdo sde): su ni nyam nga bar gyur/ su ni gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni phongs pa dang nyams nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol// su ni ngan song du 'angag su ni ngan song du gsu ni nges ngan song nas
90b3(mdo sde): phyung ste/ mtho ris dang / thar pa dang / 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las
90b4(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du/ gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bsre dad pa las bskrad par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed/ 
90b5(mdo sde): zin pa las yongasu smin par bya/ su ni yongasu smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes rga/ zigs pa 'jug go// 'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin
90b6(mdo sde): rnams kyi gnas/ dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang sred// gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la// sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bu mo res nga mthong
90b7(mdo sde): naHrang byang chub kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro snyam du gzig so// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ dge slong
90b8(mdo sde): gi tshogs kyi zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/ rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms la gsheg so// de nas bu mo des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes
91a1(mdo sde): bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mang
91a2(mdo sde): ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong // de nas mthong ba'i maud la dga' ba thob ste/ bcom ldan 'das la gser gyi 'khor lo dor bar byas so// de nas bran mos bkag ste/ 'di
91a3(mdo sde): sred med kyi bu ma yin zhes byas so// 'on kyang de bkag bzhin du dad pa drag pos yid 'dun par gyur nas// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du gsar gyi 'khor lo bor ro// smos
91a4(mdo sde): dang / gdug pa dang / me tog kyang phul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i
91a5(mdo sde): chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / sar po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni stang du 'gro'o// 'og tu
91a6(mdo sde): 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bdud 'jom dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang // 
91a7(mdo sde): chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kye hud zer dang / a tsu zer dang / ud pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song na/ 
91a8(mdo sde): tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te bab bo// grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo// de nas sems can de dag gi/ 
91b1(mdo sde): gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to// de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo// de nas de dag dad pa
91b2(mdo sde): bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas shi 'phos par ma gyur la/ gzhan
91b3(mdo sde): du yong ma skyos mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung pa'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/ bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo// de nas de
91b4(mdo sde): dag sprul po la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de za du de/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi
91b5(mdo sde): snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro// steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnam
91b6(mdo sde): dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang
91b7(mdo sde): tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang
91b8(mdo sde): sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams
92a1(mdo sde): / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrog so// tshigasu bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod
92a2(mdo sde): par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis// sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis// gang zhig chos 'dul
92a3(mdo sde): 'di nyid la// bag yod sprod par byed pa ni// skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs naso// sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur// zhes brjod par byed do// de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum/ 
92a4(mdo sde): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te btsom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzha
92a5(mdo sde): na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snum logasu mi snang bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i l-is lung ston par bzhad na ni// mdun log su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal
92a6(mdo sde): bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro// dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhad na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro// yi dgas
92a7(mdo sde): su skyo bar lung ston par bzhad ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro// mir skye bar lung ston par bzhad na ni/ pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// stobs kyi 'khor los
92a8(mdo sde): sbyar ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhad na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang por 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i
92b1(mdo sde): mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni// lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni// zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// rang
92b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod pur mi snang bar 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na nI/ 
92b3(mdo sde): dbu'i gtsug tor du mi sdang bar 'gyuraro// de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod pur mi snang
92b4(mdo sde): bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gi sa spel ba sna tshogs can// mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar
92b5(mdo sde): gyur/ de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis// nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin// yang tshogs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes
92b6(mdo sde): spangs pa yi// sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa// rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par// pad+ma'i rtse dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston// brtan pos nyid kyi blo yI/ 
92b7(mdo sde): dus bab mkhyen lags na/ dge slong rgyal dang nyan thos som nyi 'tshal ba rnams// thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / bzang po bdag gi the tsom skyes pa bsum par gson
92b8(mdo sde): rgya mtsho dang ni nga rgyal lta bur bstan pa yi// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin 'da' 'dzum mi ston// gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa// de ni khyod las skye bo
93a1(mdo sde): phal chen nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
93a2(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do// kun dga' bo bu mo 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la gser gyi 'khor lo bor ba
93a3(mdo sde): mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// kun dga' bo bu mo 'di dgra ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal pa bco
93a4(mdo sde): lnga'i bar du logs par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/ lha dang mI'i bde ba nyams su myong nas/ rang sangs rgya sa 'khor lo bla ma zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ de'i sbyin par
93a5(mdo sde): bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems dga' bar gyur pa 'di/ yin no// dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslu/ ba par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 
93a6(mdo sde): nyan thos rnams la bkur bsti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ 
93a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // mgo bcu pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po
93a8(mdo sde): rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams
93b1(mdo sde): dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / 
93b2(mdo sde): klu dang / gnod sprin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen
93b3(mdo sde): po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ yul ma d+hA na ldong
93b4(mdo sde): rgyu zhing gshegs pa las gang+gA'i klung gi 'gram du byon to// // de nas dge slong rnams kyis thig ring po zhin nA ma dachod rten rnying pa rlung dang nyi tshan gyis shig pa zhig 'dug
93b5(mdo sde): pa de mthong ngo // mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa mchod rten 'di su'i lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang sangs rgyas mag
93b6(mdo sde): bcu pa'i yin no// dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pa ga las byung lags// ming ni ci las btags lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
93b7(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pa ga las byung ba dang / ming ci las btags pa nyan par 'dod dam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lags
93b8(mdo sde): so// bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer bA ra na si na/ 
94a1(mdo sde): rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang
94a2(mdo sde): ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sa lu dang / bu ram shing dang / 
94a3(mdo sde): ba lang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug go/ rgyal po de yang chos can chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po zhig te/ chos bzhin du rgyal po byed do// de nas rgyal po de bu med
94a4(mdo sde): med nas bu 'dod de/ gu lang dang / chu lang dang / ku be dar dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa dang / lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'de ba/ 
94a5(mdo sde): te/ 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang / nags tshal gyi lha dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang / sum mdo'i lha dang / gtor ma len pa'i lha dang / lhan cig skyes pa dang / 
94a6(mdo sde): chos 'thun pa dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs so// 'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus/ bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i/ 
94a7(mdo sde): gtam de yod mod kyi/ de yang de lta ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na ni/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong
94a8(mdo sde): stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rig so// ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ pha ma gnyi sa 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang
94b1(mdo sde): ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa ste/ gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro// de yang gsol ba 'debs pa lhung byed cing 'dug
94b2(mdo sde): la/ de'i skyed mos tshal gyi rdzing chen po ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos gang ba/ 'grom dang pa dang / ngur pa dang / zil mo la sogs pa bya sna tshogs
94b3(mdo sde): kyis mdzes par byas pa zhig yod pa de'i nang nas kyang pad+ma tshad las 'das par che ba zhig glo tor du skyes te/ de nyid cig bzhin du cher skye la/ kha ni mi 'bye ba zhig yod do// de na?
94b4(mdo sde): kun dga' ra ba'i srangs mas rgyal po la gsol to// de nas rgyal pos kyang pad+ma de legs par srungs shig ce/ das bsgo'o// phyis re shig na nyi ma 'char kar pad+ma de kha bya
94b5(mdo sde): nas/ pad+ma de'i snying po la khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ mdog bzang ba/ gser gyi kha dog can/ mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ lag
94b6(mdo sde): pa ring ba/ 'phral ba'i dbyes che ba/ sna mtho ba/ sna legs pa/ smin ma stug pa/ lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad
94b7(mdo sde): bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa zhig skyil mo krung btsas shing 'dug ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i srungs mas kyang rgyal po la gsol to// de nas rgyal pos thos nas/ 
94b8(mdo sde): blon po dang / btsun po dang bcas pa bskyed mos tshal du dong ste/ pad+ma'i snying po la de lta bur mdzes shing 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dga' zhing mgul rang
95a1(mdo sde): // bya dgar ste/ yi rangs nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ rdzing gi nang du zhugs nas khye'u bras te bkur bsti chen po dang ldan pas rang gi pho brang du khyer nas/ 
95a2(mdo sde): dge sbyong dang bram ze dang / mtshan mkhan dag la bsnyad de/ zhag bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig gri bar du bcas ston rgyas par byas nas/ mgo bcu pa zhes ming btags so// 
95a3(mdo sde): nas khye'u mgo bcu pa pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang // nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la btang
95a4(mdo sde): nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar/ dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying ku dang / gzhan ya dang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ 
95a5(mdo sde): mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur te/ khye'u de yang dad pa dang ldan la/ bsam pa bzang zhi dge ba bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhug
95a6(mdo sde): pa/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ skye dgu la byams pa zhig ste/ des yab rgyal sa na 'dug pa na/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba'i las dag
95a7(mdo sde): byed pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang khye'u de mi dga' nas ya bo lnga gsol pa/ yab bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba lnga rab tu 'byung bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ 
95a8(mdo sde): zhes byas so// yab kyis kyang gnang ste/ de skra dang kha spu brags nas/ gos tshon can bgos te/ yang dag pa'i dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // de nas dra
95b1(mdo sde): lung mnon pa med par byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon du gyur te/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon/ 
95b2(mdo sde): sum du byas nas/ nam mkha' la 'phags te yab la cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to// de nas yab kyis zla ba gsum gyi bar du bshos la spyan drang so// de nas de'i lus
95b3(mdo sde): thogs pas yongs su skyo nas cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan te/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du mya ngan las 'das par song ste/ de'i mchod rten 'di yin no// de nas dag
95b4(mdo sde): slong rnams the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa / btsun pa rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pas las gang dag
95b5(mdo sde): bgyis na/ ma'i mngal du skyes te/ pad+ma las skyes lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ dge slong dag mgo bcu pa nyid sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu chog
95b6(mdo sde): rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ mgo bcu pa nyid kyis lus byas shing bsags pa
95b7(mdo sde): de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / 
95b8(mdo sde): me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye
96a1(mdo sde): / mched rnams 'da' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gis las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud miza// tshogs shing dus la dab pa na// 'bras bu
96a2(mdo sde): nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'dis pa'i dus ni bskul pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
96a3(mdo sde): rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
96a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa 'asang / ngas rgyas rnam par gzigs de/ rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen
96a5(mdo sde): ldan zhes bya ba na rten cing bzhugs so// de nas yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs su dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed
96a6(mdo sde): bsnams nas/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan du bsod snyoms la gshegs so// dad
96a7(mdo sde): dpon zhig kyang pad+ma khyer te srang du bzhugs so// de nas des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
96a8(mdo sde): kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi mo stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin
96b1(mdo sde): po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu pad+ma de bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du bor te/ bor ma thag tu pad+ma de bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du shing rta'i
96b2(mdo sde): pang lo tsam du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs na ni 'gro la/ gnas na ni sdod do// de nas re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis
96b3(mdo sde): ded dpon de rang byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas rang gyi khyim du song ba dang / de'i skabs su de'i chung ma bu btsa' zhing 'dug ste/ skad
96b4(mdo sde): ngan mthon nas/ des bran mo la de ci zhig ces dris so// dris kyang de bzhin du bsnyad do// de nas ded dpon de mi draga' bar gyur nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag nams kyang
96b5(mdo sde): 'khor ba na mi'i mngal du skye bar ma gyur cig byas so// / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slo/ nga dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na ded dpon du
96b6(mdo sde): gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pa de yin te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig go bar du nams kyang ma'i mngal du ma skyes la/ srid pa tha/ 
96b7(mdo sde): ma lA yang de'i 'byor pa de 'dra bar gyur to// dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams la bkur bsti bya'o zhes dge slong
96b8(mdo sde): khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstodado// / 
97a1(mdo sde): mdog 'jam zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po dang / phyug po rnams dang / bro brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / 
97a2(mdo sde): tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnam
97a3(mdo sde): dang rdo lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byos te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / 
97a4(mdo sde): 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes dpa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / 
97a5(mdo sde): gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zo nga rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcu sa pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim/ 
97a6(mdo sde): bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ tshong dpon byug tsang nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ nor dang yo byad mang po/ bdag dang / 
97a7(mdo sde): mang ba/ mdza' bo dang / blon po dang nye du dang / rgan rabs mang ba zhig yod de/ khyim bdag de yang drad pa dang ldan pa/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba// bdag la
97a8(mdo sde): phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa zhig go// de nas 'di snyam du sems te/ longs spyod 'di dag ni chu zla lta bu'i rang bzhin
97b1(mdo sde): can smig rgyu dang 'dra ba/ mi rtag pa/ mi brtan pa/ ther zug pa ma yin pa/ yid brtan du mi rung ba 'gyur ba'i chos can/ gnod pa chen po lnga dang thun mong du 'dug pa yin gyis
97b2(mdo sde): bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus gsol la/ zhal zas bzang pos tshim par bya gor ma chag snyam mo// 
97b3(mdo sde): nas des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khrus gsol pa dang / gdugs tshod gsol bar spyan drangs so// de nas de la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ 
97b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa8/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis nam ring byas te/ da gro slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'dun du bdar nas cho gro dang ldan
97b5(mdo sde): pa'i khrus la gshegs so// de nas tshong dpon de til ma/ ra spos can khyer te bsro gang du song nas/ bad/ ga nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
97b6(mdo sde): dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur byas so// de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khrus gsol zin pa de'i tshe/ khyim bdag des bcom ldan 'das
97b7(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la rang gi lag nas/ bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang pos tshim par byas te/ ci bzhed pa bstabs so// rang gi lag nas bza' ba
97b8(mdo sde): dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po rnam grangs du mas tshim par byas te/ ci bzhed pa pa babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te/ gsar sder ni gyu/ phyag ni
98a1(mdo sde): bcabs par rig nas/ stan ches dpa' ba zhig khyer te chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ rjes kyi sbyin sngar 'dug nas del brnaMs kyi chos kyi gtam gyi sa dag pa bstan/ yang dag par
98a2(mdo sde): 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do// chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag
98a3(mdo sde): par gzangs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas tshong dpon de dad pa rnyed nas sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad ba bzhin du/ bcom
98a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhangs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ sa sa la rtas par byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'dangs kyi 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom
98a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid do/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmang po dang / dkar po rnams
98a6(mdo sde): byung na/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o//  cig ni steng du 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bdud 'jom dang / ngu 'bod dang / 
98a7(mdo sde): ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu che ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / 
98a8(mdo sde): a cu zer dang / ud pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag
98b1(mdo sde): tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo// grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo// de nas sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar
98b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skas sam snyam mo// de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom
98b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/ gzhan du yang ma skyes
98b4(mdo sde): mod kyi 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/ bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnam sa rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo// de nas de dag sprul pa la
98b5(mdo sde): sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmya la ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi sno da du rung
98b6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro// steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / 
98b7(mdo sde): dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams
98b8(mdo sde): dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang // 
99a1(mdo sde): bsod nams skyes rnam dang 'dras du che rnam dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar
99a2(mdo sde): du song nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so// tshogs su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis
99a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis// gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la// bag yod spyod par byed pa ni// 
99a4(mdo sde): skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spongs nas// sdug bsngal zad par/ byed par 'gyur zhes brjod par byed do// de na/ nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
99a5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi ba zhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'dra
99a6(mdo sde): kyi snam logasu mi snang bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logasu mi snang bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed
99a7(mdo sde): na ni/ zhabs kyi thil du mi snang bar 'gyu ro// dur 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhad na ni/ zhabs kyi steng par mi snang bar 'gyur ro// yi dgas su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs
99a8(mdo sde): kyi mthe bor ma sdang bar 'gyur// mar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyisu me sang bar 'gyur ro// stobs kyi 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag
99b1(mdo sde): g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed
99b2(mdo sde): na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston por bzhed na ni/ smin mtsham/ 
99b3(mdo sde): kyi mdzod pur mi snang bar 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhad na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'od zer de
99b4(mdo sde): ngag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas ratra/ bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzedad pur mi snang bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
99b5(mdo sde): bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis sbal ba sna tshogs can// mang / po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur// de yis phyogs rnams kun
99b6(mdo sde): tu snang bar bgyis// nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin// yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyugs dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi// sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi
99b7(mdo sde): dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa// rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par// pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston// brtan po nyid kyis blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na// dag
99b8(mdo sde): slong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams// thub pa khyu mchog gini gsung mchog brtan pa dang // bzang po dag gi the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol// rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal
100a1(mdo sde): lta bur brtan pa yin/ mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyi nad 'dzum mi ston// gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa// de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen
100a2(mdo sde): nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
100a3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do// kun dga' bo tshong dpon 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur bsti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags
100a4(mdo sde): so// kun dga' bo tshong dpon 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / se mas bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ rang sangs rgyas mdog 'jam zhes
100a5(mdo sde): bya bar 'gyuraro// de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la/ sams dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no// dge slong // dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / 
100a6(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas dang / nyon thos rnams la bkur bsti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ 
100a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'od bsil zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po
100a8(mdo sde): rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin
100b1(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa
100b2(mdo sde): byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sprin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas
100b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ 
100b4(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcwa pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshul khyim bdag mgon med zas sprin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan
100b5(mdo sde): du yod pa na/ khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyo da che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rna mi thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang
100b6(mdo sde): 'gran pa zhig yod de/ de yang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang la bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod
100b7(mdo sde): bA/ skye dgu la byams pa zhig go/ de nas 'di snyam du sems te/ longs spyod 'di dag ni chu zla lta bu'i rang bzhin can/ glang po che'i rna ba ltar g.yo ba/ brtan pa/ ther zug pa ma
100b8(mdo sde): yin po/ yid brtan du mi rung ba/ 'gyur ba'i chos can/ gnod pa chen po lnga dang thun mong du 'dug pa yin gyis/ bdag gis longs spyod snying po med pa las snying
101a1(mdo sde): po blang bar bya gor ma chags snyam mo// des sos ka'i dus la bab pa na/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdugs chod la spyan drangs nas
101a2(mdo sde): khyim yang rdo dang gseg ma dang / gyo mo med par byas te/ tsan dan gyi chus na tshig chag btab/ spos sna tshogs kyi snod ni dkram/ dri zhim po'i bdug pas ni bdugs ma
101a3(mdo sde): tog sna tshogs kyis ni gtor/ me tog gi gdan rnams ni bshams so// de nas khu ba bsil ba'i btung ba rnams dang / khur ba dang / bshos rnams sta gon byas nas/ 
101a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'phrin gyis gdugs tshed bskul ba/ btsun pa gdugs tshod la bab ste/ bshos lags dan/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgod
101a5(mdo sde): te/ gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to// de nas/ bcom ldan 'das snga dro shamA thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ dge slong
101a6(mdo sde): gri tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar nas/ khyim bdag de'i khyim gra lnga ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun
101a7(mdo sde): gyi gung la gdan bsham pa la bzhugs so// de nas khyim bdag des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ rang gi log
101a8(mdo sde): nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang ma bzang pos tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs so// rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po rnam
101b1(mdo sde): grangs du mas tshim par byas te/ ci bzhed pa bstabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te/ gsang sngar ni gyu/ phyag ni bcabs par rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig khyer te/ 
101b2(mdo sde): chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug
101b3(mdo sde): yang dag par gzong bstod/ yang dag por dga' bar mdzad do// chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par dga'
101b4(mdo sde): bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas khyi dam bdag de dad pa rnyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi na dbas la phyag 'tshal te/ sems la rtas par byas so// 
101b5(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi 'dzum par mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas
101b6(mdo sde): 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag
101b7(mdo sde): ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bdud 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / che ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa
101b8(mdo sde): dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a tsu zer dang / ud pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang
102a1(mdo sde): pad+ma lta gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo// grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de
102a2(mdo sde): dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo// des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur te/ de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas
102a3(mdo sde): shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo// de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong
102a4(mdo sde): nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di na sa kyang shi 'phos por ma gyur la/ gzhan du ya nga ma skyes mod kyi 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can
102a5(mdo sde): snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rna/ mas rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo// de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ 
102a6(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur pa'i las de zad da/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par gyur to// 
102a7(mdo sde): steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang
102a8(mdo sde): 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 
102b1(mdo sde): 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / 
102b2(mdo sde): bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha
102b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi bar du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so// tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung
102b4(mdo sde): ba brtsams par gyis// sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyi nas// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis// gang zhig chos 'dul 'dra/ 
102b5(mdo sde): nyid la// bag yod spyod par byed pa ni// skye bo'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal zad par byed pa ra 'gyur// zhes rjod par byed do// de nas 'od zer de dag gi/ 
102b6(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par
102b7(mdo sde): bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// sems can
102b8(mdo sde): dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni// zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro// dur skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro// yi dgas su skye
103a1(mdo sde): bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro// mir skye bar+Na lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// stobs kyi
103a2(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhad na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas
103a3(mdo sde): pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur
103a4(mdo sde): ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ smin 'tshams kyi mdzod pur mi snang bar la/ gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang // 
103a5(mdo sde): chub tu lung ston par bzhod na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'od zer de dag gas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ 
103a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna sdong gis
103a7(mdo sde): spel ba sna tshogs can// mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur// de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis// nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin// yang tshigs
103a8(mdo sde): su bcad de gsol pa// rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi// sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa// rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen
103b1(mdo sde): ma mchis par// pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston// brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lag na/ dge slong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams// thub pa khyu
103b2(mdo sde): mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang // bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol// rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas
103b3(mdo sde): rnams gyin du 'dzum mi ston/ gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
103b4(mdo sde): kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dogra bcom pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu med
103b5(mdo sde): rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do// kun dga' bo khyim bdag 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur bsti byas/ pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// kun
103b6(mdo sde): dga' bo khyim bdag 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ rang sangs rgyas 'od bsal zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// 
103b7(mdo sde): de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems dad par byos pa 'di yin no// dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 
103b8(mdo sde): nyan thos rnams la bkur bsti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ 
104a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po
104a2(mdo sde): chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams
104a3(mdo sde): dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / 
104a4(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding da dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
104a5(mdo sde): bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / sun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos
104a6(mdo sde): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ yul ma g+ha na ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las gang+gA'i klung gyi 'gram du byon to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas/ 
104a7(mdo sde): te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar nas/ mnyan pa rnams ga la ba dang gshegs te byon nas/ mnyan pa rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye chu klung 'di
104a8(mdo sde): las nga sgrol cig/ mnyan pa rnams kyis gsol pa/ gru btsas stsol cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan pa de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nga yang
104b1(mdo sde): sngon mnyan pa byed byed de/ ngas dga' bo ni 'dod chags kyi chu klung du lhung ba las bsgral/ sor 'brang ni zhe sdang gi rgya mtshor lhung ba las bsgral// bram ze'i bu nga rgyal gyis
104b2(mdo sde): khengs pa ni/ nga rgyal gyi mtshor lhung ba las bskal/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ni gti mug gi rgya mtshor lhung ba las bskal te/ 'on kyang ngas gru btsas ma blangs so// de skad
104b3(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal kyang bsgral bar khas ma blangs so// de nas mnyan pa zhig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa yang thos// gzugs phun sum chogs
104b4(mdo sde): pa de yang mthong nas dad pa skyes te/ bdag gis bco ma ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ bsgral bar 'tshal lo zhes gsol to// de nas dge
104b5(mdo sde): slong rnams grub zhugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ rdzu 'phral gyi mnyan pa de bas kyang ches sngar pha ro// la gyi 'gram du zhugs par gyur to// de nas mnyan
104b6(mdo sde): pa des rdzu 'phrul de mthong nas/ sems dga' bar gyur te zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par
104b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ mnyan pa des de thos nas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ya shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
104b8(mdo sde): 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so// des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi mo'i rgya mtsho
105a1(mdo sde): bskams pa dang / rus pa'i ri la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo thams cad bcad pa dang / mtho risa? dang / thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang
105a2(mdo sde): mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang
105a3(mdo sde): gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshon rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so// yang gsol pa/ nyes pa
105a4(mdo sde): mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin tu mi bzad khyod kyis mthu yis bcas// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba bya// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang
105a5(mdo sde): bdag gis thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs/ pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal// 
105a6(mdo sde): 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba las// 
105a7(mdo sde): thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de'i nang nas mnyan pa cig cig 'gyod pa chen po skos nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te nyes pa bshags
105a8(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
105b1(mdo sde): 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og
105b2(mdo sde): tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bdud 'jom dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod
105b3(mdo sde): chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a cu zer dang / ud pa la
105b4(mdo sde): ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltaradags pa chen por song nas/ che ba'i sems canadamyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab
105b5(mdo sde): bo/ grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo// des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to// 
105b6(mdo sde): de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag ni 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo// de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das
105b7(mdo sde): sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag na 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/ gzhan du yang ma
105b8(mdo sde): skye sa mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i se mas can snang ba 'di'i mthus/ bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to// snyam mo// de nas de dag sprul
106a1(mdo sde): / pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung
106a2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro// steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab brel rnams
106a3(mdo sde): dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'dron pa rnams dang / 
106a4(mdo sde): tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang // tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dag chung rnams dang // tshad med dag rnams dang // 
106a5(mdo sde): dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang
106a6(mdo sde): rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdagra med pa'i sgra sgrogs so// 
106a7(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis// sangs rgyas bsten la sbyor bar gyis// 'dam bu'i khyim la gleng chen bzhin
106a8(mdo sde): 'chi bdag snga ni gzhom par gyis// gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la// bag yod spyod par byed pa ni// skye bo'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal zad
106b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur zhes rjod par byed do// de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong gyi po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te
106b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni// 
106b3(mdo sde): mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par
106b4(mdo sde): bzhud na ni/ zhabs kyi snying par mi snang bar 'gyur ro// yi da gso su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe de ri mi snang bar 'gyur ro// mir skye bar lung sten par bzhed
106b5(mdo sde): nani/ pus mo gnyis mi snang bar 'gyur ro// stobs kyi 'khro/ ra los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor
106b6(mdo sde): los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par band na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthi la du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhad na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro// nyan
106b7(mdo sde): thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhad na ni/ zhal du mi sdang bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par band na ni/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur/ 
106b8(mdo sde): ro/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhad na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das
107a1(mdo sde): lalan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod pur mi sdang bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ 
107a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ non+da stong gis spel pa sna tshogs can// mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur// de yis phyogs rnams kun tu sdang bar bgyis// nyi ma shar bas ji ltar
107a3(mdo sde): bgyis pa bzhin// yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi// sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa// rgyal ba dgra thub
107a4(mdo sde): rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par// pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta dbu'i 'dzum mi ston// brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus dbab mkhyen lags na// dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa
107a5(mdo sde): som nyi 'tshal ba rnams// thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung ma cho ga brtan pa dang // bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol// rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur
107a6(mdo sde): brtan pa yi// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston// gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa// de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal// bcom
107a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
107a8(mdo sde): rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do// kun dga' bo mnyan pa 'dis nga la sems dga' ba bskyed pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// kun dga' bo mnyan
107b1(mdo sde): pa 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa/ sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rang sangs rgyas 'khor ba rgal ces bya bar 'gyur ro// de'i sprin
107b2(mdo sde): par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems dad par byas pa 'di yin no// dge sbyong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos
107b3(mdo sde): rnams la bkur bsti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'dra/ 
107b4(mdo sde): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // / spos kyi ngad ldang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyu bco ldan 'a/ des la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams
107b5(mdo sde): dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnam
107b6(mdo sde): dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang // nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ 
107b7(mdo sde): mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / kA dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i
107b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nam sa chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhab zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ 
108a1(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe yul dbus na 'khod pa'i yul mi rnams kyi
108a2(mdo sde): lugs kyis na/ phal chen byug pa sna tshogs kyis lus bskrad par byed do// de nas re zhig na khyim bdag gi bu zhig yod pa de'i bran mo dad pa dang ldan pa la/ dag zhing bsam pa
108a3(mdo sde): bzang ba zhig yod pa de tsan dan dmar po 'drar zhing 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyang snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ dge slong
108a4(mdo sde): gi tshogs kyi zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi das mdun du dadar nas/ rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms la gshegs so// de nas bu mo des sangs rgyas
108a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das skra skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bza nga po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gri
108a6(mdo sde): brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pos lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bu mo de dad pa chen po smos so// de nas de dang pa rnyed
108a7(mdo sde): nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis 'di lta bu'i zhing rnyed kyang dbul ba'i nyes pas/ bcom ldan 'das la bkur bsti byed mi nus na/ bdag gis 'tshe ba'i 'di 'dra ba ci dgos
108a8(mdo sde): snyam mo// de nas des rang gi srog la yang ma bltas te/ lag pa gnyi ga tsan dan dmar pos byug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la bskus so// bcom ldan 'dra
108b1(mdo sde): kyis zhabs gnyis la kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer ril gyis tsan dan gyi dris gang bar mdzad do// de nas bu mo des cho 'phrul de mthong nas/ sems dga' bar gyur te// 
108b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ sems la rtas par byas te/ bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ 
108b3(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi
108b4(mdo sde): tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhil nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dedakar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o// / 
108b5(mdo sde): kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de/ dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / ga nag dang / bdud 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / 
108b6(mdo sde): ngu 'bodod chen po dang / che ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / saM thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ud pa la
108b7(mdo sde): ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo// grang ba'i sam/ 
108b8(mdo sde): can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo// des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyod par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to// de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems
109a1(mdo sde): te/ kye ci bdag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo// de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad
109a2(mdo sde): do// de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag na 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/ gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sem
109a3(mdo sde): can snang ba 'di'i mthus/ bdag cag gis gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo// de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon por dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can
109a4(mdo sde): dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang min dmas kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro// / 
109a5(mdo sde): steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul
109a6(mdo sde): dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams
109a7(mdo sde): tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dag rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes
