165a2(mdo sde): bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA ra na si na/ drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so// de nas grong khyer bA ra nA si de na/ khyim bdag
165a3(mdo sde): cig gi chung ma ser sA can 'jungs po/ yo byad rnams kun tu 'dzin pa/ khA la yang gtor ma mi ster na/ slong ba gzhan dag la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa zhig/ 
165a4(mdo sde): yod de/ de dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sdog ci rang phongs pa dang / bkren pa dag mthong na sems kyis sdang bar byed do// re shig nu bsod snyoms
165a5(mdo sde): pa zhig de'i khyim du 'ongs nas/ des de mtho/ nga nas ser snga skyes te/ sems kyang sdang b.ragyur nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag
165a6(mdo sde): gis 'di la bkur bsti byas na ni/ 'di phyis kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas sdig can des tshe phyi mI'i mi sdug pa khyad du bsad nas/ dge slong de nang du bos
165a7(mdo sde): te sgo bcad nas smang du bcug go// mang du yang smos te/ dge slong khyod la bkur bsti me yin pa byas po 'di yi ni gyis/ phyin chad khyim 'dir ma 'ongs shig/ 
165a8(mdo sde): ces byas so// de nas de ser sna kun tu bstan cing bsgoms te// mang du byos pa dri yi dag su skyes te/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong ngo // mo'u dag la
165b1(mdo sde): gyi bu de bas na ci nas yi dgas mo de'i nyes pa gang yin pa de lta bu dag mi 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir ser sna spong ba la brtson par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
165b2(mdo sde): stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'i lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto'i phye chen po gzhan dag kyang yid rangs te/ 
165b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bskyod do// // chu zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po rnams dang / phyug
165b4(mdo sde): po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshe/ dang dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rna mas dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / 
165b5(mdo sde): lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod
165b6(mdo sde): pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang // lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas
165b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ 
165b8(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na brten cing bzhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen/ 
166a1(mdo sde): po yi dgas kyi nang du rgyu zhing song ba dang / yi dgas mo sdong dum me reg 'dra la rang gi skas yog pa/ lto ni ri rab tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam sa/ 
166a2(mdo sde): 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me tse gcig tu 'bar nas/ tshig cing nyams theg pa'i skad 'byin la/ skom gyis gdungs te sdug bsngal
166a3(mdo sde): drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tshwa ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ba dang / des mthong ba tsam gyis chu klung dang / khron pa rnams skam par 'gyur ba dang / 
166a4(mdo sde): gang gi tshe char 'bab pa de'i tshe/ de'i steng du ma stag 'phro ba'i mngag ma'i char 'bab pa zhig ma thong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi
166a5(mdo sde): bu chen pos de la smras pa/ kye khyod kyi sdig pa ci// zhig byas nas/ des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal ba myong zhing 'dug/ yi dgas mos smras pa/ btsun pa
166a6(mdo sde): mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po bdag ni sdig pa byad byed pa yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la de ni 'di zhus shig dang / de khyod la bdag gis las kyi rnam par
166a7(mdo sde): ston par 'gyur te/ de thos na sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa'i las slong bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das ga/ 
166a8(mdo sde): la ba der song ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las banongs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog
166b1(mdo sde): ston te/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma yang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan no cog nyan par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por
166b2(mdo sde): gsung ba snyan par gsung ba tshur shog/ 'ongs pa legs so zhes gsung ba sngar 'dzum pa yin te/ dar bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la
166b3(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mo'u dgal gyi bu tshur shog/ khyod 'ongs pa legs sre khyod da gzod ga las 'ongs/ mo'u dgal gyi bus gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag ni
166b4(mdo sde): yi dgas kyi nang du rgyu zhing mtsho mchi ba las slar/ mchis te/ de bdag gis yi dgas mo sdong po/ dme reg mA 'dra la rang gi skas yog pa/ lte ni re tsam la
166b5(mdo sde): kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu 'bru ra nas tshig cing nyam zag pa'i skad 'byin la/ skom gyi
166b6(mdo sde): gsungs te/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / che ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ba dang / des mthong ba tsam gyis chu klung dang / khron pa rnams skam par 'gyur ba/ 
166b7(mdo sde): dang / gang gi tshe tshar 'bab pa de'i steng du ma stag 'phro ba'i mdag ma'i char 'bab pa zhig mthong lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu yi dgas mo de ni
166b8(mdo sde): sdig pa byed byed pa yin no// de'i las kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lag so// mo'u dgal gyi bu 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang dra/ 
167a1(mdo sde): bshad// mo'u dgal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skra dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
167a2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ 
167a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung // de grong khyer bA ra na sau na drang srong smra ba ri dgos kyi nag sa na rten cing bzhugs pa na/ der dge slong zhig lam
167a4(mdo sde): du zhugs nas de skom gyis gdungs te/ khron pa'i drung du song nus/ da na bu mo zhig bum pa chus bkang ste 'dug pa ngal dge slong des smras pa/ che zhe bdag ni skom gyis gdungs/ 
167a5(mdo sde): kyis/ chu byin cig ces byas na/ yo byad la kun tu 'dzin/ pa de ser sA skyes nas/ dge slong de la smras pa/ dag/ slong bdag gi bum pa 'grib su 'ong gis gal te khyod shi
167a6(mdo sde): na yang chu ma sbyin no zhes byaso// de nas dge slong de skom gyis gdungs bzhin du ro thag chad nas song ngo // de nas bu mo de ser sna kun tu sten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa de lta bus shi
167a7(mdo sde): nas yi dag suM skyes te/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yi du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong zhing 'dug go// mo'u dgal gyi bu de bas na 'di ltar bslab par
167a8(mdo sde): bya ste/ ser sna spang bar bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya'o zhes mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang
167b1(mdo sde): ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gzhan dag kyang yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
167b2(mdo sde): pa la mngon par bstod do// // phyi sa'i gnod ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po
167b3(mdo sde): rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin
167b4(mdo sde): rnams dang / num mkha' lding rnams dang / mi dam ci rnams dang // lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mi byas/ 
167b5(mdo sde): mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang nga / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi la ma ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shwe ba'i
167b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang // sman zong rnams rnyed pa/ nyan thos kyi
167b7(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgul gyi bu chen po sta gro ba sham thabs
167b8(mdo sde): dang chos gos bgos nas lhung bzed thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la song nas/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms byas te/ zan zos nas zas phyis
168a1(mdo sde): / len pa spangs te/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag nas/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'jigs te/ nyin
168a2(mdo sde): par gnas pa'i phyir/ shing zhig gi drung du rten cing 'du go// de na tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos yi dgras mo sdong dum ma reg ma 'dra la/ gcer bur 'dug cing rang gi
168a3(mdo sde): skas yog pa/ l-I ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu 'bar nas/ tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin la/ 
168a4(mdo sde): sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tsher ba myong ba phyi sa bzhin dud dri nga zhing mchog tu dri nga ba za la de yang bde blag du mi
168a5(mdo sde): rnyed pa zhig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po mi dga' bar gyur nus yi dwags mo la dris pa/ khyod kyi sngon sdig pa ci
168a6(mdo sde): zhog byas na des 'di lta bu'i 'bras bu myong zhing 'dug/ yi dwags mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po bdag ni sdig pa byed byed pa yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
168a7(mdo sde): 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang / de khyod la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa lung ston par 'gyur te/ de tho nas sems can gzhan dge kyang sdig pa'i las spong bar 'gyur ro// de nas/ 
168a8(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang
168b1(mdo sde): bu'i sbrad rtsi ma bskol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston te/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma yang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan ne cog nyan par
168b2(mdo sde): byed do// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ga snyan par gsung ba/ tshur shog 'ongs pa leg so zhes gsung ba sngar 'dzum pa yin te/ der bcom
168b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// me'u dgal gyi bu tshur shog/ khyod 'ongs pa leg so// khyod da bzod ga las 'ongs/ mo'u dgal gyi
168b4(mdo sde): bus gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag ni yi dgas kyis nang du rgyu zhing mchis mchi ba las der bdag gis yi dgas mo sdom dum me reg ma 'dra la cer bur mchis shing
168b5(mdo sde): rang gi skas yog pa/ lho ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mi ga tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu ra ba tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu 'bar nas/ tshig cing nyam/ 
168b6(mdo sde): thag pa'i skad 'byin la/ sdug bsngal drag pa/ mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yi du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ba dang / des mthong ba tsam gyis chu klung dang / khron pa rnams skam
168b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang / gang gi tshe cher 'bab pa de'i tshe de'i steng du me stag 'phro ba'i bdag ma'i char 'bab pa dang / phyi sa bzhin dri nga zhing mchog tu dri nga ba/ zas su phyis za ba 'tshal la// 
168b8(mdo sde): de yang bde blag du mi rnyed pa zhig mthong lag so// yang gsol pa/ nyam thag skad kyang 'byin par byed// sdug bsngal tsher ba nyam su myong // gang na phyi sa'i gnas yod pa// deng ni sdug
169a1(mdo sde): bzhin rgyug par bgyid// phyi sa bza' 'am btung snyam na// de yang bde blag rnyed ma 'gyur// de yis mi yi 'jig rten du// sdig pa rab 'jigs ci bgyis na// des na sdig pa
169a2(mdo sde): 'di 'dra ba// 'jig su rung ba nyam su myong // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal kyi bu yi dgas mo de ni sdig pa byed byed pa yin no// de'i las kyi rna pany+dzi par 'dod dam/ btsun pa nyan
169a3(mdo sde): par 'tshal lag so// mo'u dgal gyi bu 'o na legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do// mo'u dgal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus ni/ grong khyer bA ra na si
169a4(mdo sde): na rang sangs rgyas sdug cing phongs pa la snying brtse ba/ bras mtha'i gnas mal gyis 'tsho ba zhig yod la/ de yang nad pu can zhig ste/ bA ra na sir bsod snyoms
169a5(mdo sde): la song ngo // re shig na de la sman pas 'thun pa'i zas/ bstan nas/ de tshong dpon zhig ga la 'dug pa da re song ba dang / dad dpon des kyang mthong nas
169a6(mdo sde): dris pa/ 'phags pa khyod ni bzhed/ des smras pa/ 'thun pa'i khe zas 'dod do// de nas tshong dpon des 'phags pa la kha zas 'thun pa phul cig mna' ma la bsgo'o// 
169a7(mdo sde): de nas de'i mna' ma ser sna skyes te// gal te badrag gis ded 'di la kha zas byin du zin na/ sang yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ phyogs gcig tu song ste
169a8(mdo sde): lhung bzang phyi sas bkang ni so/ steng 'bras can gyis bkab ste/ rang sangs rgyas de la phul lo// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni ma dgongs kyi bar du
169b1(mdo sde): shes pa'i mthong ba mi 'jug ste/ des blangs so// blangs nas tshor te/ 'di dring ba la sa na 'dis phyi sas bkang gor ma chug go snyam mo// de nas bdag nyid chen po des de
169b2(mdo sde): gzhig tu bor nas song ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshong dpon gyi mna' mar gyur pa/ 
169b3(mdo sde): gang yin pa de ni yi dgas mo 'di yin te/ des sdig pa'i las de lta bu byas nas/ de phyin chad rtag tu sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags rnams
169b4(mdo sde): su skyes ste/ rtag tu zas su phyis zalnga gyur to// mo'u dgal gyi bu de bas na sor sna spang ba la brtso na par bya ste/ tsa nas yi dgas mo de'i nyes pa
169b5(mdo sde): de lta bu dag 'ong bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar me'u dgal gyi bu khyod kyis bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe
169b6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha'i lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yid rangs ste/ 
169b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // mo'u dgal gyi bu zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bac+doMs la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / 
169b8(mdo sde): phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / dad dpon rnams dang / lha rnams rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod
170a1(mdo sde): sprin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar
170a2(mdo sde): byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod
170a3(mdo sde): cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan po/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman
170a4(mdo sde): zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bca/ sa pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka la na da ka gnas pan rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe
170a5(mdo sde): rgyal po'i khab kyi ni pha rol/ 'od ma'i tshul gyi ni tshu ra la de'i bar skabs na/ yi rigs sdong dum me reg ma 'dra la/ gcer bur 'dug cing rang gi skas
170a6(mdo sde): yog pa/ lto ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar ste/ me lce gcig tu 'bar nas/ tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad
170a7(mdo sde): 'byin la/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyamasu myong ba lnga brgya khwa khyus lding ba bzhin du nam mkha' la 'khor te/ 
170a8(mdo sde): gang du yang 'o dugs mi rnyed do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas/ rgyal po'i khab du bsod
170b1(mdo sde): snyoms la song ba dang / des yi dgas de dag mthong ngo // yi dgas de dag gis kyang tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po mthong ngo // de nas de dag gcig tu 'dril nas
170b2(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i thad du dong ste/ phyi nas snying rje rje skad zer zhing sdug sdug skad zer la gti zhing smra bas tshig 'thun par smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u
170b3(mdo sde): dgal gyi bu bdag cag ni rgyal po'i khab tu tshong dpon lnga brgyar gyur te/ bdag cag ser sna ci na 'jungs pa yo byad rnams la kun tu 'dzin par gyur nas/ bdag cag nyid
170b4(mdo sde): kyis kyang sbyin pa ma byin la/ gzhan dag sbyin pa byed pa lnga yang bgrogs byas so// sbyin pa'i gnas rnams la yang yi dgas kyi tshig lta bus mang du/ 
170b5(mdo sde): spyos te/ khyod ni yi dgas su skyes pa bzhin du gzhan gyi khyim phyi nyug pa'o zhes byas so// des na bdag cag shi ba'i 'og tu 'di lta bu'i yi dgas
170b6(mdo sde): su skyes so// btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po de bas no// bdag cag gi nye du rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa de dag la bdag cag gi las kyi rna bar mdzod la dad pa dris te/ 
170b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol nas/ bdag cag gi slad du yon gyi rab 'don par gsol cig/ 'on tang bdag cag yi dgas kyi skye gnas nas
170b8(mdo sde): thar kyang srid do zhes gsungs shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bus kyang yi dgas rnams la cang mi smra bas khas blangs so// de nas tshe dang ljon pa mo'u
171a1(mdo sde): dgal gyi bus de dag gi nyi du rnams kyi khyim khyim du dad pa dris nas phyid nyid sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos la spyan drangs so// 
171a2(mdo sde): yi dgas rnams la yang sbran te/ sang bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos la spyan drangs kyis khyed kyang drer shog shig ces byas so// de
171a3(mdo sde): dag gi nye du rnams la yang khyed kyang shig shig dang / nye du'i mchod ston byed pa der yi dgas de dag mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes byas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
171a4(mdo sde): moru dgal gyi bu nyid mchod sngon gyi zhal ta byed pa la zhugs so// de nas na ma nangs nas zhal zas pa shams te/ gdugs chod la bab na yi dgas de
171a5(mdo sde): dag mi snang ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa mau'u dag la gyi bu chen pos lha'i mig gris yi dwags de nga ga bsams nu/ yul ma ga d+ha thog tag na yang mi
171a6(mdo sde): snang la ni/ mthar gyis gling bzhi'i bar du bltas na yang de na yang mi snang ngo // da nA ji srid du de'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa de srid du bltas kyang de na yang mi snang ngo // 
171a7(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po mi dga' bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi sbyin bdag de rnams mi gdi'
171a8(mdo sde): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ me'u dgal gyi bu thong la/ khyod mi dgar ma byed cig/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
171b1(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dag yod de/ de dag tu las kyi rlung gis 'phangs mod kyi/ 'on kyang mo'u dgal gyi bu dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
171b2(mdo sde): la ltos shig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gzigs pa mngon par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang bstan gyis 'gaN+DI brdungs
171b3(mdo sde): shig/ de nas 'gaN+Di brdungs po dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyang 'dus/ yi dgas kyi nye du rnams dang yi dgas mthong bar 'dod pa'i sems can
171b4(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang ltad me la lhags te 'dus so// de nus bcom ldan 'das kyis tsi nas yi dgas rnam sa kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dag
171b5(mdo sde): 'dun dang bcas pa bshes gsol ba mthong bar/ 'gyur ba dang / bdag cag gi phyir nye du rje// mas kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge
171b6(mdo sde): 'dun rnams bshos gsol zhing 'khod do snyam du dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul bstan to// de nos bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pa
171b7(mdo sde): yon gyi rabs gsungs pa/ sbyin pa 'di yi bsod nams gang // de ni yi dgas phyi bzhin sngo// yi dgas 'jig rten rab 'jigs las// de dag myur du thar
171b8(mdo sde): gyur cig ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhi de las brten te/ de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas srog chag 'bum phrag du mas
172a1(mdo sde): ser smra'i dri ma spangs te/ bden pa mthong bar gyur to// yi dgas de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum
172a2(mdo sde): pa'i lha yul bzang po smras so// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ 
172a3(mdo sde): gang du skyes las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas yi dgas las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom
172a4(mdo sde): ldan 'daso la sems dga' bor gyur pa de dag gis mthong ngo // de nas sngon yi dgas su gyur pa/ 'i lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag
172a5(mdo sde): cag zhag ljon te gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag cag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag cag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la
172a6(mdo sde): blta ba'i phyir 'dod do snyam mo// de nas sngon yi dgas su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo des brgyan pa/ 
172a7(mdo sde): nor bu sna tshogs kyis smras pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur gum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / smai ka lA sogs pas byugs pa de rnams kyis de nyid kyi mtshan
172a8(mdo sde): mo lha'i me tog ud pa laM dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man da ra ba rnams kyis thub bkang ste/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka
172b1(mdo sde): gnas pa kho ra khor yug 'od chen pos spang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod/ 
172b2(mdo sde): do/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon yi dwags su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi bsam pa dang / brag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud
172b3(mdo sde): nas/ de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon yi dgas su gyur pa'i bu de dag gis khyad par chen po thob bo// de dag tshong pa khe spogs phyin
172b4(mdo sde): pa bzhin du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan ga/ de sum bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi sdang bar gyur to// der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
172b5(mdo sde): mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ me'u dgal gyi bu khyod kyis yi dgas mang po dag lha/ 'i nang du bkod nas de dag kyang mdang sum nga'i zad
172b6(mdo sde): du 'ongs te/ de dag la ngas chos bstan nas/ de dag gis rnyed par bya ba rnyed de mtho bar 'gyur pa rnyed nas dong ba de ni khyod kyis zhal ta byas pa 'bras bu yod par gyur
172b7(mdo sde): te/ legs so legs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos de dag gi nye du rnams la yang shes par byas te/ de dag gis thos nas mchog tu ya/ 
172b8(mdo sde): mtshan du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur nas bkur bsti byas so// mo'u dgal gyi bu de bas na khyod kyis ci nas yi dgas de dag gi nyes pa de
173a1(mdo sde): lta bu dag mi 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir se pa spong ba la brtson par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi
173a2(mdo sde): chen po dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang // mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'dra
173a3(mdo sde): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // chu smad zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang // 
173a4(mdo sde): phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang // tshong dpon rnams dang / dred dpon na/ dmas dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / 
173a5(mdo sde): gnod sprin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rna mas dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur
173a6(mdo sde): bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am
173a7(mdo sde): ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas pa com ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / 
173a8(mdo sde): gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal
173b1(mdo sde): bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya
173b2(mdo sde): che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam po las chung ma spangs te/ de de dang ldan cig
173b3(mdo sde): tu rtse zhing 'ga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgurare spyod pa lus chung ma la bu chags nas// de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang / bu
173b4(mdo sde): byung ste khye'u zhig bcas nas de btsos pa'i btsas s+ho/ nu byas te/ khye 'u 'di'i ming ji skad bdag shes ming 'dogs par byed de/ de nye du rnams na
173b5(mdo sde): re khye'u 'di rgyu skar chu smad la btsas pas na/ de'i phyir ming chu smad ces gdags so zhes ze/ ra nas/ de'i ming chu smad ces btogs so// de nas
173b6(mdo sde): khye'u chu smad bskyed bsrings te cher skyes nas/ de'i pha shi ba dang / rang gi khyim gyi bdag por gyur to// de nas des tshong dus bkram nas nyo tshong byed cing nyo tshong gyis 'tsho bar byed pa las
173b7(mdo sde): de'i nyin cig bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste/ des bcom ldan 'das mthong ba dang / dam pa'i chos thos pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad par gyur nus/ de
173b8(mdo sde): rab tu 'byung ba'i sems bskyes te/ des ma la gsol ba btab pa/ yum bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung gis gnang bar mdzod cig/ de nas de'i mas
174a1(mdo sde): smras pa/ bu khyod ni bu gcig pa yin gyis/ bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rab tu ma 'byung shig/ bdag shi ba'i 'og tu ci bya ba byos shig ces zer ro// chu smang
174a2(mdo sde): des kyang ci skyed pa de dag thams cad ma byin te/ yum 'dis dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sdug cing phongs pa dang / bkren pa rnams la sbyin pa dag gyis shig ces
174a3(mdo sde): byas so// de'i ma da rkam chags can 'jungs pa yo byad rnams kun tu 'dzin pa zhig ste/ kar sha pa ni de dag sbas nas/ dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag zla 'dod de/ 
174a4(mdo sde): khyim der 'ongs pa de dag la rgya zhing khyed ni yi dgas su deskyes pa bzhin du khyim phyi nyug cing slong ngo zhes ze dar ro// bu de la yang slu bar byed de bdag gis nyin
174a5(mdo sde): cig bzhin du/ dge slong 'di snyed 'di skad cig la zan byin no zhes zer ro// phyis re shig ni de shi ba dang / de yi dgas su skyes nas/ bu chu smad ma dang bral ba
174a6(mdo sde): mya ngan byed de/ sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // des brtson po dang bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas
174a7(mdo sde): phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / 
174a8(mdo sde): rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsu
174b1(mdo sde): pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthal du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa bzhin du bsil bar gyur pa/ 
174b2(mdo sde): rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur bsti la mi
174b3(mdo sde): lta ba dang / dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gud par smra ba'i gnas su gyur nas/ des chu klung gang gA'i 'gram du lo
174b4(mdo sde): ma'i spyil po byas te/ bsam gtan byed do// de ma yi dgas kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa de yang sngo dang dum me reg ma 'dra la/ gtsor bur 'dug cing rang
174b5(mdo sde): gi skas yog pa/ lho ni ri tsam la/ kha ni khab kyi mi ga tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu' bar te/ me tse gcig tu 'bar nas tshig cing nyam
174b6(mdo sde): thag pa'i skad 'byin te/ tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyi thad du song nas/ re shig na tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis yi dgas mo de mthong nas dris pa/ 'di kho na 'dra ba khyod su
174b7(mdo sde): zhig/ yi dgas mos smras pa/ bu cig gang las btsas pa yi// byams pa'i me ni bdag yin te// zas dang snyoms dang bral ba yi// yi dgas rnams
174b8(mdo sde): kyi nang du skyes// bdag ni shi ba'i dus 'das nas// lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon te// chu yi bag kyang ma mthong na// kha zas lta zhig ga la mthong // 'bras bu ldan
175a1(mdo sde): pa'i shing rnams kyi// drang srong de dag 'bras med 'gyur// gang ba'i mtsho 'gram bdag song yang // de dag kyang ni skam par 'gyur// btsun pa'i shing drung
175a2(mdo sde): bde ba lags// khyod kyi snod nang chu yang bsil// bkren pa bdag la thugs rje snyed// skom gyis gdungs kyis chab stsol cig/ de nas chu sprad kyis ma la smras pa/ yum
175a3(mdo sde): khyod mir gyur pa'i tshe/ bdag gis sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed du ma bcug gam/ yi dgas mo sa smras pa/ bu cig bdag ni srir sngas non pas
175a4(mdo sde): sbyin pa dag kyang ma byin bsod nams dag kyang ma byas ra te/ nor rnyed pa de dag thams cad sdig pa'i sems kyis dong du sbas so// bu cig de bsi na dad pa
175a5(mdo sde): dris la bdag gi phyir sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol nas yon gyi rabs 'den par gsol cig/ 'o na tang bdag
175a6(mdo sde): yi dgas kyi ske gnas nas thar kyang srid do// chu smad kyis smras pa/ de ltar bgyis khyod kyang gral dpon gyi mdun du 'dug shig/ yi dgas mos smras pa// 
175a7(mdo sde): bu cig bdag ni gcer bur 'dug pas ngo tsha ste ngo mi thub po// chu smad kyis smras pa/ yum khyod gang gi tshe sdig pa byed pa de'i tshe ngo mi tshwa nA/ da ltar 'bras
175a8(mdo sde): bu myong ba'i tshe ci'i phyir ngo tsha yi dgas mos smras pa/ 'o na de bzhin du 'ong bar bya'o// de nas chu smad kyis nye du rnams kyi khyim khyim du dad pa dris nas/ 
175b1(mdo sde): phyid nyin sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos la spyan drangs nas/ gdugs tshod la bab pa na/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dag
175b2(mdo sde): kyang 'dus/ yi dgas mo de yang gral dpon gyi mdun du 'dug ste/ srog chags 'bum phrag du ma 'dus pa rnams kyis yi dgas mo de mthong ngo // de dag
175b3(mdo sde): gis yi dgas mo de'i lus mi sdug pa mthong nas/ shin tu skyo ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu
175b4(mdo sde): smad kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhol zos bzang pos tshim par byas nas// yi dgas mo'i phyir yon gyi rabs gdon par
175b5(mdo sde): gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gsu nga yan lag lnga dang ldan pas smin pa'i rabs ga sungs pa/ sbyin po 'di yi bsod nams gang
175b6(mdo sde): de ni yi dgas phyi bzhin song // yi dgas 'jig rten rab 'jigs las// de ni myur du thar gyur cig/ ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhi de
175b7(mdo sde): las brtan nas yi dgus mo de dang / skye bo mang po la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ srog chags 'bum phrag du mas de thos nas bden pa mthong bar gyur to// / 
175b8(mdo sde): yi dgas mo de yang sems dga' bar 'gyur te/ shi nas yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen mor skyes so// tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis yang yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen mor skyes
176a1(mdo sde): par shes so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis smras pa/ yum du ni mthu yod kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtang ba dag gyis shig/ yi dgas rdzu 'phru
176a2(mdo sde): chen mos smras pa/ bu cig bdag ni sbyin pa la dga' ba med de mi nus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smra da kyis yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen mo la smras pa/ chags
176a3(mdo sde): pa'i mun pas mig ni rab bsgribs te/ khyod kyis yi dgas 'jig rten bsgrubs pa yi// khyod kyi rus bu chen po sha med pa// rus pa lpags pa spyi rnams
176a4(mdo sde): da dung 'dug/ ces byas so// de nas tshe dang lnga na pa chu smad kyis lan mang du spros te smras nas/ de'i tshe 'og tu de las rab zung tsog thob
176a5(mdo sde): bo/ de nas chu smad kyis dge 'dun la phul nas/ gang gis dge 'dun la ras zung cig po nyos pa'i dge slong des gos kyis gdang la bzhag
176a6(mdo sde): go/ de nas yi dgras mo de mtshan mo 'ongs nas brkus so// de nas dge slong des tshe dang ldan pa chu smad la bsnyad nas/ chu smad song ste yi dwags mo spyod
176a7(mdo sde): nas phyir bkug ste byin no// de bzhin du lan gsum gyi bar du dge slong de las brkus nas/ tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis phyir bkug ste byin pa dang
176a8(mdo sde): dge slong des kyang de gshegs nas phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir stan la klan to// de nas de phyin chad me brkus so// de bas ni sems can
176b1(mdo sde): rnams la de ltar ser sna 'tho 'tsham par byed pa mthong nas/ ci nas yi dgas mo de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ ser sna spang ba la brtson
176b2(mdo sde): par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am
176b3(mdo sde): tsa dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 
176b4(mdo sde): dmus long zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad/ des la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po/ dmas dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor
176b5(mdo sde): gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / dred dang na rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin
176b6(mdo sde): rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lho 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ro mo byas/ mchod pa byas te
176b7(mdo sde): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
176b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang // gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge
177a1(mdo sde): 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas tshe dang / 
177a2(mdo sde): ldan pa dga' byed snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la song ngo // mnyan du yod par bsod
177a3(mdo sde): snyoms byas nas zin zos te/ zas byis len pa spangs nas/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos bzhag yi dgas kyi yul rgyu zhing song ba las tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis
177a4(mdo sde): yi dgas mo sdong dum mi reg ma 'dral/ dmus long du 'dug pa rang gi skas yog pa/ lho ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ dur khrod bzhin du dring
177a5(mdo sde): ba khwa dang / bya rgod dang / khyi dang / wa rnams kyis bskor nas/ phyogs kun nas sha bcad cing ba cad cing za ba dang / de gnad la bab ste/ dkos
177a6(mdo sde): thag nas nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin te/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba myong zhing 'dug pa zhig mthong ngo // de nas tshe dang
177a7(mdo sde): ldan pa dga' byed mi dga' bar gyur nas dris pa/ sred mo khyod kyis sngon sdig pa'i las ci zhig byas nas/ ngos 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong zhig 'dug/ yi
177a8(mdo sde): dgas mos smras pa/ nyi ma shar pa na sgron ma mi dgos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang / de khyod la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa lung ston par
177b1(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ de thos na sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa spong bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan
177b2(mdo sde): 'das nang du yang dag 'jog lnga bzhengs na/ 'khor bzhi po rnam la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba dang 'dra ba'i tshe ro dang ldano cog ston to// 'khor brgya phrag du ma yang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar bac+doMs las chos ro dang ldan
177b3(mdo sde): no cog nyan par byed do// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ba/ snyan par gsung ba/ tshur shog 'od pa legs sdegasung bsngar 'dzub pa yin te/ der bcom ldan 'das
177b4(mdo sde): kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed la 'di skad ces bka' da stsal to// dga' byed tshur shog/ khyod 'ongs dpa legs so// khyod da gzod ga las 'ongs/ 
177b5(mdo sde): dga' byed kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag ni yi da gas rgyu ba'i nang nas mchis te/ der bdag gi sa yi dgras mo sdong dum me reg ma 'dra la
177b6(mdo sde): dmus long du mchis pa/ rang gi skras yog pa/ lto ni ri tsam la kha ni khyab kyi mig tsam ste/ dur khrod bzhin du dri nga ba/ khwa dang / bya rgod dang / khyi
177b7(mdo sde): dang / wa rnams kyis bskor nas/ phyogs kun nas sha ba kum zhing bkum zhing 'tshal ba dang / de gnad la bab ste// dkos thag nas nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin te/ 
177b8(mdo sde): sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / che ba dang // yid du mi 'ong ba myong zhing mchis pa zhig mthong lags so// yang gsol pa/ lus cheni ri bo mthon
178a1(mdo sde): po 'dra ba la/ mchu dang lkog ma skum zhing shin tu sdug/ rang gi sgras ni gdong yog cer bar mchis/ mchu sgo phra khab mig 'dra rab tu ring / de
178a2(mdo sde): ltar gcer bu smras yog pa// rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor bsgreng ba bzhini// thod pa thogs shing mi bzad la// ngu zhing kun tu rgyugs par bgyid// bkres pa dang ni sgo
178a3(mdo sde): pa yis// dub cing sdug bsngal dag gis nyen// nyam thog skad kyang 'byin par bgyid// sdug bsngal tshor ba nyams su myed // de dri mi yi 'jig rten du// rab 'jigs sdig
178a4(mdo sde): pa ci bgyis na// des na sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba// 'ji dgas su rung ba myong bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' byed kyi dgas mo de ni
178a5(mdo sde): sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin no// de'i las kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lags so// dga' byed 'o na legs par rab tu
178a6(mdo sde): nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas bshad do// dga' byed sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin ga sh+ya
178a7(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i khwa lo sgyur ba/ 
178a8(mdo sde): bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA ra ni so na drang srong spro ba ri dge sa
178b1(mdo sde): kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so// de nas grong khyer bA ra na si de na/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig 'dug pa de chos 'dod de/ des chos thos nas 'khor ba la nyes par lta ba dang / 
178b2(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan du lta bar gyur te/ des pha ma la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // de nas de'i phyir nye du rnams
178b3(mdo sde): kyis dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang byas nas de de na slob pa dang / mi slob pa'i dge slong ma dag dang lhan cig tu gnas pa las re shig na des bag med pa'i dbang gis bslab
178b4(mdo sde): pa'i gzhi la lhod par byas so// de nas dge slong ma rnams kyis tshul khrims 'chal pa'i phyir bskrad do// de nas/ des sbyin bdag khyim bdag rnams dad pas nges par
178b5(mdo sde): 'bul ba yang gcod du bcug/ slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong ma rnams kyis sngags pa ma yin pa yang brjod/ dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa gang yin
178b6(mdo sde): pa de dag mthong na yang mig btsums te 'dug go// dga' byed ji snyam du sems/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo gang yin pa de ni yi dgas mo 'di yin te/ des btsug lag khang la ser
178b7(mdo sde): sna byas pa des nI yi dgas su skyes so// des nar ma bcad pa des ni khwa dang / bya rgod dang / khyi dang / wa rnams kyis bskor to// de slob pa dang mi slob pa dge slong rnams kyi
178b8(mdo sde): bsdogs pa ma yin pa brjod pas na de'i lus dri nga bar gyur to// dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams mthong na/ mig btsums pas ni dmus long du gyur to// dga' byed
179a1(mdo sde): de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu gnag pA 'gyu'o// lba gcig kya par dkar ba rnam ni rnaM par smin pa yA gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// 
179a2(mdo sde): ma sa 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dga' byed de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams
179a3(mdo sde): 'ba' shig la btad par bya ste/ dga' byed khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na/ srog chags sa yas bden pa mthong bar gyur to// der bcom
179a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ser sna dang ngag gi nyes par spyod pa'i nyes dmigs de dag dang gzhan dag kyang rtogs nas ser
179a5(mdo sde): sna dang ngag gi nyes par spyod pa spang ba'i phyir brtson pa ra bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
179a6(mdo sde): nas/ dge slong de dag dang // lha dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am tsa dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das
179a7(mdo sde): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bskyod do// // tshong dpon zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po rnams dang / phyug
179a8(mdo sde): po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin
179b1(mdo sde): rnams dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod
179b2(mdo sde): sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po ldan pa/ na bza'
179b3(mdo sde): dang // zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams rnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa ni rgyal bu rgyal
179b4(mdo sde): byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun du ga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ tshong dpon phyug cing nur mad la longs spyod che ba/ 
179b5(mdo sde): yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang da 'gran pa zhig gnas te/ de phyi zhig na rgyal bu
179b6(mdo sde): rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo // de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku sras bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus
179b7(mdo sde): mdzes par byas pa 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas
179b8(mdo sde): kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'khor
180a1(mdo sde): ba las skyo bar 'gyur ba'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas 'khor ba las nyes par lta ba dang / mya ngan las 'dra ba la yon tan du lta bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
180a2(mdo sde): bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ kun la grags pa dang / bsod nams chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad gsos dang / 
180a3(mdo sde): sman zod rnams rnyed par gyur to// des yongs su bzung ba'i yo byad rnyed do cog stsogs par byed do// des tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la bgo bsha' ma byas so// 
180a4(mdo sde): de nas ser sna kun tu bstan cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa des na/ rang gi yo byad la lhag par zhe dan bzhin du shi nas rang gi gnas khang du yi dgas su skyes
180a5(mdo sde): so// de nas de'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rna mas kyis 'gan de 'jug med pa brdungs nas rung bu phyir phyung ngo // de nas de'i rus bu la rus bu'i
180a6(mdo sde): mchod pa byas nas/ phyir gtsug lag khong du lhags so// de nas gnas kyi sgo phye ste chos gos dang / lhung bzed g.yar sA 'drim pa la zhugs pa dang / re shig na yi
180a7(mdo sde): dgas rka lag dang / mig mi sdug la lus mchog tu 'jigs la chos gos dang / lhung bzed zin cing 'dug pa de mthong ngo // de ltar mi sdug pa de mthong nas/ dge
180a8(mdo sde): slong dag mi dga' bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de la phan gdags pa dang / slob ma'i tshogs rnams skyob
180b1(mdo sde): bskyed pa dang / ser sna'i rnam par smin pa mi sdug pa yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir dge slong gi tshogs kyis nam ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdang te/ 
180b2(mdo sde): gnas der gshegs so// de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po
180b3(mdo sde): brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong
180b4(mdo sde): nas/ mthong ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das la sa dmas dga' ba skyes te/ de ngo mtsha bar gyur to// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis char sprin gyi 'brug
180b5(mdo sde): sgra lta bur zab pa dang / rnga sgra lta bu'i gsung gi/ swa yi dgas de smyos te/ bzhin bzangs khye de nyid kyis bdag nyid phung ba'i phyir chos gos dang lhung
180b6(mdo sde): bzed 'dri bsgrubs te/ des na yi dgas su skyes pa yin gyis/ da yang nga la sems dga' bar gyis la yo byad 'di la yang sems ma chags par byas dang legs
180b7(mdo sde): so// 'di la sa kyang shi nas sems can dmyal po rnamasu skye bar/ de nas yi dwags des chos gos dang / lhung bzed dge 'dun la phul nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
180b8(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal te/ nyes pa gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yi dgas kyi phyir yon gyi rabs gsungs pa/ sbyin pa 'di yi bsod nams gang // de ni
181a1(mdo sde): yi dgas phyi bzhin song // yi dwags 'jig rten rab 'jigs las// de ni myur du thar gyur cig/ de nas yi dgas de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga'
181a2(mdo sde): bar gyur te/ shi nas yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen por skyes so// de nas yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen po rje cha gdub 'khor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/ lus do shal dang
181a3(mdo sde): se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu swa tshegs kyis smras pa'i cod pan lus gur kum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang sI ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i
181a4(mdo sde): me tog ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu daM da dang pad+ma dkar po dang / man dar ba rnams kyi sa thub bkang ste/ 'od ma'i tshal bya kA lAn da ka
181a5(mdo sde): lan da ka gnas pa kho ra khor yug 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor ste/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ 
181a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de la de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ de zos nas dga' ba skyes te song ngo // 
181a7(mdo sde): de'i tshe dge slong srong dang the rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo // de mthong
181a8(mdo sde): nas the tsom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lo zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci legs mdang gsum mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i
181b1(mdo sde): dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mdzad kyi bdag
181b2(mdo sde): po 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin na mo/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi// yi dgas de shi nas yi dgas rdzu 'phral chen por smras te/ 
181b3(mdo sde): de mdangs sum nga'i thad du 'ongs nas/ ngas de lo chos bstan te/ de dga' ba skyes nas song ngo // dge slong dag de bas na ci nas tshong dpon las yi dgas su
181b4(mdo sde): gyur pa de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag byung bar mi 'gyur bar ser sna spang ba la brtson por bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan
181b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong nga de dag dang / lha dang lha ma yin dang / na ma mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto'i phye
181b6(mdo sde): chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // gru zhes bya ba na
181b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams
181b8(mdo sde): dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am
182a1(mdo sde): rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod
182a2(mdo sde): sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen
182a3(mdo sde): po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdon dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa// 
182a4(mdo sde): rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas dpa na rten cing bzhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan dpa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu snga dro sham thabs dang / 
182a5(mdo sde): chos gos bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas/ rgya la po'i khab du bsod snyoms la song ngo // rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms byas nas zan zos
182a6(mdo sde): te/ zas phyis len pa spangs nas/ chos gos dang / lhung bzed bzhag ste/ yi dgas kyi yul rgyu zhing song ba dang / des bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri'i nyen kor du
182a7(mdo sde): yi dgas mau gshin rje'i srin mo 'dra la lus khrag gis gshos pa/ dur khrod na 'dug bzhin du rkang rus kyis bskor ba/ nyin mo dang mtshan mo bu lnga lnga btsa'
182a8(mdo sde): zhing de lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong la/ bu la byams pa yod bzhin du de bkres pas nyen nas de dag za zhing 'dug pa zhig mthong ngo // de nas gnas brtan 'dam bu sprin gyi
182b1(mdo sde): bus de la dris pa/ khyod kyis sngon las ci zhig byas na/ des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong zhing 'dug/ yi dgas mos smras pa/ nyi ma shar ba na sgron ma mi dgos kyis/ bcom ldan
182b2(mdo sde): 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang / de khyod la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa lung ston par 'gyur te/ de thos na sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa'i las spong bar 'gyur ro// 
182b3(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'dam bu sprin gyi bu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams
182b4(mdo sde): la sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog/ ston te/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma yang dbang po rnam das mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang
182b5(mdo sde): ldan no cog nyan par byed do// de nas sangs rgyas bco ma ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ba/ sA na par gsung ba tshur shog 'ongs pa legs so zhes
182b6(mdo sde): gsung ba sngar 'dzum pa yin te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu tshur shog khyod 'ongs pa legs
182b7(mdo sde): so// khyod da gdod ga las 'ongs/ 'dam bu sprin gyi bu gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yi dgas kyi nang du mchi mche ba las slar mchis te/ der bdag/ 
182b8(mdo sde): gisau yaM dgas mo gshin rje'i srin mo 'dra lo/ lus khrag gis bshos pa/ dur khrod na 'dug pa bzhin du keng rus kyis bskor ba zhig mthong lags so// yang gsol/ 
183a1(mdo sde): pa/ bdag ni nyin bzhin bu lnga btsa'// mtshan yang de bzhin lnga bca' ste// bcas nas de dag zos na yang // 'drangs par mi 'gyur zhes mchin// de yis mi yi 'jig rten du// 
183a2(mdo sde): rab 'jigs sdig pa ci bgyis na// des na sdug bsngal 'dri 'dra ba// 'jigs su rung ba myong bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dam bu sprin gyi bu yi dgas mo de ni sdig
183a3(mdo sde): pa'i las byed byed pa yin no// de las kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa mnyan par 'tshal lags so// 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu 'o na leg b+da rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang
183a4(mdo sde): ngas bshad do// 'dam bu sprin gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das dpa'i dus na grong khyer bA ra na sin tshong dpon phyug cing no// ra mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa
183a5(mdo sde): yangs shing rgya che ba// rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa / rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam po las chung ma blangs nas/ de de
183a6(mdo sde): dang lhan cig tu rtsa zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod kyang bu yang med/ bu mo yang med de/ de lag pa la skom tshugs bcas nas/ bdag
183a7(mdo sde): gi khyim nor du ma dang ldan du zin kyang bu yang med/ bu mo yang med pas/ bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu ni bu med pa'i phyir ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyur ro snyam
183a8(mdo sde): ste/ sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go// de nas de bu med de bu 'dod pa'i phyir gu lang dang / chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa dang / 
183b1(mdo sde): lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs te/ 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang / nags tshal gyi lha dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang / sum mdo'i lha dang / 
183b2(mdo sde): gtor ma len pa'i lha dang / lhan cig skyes pa dang / chos 'thun pa pa dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs la/ 'jig rten na yang gsol/ 
183b3(mdo sde): ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi/ de yang de lta ni ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du
183b4(mdo sde): zin na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so// // ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo
183b5(mdo sde): skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ pa ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang / ma dus la ba ba cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa ste/ 
183b6(mdo sde): gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur tA/ des lha mnyes par byas kyang bu yang ma byung / bu mo yang ma byung nas/ de'i blo 'di lta bu zhig skyes te/ ma la bdag gis/ 
183b7(mdo sde): chun ma zhig blangs na/ brgya la bu yod par gyur lta srid dam snyam ste/ des rigs mnyam pa las chun ma blangs nas/ da de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// 
183b8(mdo sde): de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las phyi zhig na bu chags par gyur nas/ de dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas/ khyim thabs la sbran pa/ jo bo bdag la sras tshig
184a1(mdo sde): / te/ bdag gi rum g.yas logs na rten cing gnas pa las na/ khye'ur 'gyur bar des kyis/ dgyes pa bskyed du gsol zhes byas so// de yang dga' ches te// 
184a2(mdo sde): ro gtod ni bteg/ lag pa g.yas pa ni brkyang nas/ bdag gis yun ring po nas smon smon pa'i bu'i ngo mthong bar 'ong ngo // bdag gis bu rung bar shog shig/ mi rung bar
184a3(mdo sde): ma gyur cig/ bdag gi bya ba dag byed par shog shig/ gsos po'i lan phyir gso bar shog shig/ nor skal la spyod par shog shig/ bdag gi rigs rgyud ring du gnas par
184a4(mdo sde): shog shig/ bdag cag 'das te shi ba'i 'og tu yang dbadrag cag gi phyir mang yang rung / nyung yang rung ste/ da sbyin pa dag byin 2/ bsod nams dag byas nas de
184a5(mdo sde): gnyis gang dang gang du skyes shing 'gro ba dar 'di song / shig ces yon spro bar shog shig ces dga' ba'i tshig brjod do// de nas des bu chags par rig nas
184a6(mdo sde): bu'i rim gro bya ba'i phyir khang bzangs kyi steng du nyam rangs su bzhag ste/ grang ba'i tshe grang ba'i yo byad rnams dang // tsha ba'i tshe tsha ba'i yo byad rnams dang // sman pas bstan pa'i zas
184a7(mdo sde): rnams dang // ha cang kho ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang skur ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang lan che che ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang dang ra ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang ro tsha ba
184a8(mdo sde): ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang bska ba ma yin pa rnams dang / kha ba dang / sbyar ba dang / lan tsa dang / dngar ba dang / tsha ba dang / bska ba med pa'i zas rnams kyis bsten cing / do shel dang / se mo
184b1(mdo sde): dos lus rnam par klubs te/ lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i 'tshal na rnam par rgyu ba bzhin du khri'i steng nas khri'i steng dang / khri'u'i steng nas khri'u'i steng du rgyu zhing 'og gis gzhi la mi
184b2(mdo sde): 'bab pa dang / des yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra skad ci yang mi thos par byas so// de nas chung ma snga ma des de bkur zhing gtses par byed pa mthong nas phrag dog skyes te bsam
184b3(mdo sde): pa/ gal te 'di lngas bu bcas par gyur na ni/ bdag la gnod pa byed por 'gyur gyis/ ci nas de'i thabs shig bya dgos so snyam mo// 'dod pa la yongs su brten pa la ni
184b4(mdo sde): sdig pa'i las mi bya ba'i bag ci yang med de/ mi sdug pa'i 'gro ba'i g.yang sar khA ltos pa/ des yid rton du bcug nas gang 'thungs pa tsam gyis nyon
184b5(mdo sde): mongs ma de'i bu 'phyil bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mngal rlug pa'i rtsi byin no// de nas chung ma phye ma des nye du tha/ mas cad bsdus nas chung ma lnga ma de zhal lce la bkug/ 
184b6(mdo sde): ste/ khyod kyis bdag yid rton du bcug pas mngal drug pa'i rtsi byin te/ des bdag gi bu 'phyil to zhes byas so// de nas chung ma snga ma des nye du rnams kyi nang du mna' bo
184b7(mdo sde): to/ gal te bdag gis khyod la mngal rlug pa'i rtsi byin par gyur na bdag yi dgas mor gyur to/ bu byung ngo tsog za bar shog shig byas so// 'dam bu spyan gyi bu ji snyam du sems// 
184b8(mdo sde): tshong dpon gyi chung mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yi dgas mo de yin te/ des sngon phrag dog byas pa des na yi dgas mong skyes so// des brdzun byas te mna' bor ba'i las
185a1(mdo sde): kyi rnam par smin pa des ni nyin mo dang nub mo bu lnga lnga btsa' zhing za bar gyur to// dam bu sprin gyi bu de bas na khyod kyis ngag gi nyes pa spang ba la brtson par bya ste/ 
185a2(mdo sde): nas yi dgas mo de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar 'dam bu sprin gyi bu khyod kyis bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang
185a3(mdo sde): ldan pa 'dam bu sprin gyi bu dang / lha dang lham yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am tso dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa
185a4(mdo sde): mi mngon par bstod do// // phyi sa khwa dang zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po
185a5(mdo sde): rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpo/ na rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin
185a6(mdo sde): rnam dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / 
185a7(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ 
185a8(mdo sde): nabaza'o dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yangs pa can na/ spre'u rdzing gi 'a
185b1(mdo sde): gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe yangs pa can na grong khyer gyi 'obs shig gi nang na/ yi dgas zas su skyugs pa za ba/ bong bzag/ ngang snabs dang / 
185b2(mdo sde): gcin gyis 'tshe ba/ rnag dang / khrag dang phyi sa za ba/ mi bzad pa/ rang bzhin gyis sdug bsngal ba lnga brgya gnas so// yang smras pa// skyugs pa za zhing bor ba za// nga ra snang
185b3(mdo sde): gcin gyis 'tsho ba dang // rnag khrag dang ni phyis za// mi bzad rang bzhin sdug cing 'du ga/ yangs pa can de na bram ze zhig kyang 'dug ste/ de sa rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs
185b4(mdo sde): nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' la dga' dgur s+ho/ dad do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas de'i lus dri nga bar gyur to// de
185b5(mdo sde): nas bram ze des mtshan mkhan rnams bkug ste dris na/ de dag na re 'di ni lto na khye'u 'dug pa de'i mthu yin/ ni zhes zer ro// re shig na de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon
185b6(mdo sde): pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u mdog ngan cing blta na mi sdug la byud ngan po lus mi gtsang bas bsgos pa dri nga ba zhig btsas so// de mchog tu mi sdug mod kyi/ byams pa'i dbang gis
185b7(mdo sde): 'brel pas pha ma gnyis kyis gsos so// de mi gtsang ba'i gnas rnams 'ba' shig tu dga' la phyag dar gyi phung po dang / phyi sa khung du skra 'bal zhing khar mi gtsang ba 'dzud
185b8(mdo sde): nas/ de'i ming phyi sa khung zhes bya bar gyur to// re shig na de phan tshun du 'khyam pa las 'od srung rdzogs byed kyis mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di de lta bu'i gnas rnam
186a1(mdo sde): su dga' ba las 'di ni gor ma chag par grub pa'i skyes bu zhig yin gyis bdag gis 'dir rab tu dbyung ngo snyam mo// des de rab tu phyung nas gcer bur 'khyam
186a2(mdo sde): zhing 'dug la/ legs pa byed pa la yang gnas so// de nas de 'khyamo zhing song ba las yangs pa can gyi 'obs kyi nang na yi dgas lnga brgya 'khod pa rnams mthong nas de sngon gyi
186a3(mdo sde): las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'brel bas grong khyer gyi 'obs de'i nang du song nas de dag dang lhan cig 'dus shing phrad de/ dga' bar gyur nas grogs por gyur to// phyis re shig na
186a4(mdo sde): khye'u phyi sa khung don zhig la brel te yangs pa can du song/ ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyang grong khyer gyi 'obs der byon nas yi dgas de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom
186a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po ba rgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gri
186a6(mdo sde): brgyan pa/ nyi mo stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nA/ 
186a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed cis 'phongs yi dgas rnams kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni skom lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
186a8(mdo sde): kyis phyag sor lnga las yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu'i rgyun lnga phab ste/ des yi dgas lnga brgya po de dag tshim par mdzad do// de nas de dag bcom ldan 'das la sems/ 
186b1(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas/ ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye
186b2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas yi dgras los shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i yul bzang po skyes
186b3(mdo sde): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bor gyur par de dag gis mthong ngo // de nas sngon yi dgas su gyur pa'i lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag zhog
186b4(mdo sde): lon te/ gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir/ 'gro dab ni bdag cag gis cha ma yin gyis/ bdag cag/ zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'dral blta ba'i phyir
186b5(mdo sde): 'dod do snyam mo// de nas sngon yi dgas su gyur pa'i lha 'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu sa
186b6(mdo sde): tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / sprig ka la sogs pas byug pa de rnams kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pid+ma
186b7(mdo sde): dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man da ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas thams cad 'od chen pos snang byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog
186b8(mdo sde): gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon yi dgas su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi bsam pa dang / 
187a1(mdo sde): bag la nyal dang // khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa de thos nas/ lha'i bu lnga
187a2(mdo sde): brgyas 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ de dag gis bden pa mthong nas tshong pa khe spogs
187a3(mdo sde): byin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar byed pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du sbyor ba gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi
187a4(mdo sde): thad du lhags pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis bcom ldan 'ad/ sa la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo // de nas khye'u phyi sa khung grong khyer gyi 'o bra
187a5(mdo sde): su 'ongs pa dang / yi dgas de dag ma mthong ngo // de na sa tshong ba la zhugs te de de dag yongs su tshol ba sa skyo bar 'gyur la de dag ni ma rnyed do// de'i skabs
187a6(mdo sde): su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa 'am/ mi gzigs pa 'am/ mi rtogs pa 'am/ thugs su mi chud pa zhig ci yang med la/ sangs rgyas
187a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srang ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba/ zla med pa/ gnyis su
187a8(mdo sde): mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsul legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo ba
187b1(mdo sde): las rgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis ma 'jigs pa/ 
187b2(mdo sde): khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha
187b3(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa
187b4(mdo sde): ston pa/ mthar gyi snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkha das po/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogades bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/ brgya phrag
187b5(mdo sde): bcu pa la dbang byed pas kyang ches khyad par du 'phag sa pa rnam no tshwa nyid kyi nyin dus gsum mtshan dus ga sum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs
187b6(mdo sde): te/ su ni rgud/ su ni dar / su ni phongs shing 'dug/ su ni nyam nga bar 'gyur/ su ni gnod pa ldan/ su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ljon/ su ni ngan song du gzhol
187b7(mdo sde): su ni ngan song du 'bab/ su ni ngan song du bab/ su ni ngas ngan song las phyung ste/ mtho ris dang / thar pa dang / 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba
187b8(mdo sde): las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed
188a1(mdo sde): pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes
188a2(mdo sde): gzigs pa 'jug go// 'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas// dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid// gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la// sangs rgyas dus las
188a3(mdo sde): yol ba med// de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu phyi sa khung la phan gdags pa'i phyir snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ dge slong gi
188a4(mdo sde): tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ dge slong gri dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar nas yongs pa can du bsod snyoms dal gshegs pa dang / re shig na mthar gyis bsod
188a5(mdo sde): snyoms bskor te srang du gshegs na/ phyi sa khung yang / phan tshun 'khor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga 'greng ngo // de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
188a6(mdo sde): sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong
188a7(mdo sde): pos lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de'i mod la des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar byas
188a8(mdo sde): so// de dga' ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te sems can bdag cag lta bu yang
188b1(mdo sde): legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu 'byung ba mchis te/ chud par gyur na bdag kyang rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 
188b2(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal mkhyen pas/ de shin tu skal ba dang ldan par thugs su chud nas phyag glang po che'i sna lta bu gser gyi kha dog can brkang ste/ 
188b3(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong chur shog/ tshangs par sprad pa spyod cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa'i mdo la/ skra dang kha spu ni bregs nas/ 
188b4(mdo sde): zhag bdun lon pa tsam du gyur/ spyod lam ni bsnyen pa dararo rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa lta bur 'dug par gyur pa/ lag na ni lhung bzed dang chu snod thogs
188b5(mdo sde): par gyur to// 'dir smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur zhes bka' stsal pas/ de ni mgo breg sa lus la snam sbyar gyon// sangs rgyas kyi ni dgod
188b6(mdo sde): pas go bgos nas// mod la dbang po rab tu zhi bar gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yid la byed pa'i lung phog ste/ des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang / 
188b7(mdo sde): 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / lhung ba dang / rnam par 'thor
188b8(mdo sde): ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams/ 
189a1(mdo sde): gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta/ 
189a2(mdo sde): bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang bkus
189a3(mdo sde): bsti la rgyab kyi phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de dgra bcom pa nyid thob zin na yang
189a4(mdo sde): ngan pa la dga' bar gyur nas/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di lta ste/ nga'i dge slong phyis khung 'di ni nyan
189a5(mdo sde): thos kyi dge slong ngan ngan la mos pa rnams kyi mchog/ yin no// de na dge slong dag the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra
189a6(mdo sde): la zhus pa/ btsun pa gnas brtan phyi sa khung gis las ci bgyis nu des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
189a7(mdo sde): dag phyi sa khung nyid kyis sngon tshe rlabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing
189a8(mdo sde): bsags pa na/ phyis khung nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams
189b1(mdo sde): ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba
189b2(mdo sde): byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gis las rnams ni// bskal pa brgya
189b3(mdo sde): yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na// bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo
189b4(mdo sde): bzhi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshogs pa/ 'jig
189b5(mdo sde): rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas pa com ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba 'jig rten/ 
189b6(mdo sde): du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang mdzes lnga rngon zhes bya ba na rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe'i rgyal po'i pho brang der khyim bdag gcig gis gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs te/ 
189b7(mdo sde): der phyogs dang yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i dge slong dag 'ongs pa dang / 'gro ba dang gnas par sems so// gtsug lag khang de na so so'i skye bo'i dge slong zhig gnas
189b8(mdo sde): te/ de yang gnas la shin tu ser sna che ba zhig ste/ dge slong gsar bu 'ong ba rnams mthong na/ tshig pa za zhing 'khrug la gnod sems byed dode// zhul zhul por 'dug
190a1(mdo sde): cing 'khrug pa skyed par byed do// dge slong gang dag gtsug lag khang de nas gud du 'gro ba de dag mthong na ni// shas cher dga' zhing mchog tu dga' la skyel
190a2(mdo sde): zhing smra bar byed do// phyis re shig no ga zhig gi yul nas dge slong dgra bcom pa zhig 'ongs so// gtsug lag khang gi bdag po de yang phyir mi 'ong ba yin te/ des spyod
190a3(mdo sde): lam gyi sgo nas dgra bcom pa yin par shes so// de nas dga' ba skyes te/ phyid nyin dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas par cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus dang bshos la spyan drangs
190a4(mdo sde): so// dge slong gzhi ba de ni de na med pa las ra shag na med pa las re shig na phyid nyin cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus kyang phul/ bshos kyang bshams dang / dge slong
190a5(mdo sde): gzhi pa de yang 'ongs te/ de yang cho ga dang ldan pa'i khru sa sar song nas/ gtsug lag khang gi bdag po khyed ra ngasu byung ste/ dge slong gsar du 'ongs pa'i byi dor byed
190a6(mdo sde): cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // de nas de phrag dog skyes nas/ des sdang ba'i sems kyis ngag gi lus rtsub po smras te/ dge slong khyed ni lus mi gtsang bas byugs kyang bla'i/ sbyin bdag 'di
190a7(mdo sde): lta bu'i bsnyen bkur len pa ni de lta ma yin no zhes byas so// de nas dgra bcom pa des nyon mongs 'di las ches mi bzad pa skal pa can du 'gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas/ 
190a8(mdo sde): tsang mi zer bar dang du blangs so// re shig na tshogs par gyur te dro la bab pa na dge slong gzhi pa des dgra bcom pa la khyod kyis sdang ba'i sems bskrad do// zhes zer ba thos so// blo
190b1(mdo sde): nas kyang de 'gyod pa skyes so// de nas dge slong dgra bcom pa de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/ 'phags pa bdag gis khyod la tshig rtsub po smras pa de bzod pa gsol lo zhes byas so// 
190b2(mdo sde): de nas dgra bcom po des de'i dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' la 'phags nas cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to// de nas lhag par yang 'gyod pa skyes te/ des de'i
190b3(mdo sde): mdun du las kyi nyes pa de mthol zhing bshags te bshad kyis sbyangs so// 'on kyang des mthar thug pa'i ye shes bskrad ni ma nus so// de nas re shig na 'chi ba'i dus la
190b4(mdo sde): bab pa dang / des smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis dgra ba tsam po la sdang ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / ngag gi las rtsub po smras pa gang yin pa de'i las de'i rnam par smin
190b5(mdo sde): pa ni bdag gis myong bar ma gyur cig/ bdag gis pa/ spags pa dang / kha ton byas pa dang / sbyin pa dang s+thi na pa chen po dag byin pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen
190b6(mdo sde): bkur byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pa des ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'odas mnyes par byed par shog shig/ ces byas so// dge slong
190b7(mdo sde): dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong gzhi bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni phyi sa khung 'di nyid yin te/ des dgra bcom pa la ngag gi las rtsub po smras pa'i las kyi rna
190b8(mdo sde): par smin pa des na 'khor ba na sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa myong bar gyur te/ las de nyid kyi lhag ma lus pas/ de ltar srid pa tha ma la bab pa'i tshe yang 'di ltar dring zhing mchog
191a1(mdo sde): tu dring bar gyur la/ mi gtsang ba dang / sAg sdig la dga' bar gyur to// de nas kha ton byas pa dang / phung po la mkhas pa dang / khams la mkhas pa dang / 
191a2(mdo sde): skye mched la mkhas pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas pa des ni nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ nyon
191a3(mdo sde): mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya'o// de ci'i
191a4(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ phyi sa khung so so'i skye bor gyur pa'i nyes pa ga rang yin pa de dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / des dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta
191a5(mdo sde): bur 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces pa// 'i stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang lha dang lha ma yin
191a6(mdo sde): dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa mngon par bstod do// / 
191a7(mdo sde): rtogs pa brjod par brgya pa las/ sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa rdzogaso// // sdom ni/ sbrul nag dang ni zla ba dang // sA la dang ni dpal ldan ma// gos dang na tse
191a8(mdo sde): pho nya dang // ma ha dang ni gso sbyong dang / ngang pa tha mar brjod pa yin// sbrul nag po zhes bya ba ni// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / 
191b1(mdo sde): phyug po rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / dad dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / 
191b2(mdo sde): mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / kla dang / gnod sprin dang / lha ma yin dang / 
191b3(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal
191b4(mdo sde): zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang // sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'du dan dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan
191b5(mdo sde): da ka gnas pa rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'ikhab kyi grong khyer na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mngal longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing
191b6(mdo sde): rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig yod de/ de yang ser sA can 'jungs pa yo byad rnams kun tu 'dzin pa/ khA la yang
191b7(mdo sde): gtor ma mi ster ba zhig ste/ des dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sdug cing phongs pa dang / bklan pa dag mthong na sems sdang bar byed do// de nas des rang gi bskyed mos
191b8(mdo sde): tshal du gser dngul gyi phung po chen po spros te bzhag nas/ de de la chags te/ lhag par zhen bzhin du shi'o// de shi nas de nyid kyi steng du sbrul gdug pa sbrul nag po chen po
192a1(mdo sde): mi gdug pa zhig tu skyes so// de nas bskyed mos tshal der skye bo'i tshogs gang song ba de dag bltas pa tsam gyis gsod par byed do// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer
192a2(mdo sde): thog rtag tu yang che ge mo'i bskyed mos tshil du song ba de dog thams cad bsgog par 'gyur ro zhes sgra grag par gyur to// skye bo'i tshogs kyis kyang rgyal po gzugs can snying po
192a3(mdo sde): la gsol to// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma gtogs por de 'dul nus par gzhan su zhig yod snyam mo// de
192a4(mdo sde): nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po skye bo mang po'i 'a/ khor dang bcas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de/ ra song ste phyin na bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
192a5(mdo sde): bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// gas gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la chos kyi gtam gyi
192a6(mdo sde): yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do// chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang drag par bstan/ 
192a7(mdo sde): yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po stan las
192a8(mdo sde): langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das
192b1(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'di na bskyed mos tshal ga ge mo zhig na sbrul gdug pa sbrul nag po chen po chen po mig gdug pa zhig mchis te/ skye bo mang
192b2(mdo sde): po brlag par bgyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse bo'i slad du/ de gdul bar gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po lo cang mi
192b3(mdo sde): gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po// bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
192b4(mdo sde): 'tshal te/ stan las langs nas song ngo // de nas pa bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed
192b5(mdo sde): bsnams nas bskyed mos tshal ga la ba der gsheg/ sa te byon nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od gzer gser gyi kha dog can nyi ma stong gi 'od pas lhag
192b6(mdo sde): pa dag bkye ste/ de dag gis bskyed mos tshal de dag thams cad snang bar byas so// bskal pa stong gi bar yongs su bsgoms pa'i byams pa'i 'od zer dag kyang bkye ste/ 
192b7(mdo sde): de dag gis de'i lus la phog mo thag tu rab tu sim par gyur to// de nas sbrul gdug pa des phan tshun du bltas te/ su'i mthus bdag gi lus sim par gyur cig gu
