192b8(mdo sde): snyam pa dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas
193a1(mdo sde): pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong ma thag tu des bcom
193a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la dad pa'i seMs bskyed/ dad pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ bzhin bzang khyod nyid kyis rdzas 'di bsgrubs
193a3(mdo sde): pa des na khyod sbrul gdug por ltung bar byas so// da yang nga la dad pa'i sems skyed la gter 'di la yang sems ma chags par byas dang legs so// 'di nas shi 'u phos
193a4(mdo sde): nas kyang sems can dmyal bar skye ba re// de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de tshe rabs dran par mdzadad pa de'i tshe dro ngus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i
193a5(mdo sde): tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ khyod ni dud 'gror skyes pa la/ da ni nga yis ci byar med/ mi khom par ni skyes zin kyis// don med ngus pas ci la phan// 'dir ni
193a6(mdo sde): rgyal ba snying rje can// nga la dad pa'i sem bskad la// dud 'gro'i ske gnas spang na legs// 'on tang mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur// do nas re shig na bcom ldan 'das kyis sbrul de lhung bzang
193a7(mdo sde): kyi nang du bcug ste/ 'od ma'i tshal du bsdoms so// de'i skabs su rgyal po dang yul ma ga d+hA'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis sbrul gdug pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar btul ba thos
193a8(mdo sde): so// de nas sbal gdug pa de rang gi lus la smad de kha 'tshes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dgo' bar gyur te/ shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// 
193b1(mdo sde): lha'i bu 'am/ lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas sprul
193b2(mdo sde): gdug pa la sA shi 'pho so pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo // de nas sngon sbrul gdug par
193b3(mdo sde): gyur pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas bzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis bdag nag ma lon
193b4(mdo sde): par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o// snyam mo/ de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnam gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa lus do shal dang sa
193b5(mdo sde): mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod/ pan can/ lu sa gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang / smeg ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan
193b6(mdo sde): mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang pad+ma dang ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man da ra ba rnams kyis thub bkang ste/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa thams cad 'od chen pos
193b7(mdo sde): snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon sbrul gdug
193b8(mdo sde): par gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang / khams dang rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa ban rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de
194a1(mdo sde): thos nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des
194a2(mdo sde): bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig tu brjod pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi
194a3(mdo sde): sgo rnas bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyi/ rgyal pos
194a4(mdo sde): kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nad mi dang mnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi ma da tshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze
194a5(mdo sde): rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lagaso// yang smras pa/ 1sa pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin tu mi bzang khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan
194a6(mdo sde): mtho ris 'phro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal/ 
194a7(mdo sde): rgya mtsho pha rol rgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar
194a8(mdo sde): dka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni dang mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dgar gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas kyang
194b1(mdo sde): lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song // de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba
194b2(mdo sde): dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i
194b3(mdo sde): thuzung du song nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas te/ rgyal po bslang nas 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po longs nyal ti tsi bya/ de nas rgyal po sad
194b4(mdo sde): de 'od chen po de dang lha'i bu de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang / dga' zhing mgu ste khyod su zhig ces dris so// de na ra bdag ni bskyed mos tshal der bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul
194b5(mdo sde): gdug pa btul te shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yu la bzang por skyes pa yin te/ bcom ldan 'das la yang bdag gis bsnyen bkur byas nas bden pa mthong
194b6(mdo sde): bar gyur to// da bdag gis khyod la bstan kyis khyod song la/ bskyed mos tshal de'i phyogs ga ge mo zhig nas gter chen po phyung la bdag gi phyir bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi
194b7(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang bcas pa gshos gsol te/ yon gyi rabs kyang gdon par gsol cig/ de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos lha'i bu la cang mi zer bar khas blangs so// de nA
194b8(mdo sde): sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bus rgyal pos cang mi zer bas khas blangs par rig nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos de nyid kyi
195a1(mdo sde): mtshan mo yul ma ga d+ha'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / yul mi rnams la bsgo nas bskyed mos tshal der song ste gter phyung nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi
195a2(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum gyi bar du gshos gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bus las gang dag bgyi
195a3(mdo sde): na des sbrul gdug par skyes lags/ las gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes nas bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de shas cher
195a4(mdo sde): chags pa bskyed de/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / snu dag cing phongs pa dang / bkren pa rnams la sdang ba de'i sems bskyed pa des ni sbrul gdug par skyes so// nga la
195a5(mdo sde): sems dga' bar byas pa des ni lha'i nang du skyes su// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungagi ring la dge bsnyen du gyur te/ skyabs su song ba dang / 
195a6(mdo sde): bslab pa'i gzhi blangs pa des ni bden pa mthong bar gyur to// rgyal po chen po de bas na ser sna spang ba'i phyir brtson par bya ste/ ci nas sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i nyes pa de lta
195a7(mdo sde): bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / de nyid lha'i bur gyur pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs de dag lta bur 'gyur bar rgyal po khyod kyis bslab par bya'o// de nas rgyal po gzugs can
195a8(mdo sde): snying po bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal ste/ stan las langs nas song ngo / 
195b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // zla ba zhes bya
195b2(mdo sde): ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams
195b3(mdo sde): dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur
195b4(mdo sde): sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mnga' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnam
195b5(mdo sde): kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'a/ ngas bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos
195b6(mdo sde): dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sprin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
195b7(mdo sde): so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chugs
195b8(mdo sde): nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa skye bo thams cad kyi mig sim par byed pa zhig btsas so// de yang bram ze
196a1(mdo sde): des dka' ba rnyes pa yin te/ de la bu dang bu mo gzhan yang med nas/ de bskyed bsrings te phyir skyes nas/ de 'jig rten thams cad sim par byed pa'i phyir bram
196a2(mdo sde): ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis khye'u de'i ming zla ba zhes btags so// de nas bram ze'i khye'u zla ba grong khyer thams cad du borgyud de bskor bas bram ze de yang khye'u de la lhag par byams
196a3(mdo sde): par gyur te/ 'chag pa dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dag gi tshe yang rtag tu legs par bsrung ba lhung byed cing 'dug go// bram ze de khyim bdag mgon med zas sprin dang nyo ba zhig
196a4(mdo sde): na 'dug go// de nas bram ze'i khye'u de khyim bdag mgon ma/ dad zas sbyin dang bsten nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung thos nas/ nges
196a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed de/ de yangatshe thung ste shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas
196a6(mdo sde): ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang / 
196a7(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par des mthong ngo // de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam
196a8(mdo sde): du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod pacom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gis cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i
196b1(mdo sde): phyir 'gro'o// snyam mo// de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul pa thogs pa lus do shal dang / se mo ngos brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis brgyan
196b2(mdo sde): pa'i cod pan can lus gur kum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / sprig ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da
196b3(mdo sde): dang rtapad+ma dkar po dang / mon da ra ba rnams kyis thub bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor/ 
196b4(mdo sde): te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga dar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal
196b5(mdo sde): dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud na/ 'phag po'o ba den pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos pa stan te/ de thos nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bus
196b6(mdo sde): 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthen po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum
196b7(mdo sde): du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskamA pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / 
196b8(mdo sde): mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la bas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang
197a1(mdo sde): ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi markun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze
197a2(mdo sde): rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ljon mtho ris
197a3(mdo sde): 'gro ba 'phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya
197a4(mdo sde): mtsho'i pha rol rgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go/ da'aphang thob// mi mchog dbang po lha dang mis mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa stong
197a5(mdo sde): du mthong bar dka' ba yis// thub pa khyod ni dang mthonga'abras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' 'gyu/ ra to// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nA/ 
197a6(mdo sde): dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul mthong // de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal
197a7(mdo sde): bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid
197a8(mdo sde): kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong dag ni srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen pos
197b1(mdo sde): 'byung ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ 
197b2(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ma mdzad
197b3(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi bram ze'i
197b4(mdo sde): bu cig pa de tshe thung ste shi nA de nga las sems dga' ba gyur te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang po dar skyes nas/ de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ ngas de
197b5(mdo sde): la chos bstan nas/ bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song ngo // de'i skabs su bram zedes bu gcig pa sdug cig phangs la snying du sdug
197b6(mdo sde): cing yid du 'ong ba dang / bzod pa dang ldan pa dang / mi mthun pa med pa de dur khrod du khyer nas pa nga bar bzhag sa/ kyi hud bu/ kyi hud bu thu bo// kyi hud bu gcig pa zhes zer/ 
197b7(mdo sde): zhing 'bod de/ de'i nye du rnams kyis de ltar bcug kyang bslang ma nus nas/ de khwa dang chun lag dang / bya rgod dang / wa rnams kyis ni bskor/ bud med ska bshig pa dag dang
197b8(mdo sde): ni 'grogs// skye bo mang pos ni blta zhing 'dug go// de nas de'i bu lhar skyes pas/ pha smre sngags 'don pa mthong nas/ snying rjes snying bskyod de/ pha'i mya ngan bsal ba'i
198a1(mdo sde): phyir bdag nyid drang srong gi cha lugs su sprul nas/ dur khrod kyi 'dab du dka' thub lnga byed cing 'dug go// de nas bram ze des drang srong de dris pa/ kye drang srong chen po
198a2(mdo sde): khyod dka' thub 'dis ci zhig sgrub/ drang srong gis smras pa/ ngi ni rgyal srid sgrub ste/ nga'i gser gyi shing rta rin po che sna tshogs kyis smras pa/ nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis kyis shing rta'i
198a3(mdo sde): 'khor lo byas la/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhis ni mdun nas 'dren te/ shing rta de la ngazhon zhing sa chen po 'di bskor bar 'dod do// bram zes smras pa/ gal te lo brgya tham pa'i bar rgyun
198a4(mdo sde): tu dka' thub spyad byas te/ dkara' thub mchog gis spyad bya/ des kyang // gnas de khyod kyis re mi 'thob// drang srong dgis smras pa/ khyod kyang shi ba'i khog pa mchog tu gan
198a5(mdo sde): zhing mi gtsang ba'i ro// shing 'dra bar gyur pa 'dis ci na ga sgrub// bram zes smras pa/ sdug pa'i bu cig pa shi ste de sgrub bo// drang srong gis smras pa/ gal te
198a6(mdo sde): brgya tham pa'i bar// rgyun tu ngu ba'i las byas kyang // bu de khyod kyis re mi mthob// khyod ni dus kyang ci la phan// de nas bram ze de drang srong gi tshig bden no snyam nas dad pa skyes so// / 
198a7(mdo sde): dad pa skyes nas khyod su zhig ces bya'o// de nas drang srong go cha lugs de mi snang bar byas nas/ rang gi cha lugs su 'dug ste pha la smras pa/ bdag ni khyod kyi bu cig pa de yin te/ 
198a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur nas shi ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ khyod kyi mya ngan bsal ba'i phyir 'dir 'ongs so// yab khyod tshur spyon
198b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su bcud cig dang / khyod kyang 'khor ba las 'da' bar 'gyur yang srid do// de nas bram ze des shi ba'i rus bu bor nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba drer srong
198b2(mdo sde): ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'phags pa'i bden
198b3(mdo sde): pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bston pa mdzad de/ de thos nas bram ze des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu
198b4(mdo sde): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// des mtho bar gyur pa thob cing rnyed pa thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zha/ dbas la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bsgom
198b5(mdo sde): ba byas te song ngo // de nas dge slong the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu 'dis
198b6(mdo sde): 'di ltar pha mya ngan bsal nas bden pa mthong ba la yang bzhag pa gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'dis bden pa mthong nas/ 
198b7(mdo sde): pha yongasu bskabs pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod/ 'dis ni 'das pa'i dus na so so'i skye bor 'dug pa'i tshe yang pha bsad pa la thug pa las lan gsum skabs byas te/ 
198b8(mdo sde): legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'ongs pa'i dus na/ grong khyer bA ra na si na gzhan gyi chung ma la byi ba byed pa zhig yod de/ de'i
199a1(mdo sde): bu ni dad pa dang ldan pa dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba mi rnams shin tu 'drang ba zhig go// de nas re shig na de'i phas rkun po byas nas rgyal pos gshed ma rnams la sod cig
199a2(mdo sde): ces bsgo'o// de nas bus lan gsum gyi bar du rgyal po la gsol nas srog phangs pa byin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na
199a3(mdo sde): gzhan gyi chung ma la bya ba byed pa gang yin pa de ni bram ze 'di yin no// byi ba byed pa'i bu de ni bram ze'i khye'u 'di yin no// dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das las ci
199a4(mdo sde): zhig bgyis na des pheM dang bu gnyis ga bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa // yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring
199a5(mdo sde): la gnyi ga dge bsnyen du gyur te/ skyabs su song ba dang // bslab pa'i gzhi blangs pas na de'i phyir de ltar bde na pa mthong bar gyur to// dge slong dag de bas na 'du
199a6(mdo sde): byed thams cad mi rtag pa dang / chos thams cad bdag med pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o snyam du mya ngan las 'das pa la 'bad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar
199a7(mdo sde): bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / lha dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la
199a8(mdo sde): sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / sA la zhes bya ba ni// sangs rgyas bcom lda
199b1(mdo sde): 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang
199b2(mdo sde): klu rnams dang / gnod sprin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar
199b3(mdo sde): byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang // lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am tsi dang / lto'i phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing
199b4(mdo sde): shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams// chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman
199b5(mdo sde): zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sprin gyi kun dga' ra ba na
199b6(mdo sde): bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod par sA la gcog pa zhes bya ba'i dus ston byung ste/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du ma 'dus nas/ shing sA la'i me tog blangs te/ rtse zhing dga'
199b7(mdo sde): la dga' dgur spyod do// de nas re shig na tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig gis sA la'i me tog blangs te/ mnyan du yod pa'i nang du song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyang dge slong gi tshogs
199b8(mdo sde): kyi zham ring byas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/ mnyan du yod par bsod bsnyoms mdzad de slar gshegs nas/ bu mo des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku
200a1(mdo sde): / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong
200a2(mdo sde): pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dga' ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la sA la'i me tog gis gtor to// 
200a3(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas te/ phyir log nas khyim du dgos pa'i phyir yang gzhan dag blang ngo snyam po dang / re shig na de sA la'i shing la mdzegs pa las lhung
200a4(mdo sde): ste shi n+da sa/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya nges pas/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang poskyes so// de nas re shig na lus dang gnal med khang
200a5(mdo sde): sA la'i me tog gis brgyan te/ lha'i mdun sa'i nang du song ngo // de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i mdun sa chos bzang na lha'i tshogs kyi nang na sangs rgyas
200a6(mdo sde): dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi sngags pa brjod cing 'dug pa las lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ lha'i bu mo lus dang gzhal med khang sA la'i me tog gis brgyan pa/ dge ba'i
200a7(mdo sde): rtsa ba 'bar ba de mthong ngo // mthing nas kyang de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ci'i phyir/ khyod kyis lus mdog dag pa'i gser 'dra pad+ma ud pa la lta bur gyur/ 'di na
200a8(mdo sde): lus dpal mtshungs med khyod kyi lus las 'od 'byung 'di dag ci las gyur/ ci yi phyir na khyod kyi bzhin mdog pad+ma rgyas 'dra gser mdog lta bur gyur/ las rnams gang gis
200b1(mdo sde): 'bras bu myong gyur 'di ni lha mo khyod kyis bdag la spos// lha mos smras pa/ mtshan mchog dag gis rgyas pa yi// mi yi nyi mnyan thos bcas// sA la'i me tog rdul med pa// bzang po dag gi
200b2(mdo sde): legs par gtor// las dag de 'dra byas pa'i phyir// bdag ni lhag par mngon du mdzes// bzhin mdog pad+ma zla ba ltar// rnam dag 'od ldan blta na sdug/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ kye ma yon
200b3(mdo sde): tan nyid kyi zhing // nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa// mtho ris sdug par skye ba'i phyir// de la khyod kyis sa bon btab// bzhin mdzes pad+ma'i 'dab ma yangs pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan ma// bud
200b4(mdo sde): med mchog rnams kyis ni gang la bkur bsdu byas pa yi// sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa'i mdab yangs 'dra ba'i spya na mnga' ba// gser mchog phung po lta bur mdangs dkar
200b5(mdo sde): de la su mi mchod// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa na chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gtsu mi skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos// gang du skyes/ 
200b6(mdo sde): las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas mi los shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa dri mthong
200b7(mdo sde): ngo// de nas lha'i bu mo de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis// bdag zhag me lon par bcom ldan
200b8(mdo sde): 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas lha'i bu mo rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis
201a1(mdo sde): brgyan pa'i cod pa can/ lus gur kum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / sprig ka la sogs byugs pa de lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag du mas g.yog byas nas de nyid kyi mtshan mo
201a2(mdo sde): sA la'i me tog gi gzhal med khang de nyid dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor to// chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan
201a3(mdo sde): 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu mo de'i bsam pa dang / bgra la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
201a4(mdo sde): rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos na sa lha'i bu mo des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo med rnon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
201a5(mdo sde): 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshe/ ga lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'a/ ngas kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams
201a6(mdo sde): pa dang / rus pa'i la bskal ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag
201a7(mdo sde): la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis// dge sbyong
201a8(mdo sde): dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan
201b1(mdo sde): mtho ris 'gro ba phye mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thos// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol
201b2(mdo sde): rgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs na// srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yis thub pa khyod ni de
201b3(mdo sde): mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' 'gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul
201b4(mdo sde): song // de nas lha'i bu mo de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang // zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du
201b5(mdo sde): 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong dag ni srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur
201b6(mdo sde): byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan
201b7(mdo sde): 'das ci lags/ ma dang gsum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du/ mchis lags
201b8(mdo sde): sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin
202a1(mdo sde): bu mo gang gis lam khar me tog gis gtor ba de khyod kyis mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// de ni nga la sems dga' ba bskyed nas shi ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum
202a2(mdo sde): pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas de nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par
202a3(mdo sde): bya ste/ ston pa la bkur bsti bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mo bya'o// mchod pa bya'o// ston pa la bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o// zhes
202a4(mdo sde): dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dang de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
202a5(mdo sde): pa la mngon par bstod do// / bam po bcu gsum pa// dpal ldan ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / 
202a6(mdo sde): blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod
202a7(mdo sde): sprin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas// mchod
202a8(mdo sde): pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sprin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
202b1(mdo sde): bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ 
202b2(mdo sde): rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po gzugs can snying po rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor
202b3(mdo sde): pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang nang 'jug dang /  rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad
202b4(mdo sde): rnamams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shi ngu dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ ga danod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la/ bu cig pa la bya bzhin
202b5(mdo sde): du rgyal srid bskangs so// de nas gang gi tshe rgyal po ga zugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das las bdenapa mthong ba de'i tshe/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te dus
202b6(mdo sde): gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro'o// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po phyi zhig na dpyid kyi dus la bab pa'i tshe/ shing ljon pa rnams me tog rgyas la ngang pa dang / 
202b7(mdo sde): khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i nags khrod na skyed mos tshal gyi sar btsun mo dam pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor
202b8(mdo sde): dang bcas te dong nas/ der btsun mo'i 'khor gyis rgyal po la gsol pa/ lha bdag cag ni gdugs cig bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchi ba'i rngo ma thog na/ lha btsun mo'i/ 
203a1(mdo sde): 'khor gyi nang 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten brtsigs te zhal bsro bar ci gnang / 'on tang bdag cag gis de la rgyun tu mar me dang / bdug pa
203a2(mdo sde): dang / me tog dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bkur bsti bgyi'o zhes gsol to// de nas re shig na rgyal po gzugs
203a3(mdo sde): can snying pos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la dbu skra dang / sen mo stsal du gsol/ 'on tang bdag gis mchis brang 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
203a4(mdo sde): mchod rten brtsigs te zhal bsro bar bgyi'o// zhes gso dal to// de nas ro shig na bcom ldan 'das kyis da bu skra dang / sen mo byin nas rgyal po gzugs can
203a5(mdo sde): snying po btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pas btsun mo'i 'kho/ ra gyi nang du bkur bsti chen po dang ldan pas/ de ba zhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten
203a6(mdo sde): brtsigs te zhal bsros nas de la btsun mo'i 'khor gyis mar me dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / spos dge me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan
203a7(mdo sde): ngag gis kyang mchod pa byed do// de nas gang gi tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra lhas sbyin gyis sprad de/ yab chos dang ldan pa chos bzhin du rgyal po byed pa bsad nas rang rgyal por
203a8(mdo sde): zhugs pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la sbyin por bya ba'i chos thams cad bcad de/ su yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la bkur bsti ma byed cig ces
203b1(mdo sde): khrim kyang bcas so// de nas gang gi tshe tshes bco lnga la skabs 'byed pa'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe/ dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten de la su yang phyag dar byed pa 'am/ mar me
203b2(mdo sde): dang / gdug pa dang / me tog 'bul ba med do// de nas btsun mo'i 'khor gyis dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten de de lta bur gyur pa yang mthong / rgyal po gzugs can
203b3(mdo sde): snying po yang dran nas snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing kyi hud chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po dang bral bas bdag cag bsod nams las 'gribs so// zhes 'dzer to// de'i nang nas btsun
203b4(mdo sde): mo dpal ldan ma zhes bya ba des rang gi srog dang bsngos da te sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas/ dbu skra dang son mo'i mchod rten la phyag dar byas te/ 
203b5(mdo sde): mar me'i phreng ba dngar to// de nas re shig na rgyal po ma skyes dgra khang pa brtsegs pa'i steng du byung ste// snang ba chen po de mthong nas 'di ci zhig ces dris pa
203b6(mdo sde): dang / re shig na gzhan zhig gis dpal ldan mas dbu skra dang se mo'i mchod rten la mar me'i 'phreng ba dang ra ba lags so// zhes byas so// de nas dpal ldan ma bkug ste
203b7(mdo sde): ci'i phyir khyod kyis rgyal po'i bka' bcag ces smras na/ de na re bdag gis khyod kyi bka' bcag du lags kyang / bdag gis chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po gzugs can
203b8(mdo sde): snying po'i bka' ma bcag go zhes zer ro// de nas de khros nas 'khor lo 'phangs te bsad do// dan bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum
204a1(mdo sde): pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// de'i tshe lha'i mdun ma zhig kyang 'dus nas/ lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma lha'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sdang ba khor khor yug tu dpag nang
204a2(mdo sde): gcig yod pa dang ldan pa de lha'i mdun mo'i nang du song ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis snang ba chen po de dang lha'i 'od dpag tshad gcig pa mthong nas dris pa/ ci'i phyir
204a3(mdo sde): khyod kyi lus mdog dag pa'i gser 'dra pad+ma ud pa la lta bur gyur// 'di na lus dpal mtshungs med khyod kyi lus las 'od 'byung 'di dag ci las gyur// ci yi phyir na khyod
204a4(mdo sde): kyis lus las 'od 'byung 'di dag ci las gyur// / ci yi phyir na khyod kyi bzhin mdog pad+ma rgyas 'dra gser mdog lta bur gyur// las rnams gang gi 'bras
204a5(mdo sde): bu myong gyur 'di ni lha mo khyod kyis bdag la smros/ lha mos smras pa/ 'jig rten gsum mgon 'gro ba 'i sgron cig pa// mtshan mchog rnams kyis phyug pa'i
204a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mthong // sgra mchog nyon mongs mun pa sel ba la// mun pa sel ba'i mang me yon du phul// zla ba'i 'od zer mchog dang 'dra ba'i 'od// mthong nas thub la snying
204a7(mdo sde): nas dad pa bskyed// 'od zer mthong nas dga' bar gyur pa yis// ston pa smra ba'i mchog la phyag kyang bgyis// las dge de 'dra byas pa'i phyir// bdag ni lhag par mngon
204a8(mdo sde): du mdzes// bzhin mdog pad+ma zla ba ltar// rnam dag 'od ldan blta na sdug/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ kye ma yon tan nyid kyi zhing // nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa// mtho
204b1(mdo sde): ris sdug par skye ba'i phyir// de la khyod kyis sa bon btab/ bzhin mdzes pad+ma'i mdab ma yangs pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan ma// bud med mchog rnams kyis ni gang la bkur bsti byas pa ni// sangs rgyas
204b2(mdo sde): pad+ma rgyas po'i med pa yangs 'dra ba'i spyan mnga' ba// gser mchog phung po lta bur mdangs dkar de la su mi mchod// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid
204b3(mdo sde): kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas mi las shi'i phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
204b4(mdo sde): lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'daras la sems dga' bar gyur par des mthong ngo // de nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag
204b5(mdo sde): zhag lon nas gzod pocom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zha/ ga ma lon par bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam/ 
204b6(mdo sde): de nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma lha'i 'od kyi snang bas gang ba dos de nyid kyi mtshan mo me tog ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mud ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man de ra ba rnams kyis thub bkang
204b7(mdo sde): ste/ rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan da ka gnas pa thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
204b8(mdo sde): 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs
205a1(mdo sde): / par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan mas/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
205a2(mdo sde): bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas/ dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / 
205a3(mdo sde): ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal
205a4(mdo sde): pos kyang ma bgyis lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi de dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams
205a5(mdo sde): kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so// yang smras gnyis pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ shin tu mi bzang khyod kyis mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rob ldan mtho ris 'gro ba
205a6(mdo sde): phye/ mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas 'thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal// 'phags pa
205a7(mdo sde): dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang 'thob// mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// sku dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu
205a8(mdo sde): yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul so// de nas lha'i
205b1(mdo sde): bu mo dpal ldan ma chod pa khe spogs phyin pa/ zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan
205b2(mdo sde): 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong dag ni srong dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'dra
205b3(mdo sde): kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po
205b4(mdo sde): tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du ma chis legs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
205b5(mdo sde): dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la ba lta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi// rgyal po gzugs can
205b6(mdo sde): snying po'i btsun mo dpal ldan ma zhes bya bas rang gi srog dang spos te/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas de bzhin gsheg pa'i bsku dang sen mo mi chod la ma rje'i phreng ba dar nas/ rgyal po
205b7(mdo sde): ma skyes dgra khros pas bsad de// de nga la dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas shi ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas de mdangs sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te ngas de la chos
205b8(mdo sde): bston nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ston po la bkur bsti bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mo bya'o// mchod pa bya/ 
206a1(mdo sde): ston pa la bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas// mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das
206a2(mdo sde): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yang rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // gos shes bya ba ni sangs rgyas
206a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug pa rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnam
206a4(mdo sde): dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yi na rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur
206a5(mdo sde): bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / kA dang / gnod sprin dang / lha ma yin dang // nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
206a6(mdo sde): rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan po/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyan gsos dang / sman zong rnams
206a7(mdo sde): brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas gang gi tshe khyim
206a8(mdo sde): bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal phul te/ mthar kyis gser bye ba phrag brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan
206b1(mdo sde): pa la phul ba de'i tshe/ de'i blo skyes pa ma la bdag sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing / bsod nams dag byed pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod kyis bdag gis skye bo dbul po rnams la phan gdags
206b2(mdo sde): pa'i phyir mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams dad pa bsdus te/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la snyen bkur bya'o// de ltar byas pa dang bdag gis ske
206b3(mdo sde): bo mang po la yang phan btags par 'gyur la/ bsod nams mang po yang bsnyad par 'gyur ro// snyam mo// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sprin gyis ji ltar bsams pa de rgyalo
206b4(mdo sde): po la gsol nas/ rgyal pos kyang mnyan du yod pa tham das cad du drol bsgrags te mnyan du yod pa na gan das pa'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi khyed rnams nyon cig/ deng nas
206b5(mdo sde): zhag bdun khyim bdag mgon med zas sprin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi phyir glang po che la zhon te dad pa sdud par 'dod kyis khyed gang gis ji
206b6(mdo sde): tsam yongs su gtang bar bya ba de yongasu gtang bar gyis shig ces bsgo'o// de nas re shig na zhag bdun lon pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sprin glang po che la zhon te/ de bzhin
206b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi phyir dad pa sdud pa la zhugs te/ der gang dag la ji tsam badrog pa de dag de tsam sbyin par byed do// kha cig na 'gul gyi do shal sbyin par byed/ kha
206b8(mdo sde): cig ni gdub bu sbyin par byed de/ kha cig ni dpung rgyan sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni gser gyi 'phreng ba sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni so rngub kyi rgyan sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni mu
207a1(mdo sde): tig gi do shAlnga sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni gser sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni dngul sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni zin no'i brgyad cha tsam yang sbyin par bye'o// khyim bdag de yang
207a2(mdo sde): gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyir len par byed do// de nas re shi gau ni bud med shin tu dbul mo zhig gi sha thang ste/ zla ba gsum gyis ras yug cig rnyed nas/ des ras de gyon
207a3(mdo sde): te/ srang du zhugs pa dang / des khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dung 'bud cing rnga ldum rdung bzhin du rgyang nas 'ong ba mthong nas/ des dge bsnyen zhig la dris pa/ ji ste khyim
207a4(mdo sde): bdag 'di phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ste/ gter de sa'i 'og tu sbas pa rnams kyang mthong na/ ci'i phyir 'di gzhan gyi khyim nas slong zhing bskor bar byed
207a5(mdo sde): ces byas pa dang / dge bsnyen de na re gzhan la phan gdag sa pa'i phyir te/ gang dag bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol mi
207a6(mdo sde): nus pa de dag gi don tu phan 'dogs par byed de/ ci nas mang po bsdongs te/ bcom ldan 'das la dbul du bcug go zhes zer ro// de nas bu mo de'i blo skyes pa 'o na bdag
207a7(mdo sde): ni bsod nams ma byas pa yin la bdag gcig pus bcom ldan 'das nyen thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol ba'i mthu bdag la med kyis/ bdag gis 'di la cung
207a8(mdo sde): zad dbul bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas bdag nyid la ci bdog ces bltas na ras yug cig ma gtogs pa gzhan ci yang ma mthong ste/ des bsams pa gal te
207b1(mdo sde): bdag 'di ni 'dug bzhin du ras 'di phul na ni bdag gcer bur 'byung gis bdag khang thog tu song la ras dor ro snyam mo// de nas de khang thog tu song nas rang gi lus las ras phud de/ khyim
207b2(mdo sde): bdag mgon med zas spyan gyi steng du bor ba dang / khyim bdag des kyang 'phrigs te/ 'dis kha thog nas bor ba las na 'di la nor de las med gor ma chag snyam nas/ rang gi g.yog
207b3(mdo sde): rnams la sgo ba khyed dong lo ras 'di sus bor bltos shig ces byas nas/ de dag gis bltas pa dang / re shig na bu mo de tsog tsog por 'dug pa mthong ngo // de nas de dag
207b4(mdo sde): gis dris pa dang / de na re bcom ldan 'das kyis yon tan brjod pa/ bdag gis thos nas dbul ba'i 'jigs pa dasas skrag ste/ bdag gis rnyed pa de de bzhin gshegs
207b5(mdo sde): pa la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul lo zhes ze/ ra ro// de nas de dag gis khyim bdag mgon med za sa sprin la byas so// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas
207b6(mdo sde): sprin mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bu mo de la gos dang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs bskon to// de nas de tshe thung ste shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum po'i lha yul bzang por skyes te/ skyes ma thag tu
207b7(mdo sde): lha'i bu mo gzhan su la'ang med pa de lta bu'i gos dag de la byung ngo // lha'i bu'i lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ 
207b8(mdo sde): gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyamo// de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum lha yul bzang po skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la ras phul bar des mthong ngo // de nas sngon
208a1(mdo sde): / ras 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo rnamag du bkord dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/ lus do shal dang / se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can lum rku
208a2(mdo sde): gum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / smig ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man dar ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang / 
208a3(mdo sde): ste rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas
208a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo dbasam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang ba bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtog
208a5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de zos nas sngon ras la bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mos 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun
208a6(mdo sde): tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste// des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod do// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba
208a7(mdo sde): dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams btsad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis// mas kyang ma bgyis// rgyal
208a8(mdo sde): pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshan rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis
208b1(mdo sde): lags so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang po ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin tu mi bzang khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thog/ 
208b2(mdo sde): bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la brtan nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// mi mchog dpa' bo
208b3(mdo sde): mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar bka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/ btud cing
208b4(mdo sde): zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ dgra thub la ni bskor ba byasanas kyang / lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song // de nas nga sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo de chong pa khe spogs
208b5(mdo sde): phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul/ las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa ba zhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ong/ 
208b6(mdo sde): pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong dag ni srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen pos byung
208b7(mdo sde): ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci legs/ mdang sum mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin
208b8(mdo sde): nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ 
209a1(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin te/ ras 'bul 'bul ba'i bud med de/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dad pa/ 
209a2(mdo sde): sdud par byed pa la ras phul nas shi ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul babang por skyes nas/ de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar 'gyur te/ 
209a3(mdo sde): rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun rnams la bkur bsti bya'o// bkur bsti med par mi bya'o// dge slong khyed
209a4(mdo sde): kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ dbacom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod// 
209a5(mdo sde): ne tso zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal lo rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon
209a6(mdo sde): rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am tsa rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams
209a7(mdo sde): kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sprin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am tsi dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i
209a8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang // zhal zas dang // gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dag
209b1(mdo sde): 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po gzugs can snying po
209b2(mdo sde): rgyal po byed/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun
209b3(mdo sde): dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sa lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal
209b4(mdo sde): srid bsnyungs so// rgyal po de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge de zhing bsam pa bzang ba dang / bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan da la phan pa la zhugs te/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ga/ chos
209b5(mdo sde): 'dod po che ba skye dgu la byams pa zhig go// de nas re shig/ na bcom ldan 'das mthong bar smon te/ lag pa la oM tshugs bcas nas/ sems khongasu chud cing 'dug// de
209b6(mdo sde): nas blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ ci slad du thugs ngan mdzad/ rgyal pos smras gangs bcom ldan 'das ring zhig ma mthong ngo // ngas bde bar gshegs pa ring zhig ma mthong ngo // 
209b7(mdo sde): nga ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'dod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyin par gnas pa la zhugs pas/ lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas rgyal po gzugs can snying po smon/ 
209b8(mdo sde): pa gsan to// de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa 'am/ mi gzigs pa 'am/ mi rtogs pa 'am/ thugs su mi chud pa zhig ci yang med la
210a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' gazla med pa/ gnyisu mi gsung / 
210a2(mdo sde): bzhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i bzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/ 
210a3(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang
210a4(mdo sde): dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ yan lag lnga rna ma par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das/ pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs
210a5(mdo sde): pa/ rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gi phyug pa/ lam yan la ga brgyad pa stong pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
210a6(mdo sde): 'jug pa dgu la gnas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa phyogs bcur grags pas kun rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos
210a7(mdo sde): nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni rgud/ su ni dar/ su ni phongs shing 'dug/ su ni nyams nga bar gyur/ su ni gnod
210a8(mdo sde): pa dang nyams nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol/ su ni ngan song du 'bag/ su ni ngan song du bag/ su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/ mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhan
210b1(mdo sde): pa byan su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du byid pa las lag nas drang bar bya// su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya// su ni dge ba'i
210b2(mdo sde): rtsa ba rnams ma bskrad pa lnga bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya// su ni yongasu smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ya shas gzigs pa 'jug
210b3(mdo sde): go/ 'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas// dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid// gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la// sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med// de nas bcom ldan 'das
210b4(mdo sde): rgyal po gzugs can snying po la phan gdags pa'i phyir byar zla gsum 'das nas/ chos gos mdzad de/ chos gos zi nu nas chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsdams nas ljongs
210b5(mdo sde): rgyu zhing mthar kyis gshegs pa las nags khrod cig/ tu byon pa dang / nags khrod de na ne tse mi skad shes pa ni/ ga gnas te/ des bcom ldan 'das thag ring po zhig nas
210b6(mdo sde): mthong ngo // de nas shin tu rings par song ste/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so legs so// bdag la phan
210b7(mdo sde): gdags su gsol// nags khrod 'di kho nar gshegs dgongs gdab par gsol zhes byaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das ne tse de la phan gdags pa'i phyir shing gang la ne tse gnas pa de'i
210b8(mdo sde): drung du rtsa'i gdan bting nas skyil krung bcas te bzhugs so// nyan thos chen po rnams ni shing gzhan dag gi drung du 'khod do// nane tse bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos rnams la mi 'am mi ma yin pa
211a1(mdo sde): 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ yi dgas sam/ gcan zan gnod pa byed du dogs te/ mtshan thog thag nags khrod de na phan tshun bskor ba byed do// de nas nam nangs pa dang / bcom
211a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bzod pa gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa lags pa/ bdag la so ldan 'das mchod pa'i rgyu ci yang ma mchis
211a3(mdo sde): na bzod pa mdzad du gsol// de lta lags kyis kyang bdag sngon du mchis te/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po la bcom ldan 'das gshegs so zhes sbran par 'tshal lo// bco
211a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar gyis shig/ de nas raM shig na de bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon du chas te/ mthar gyis rgyal po'i thad du phyin to// de'i tshe rgyal po gzugs can
211a5(mdo sde): snying po khang bzangs kyi steng na bud med 'ba' shig dang sil/ snyan gyis rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de nas ne tse mi skad shes pa des rgyal po la smras pa/ kye rgyan
211a6(mdo sde): po khyod mkhyen par mdzod cig/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyod kyi yul du gshegs lags kyis/ lha khyed kyis bshos lta gon mdzad pa'i rigs so// zhes
211a7(mdo sde): bya so// de nas rgyal po shin tu ridri par khang bzad kyi steng nas babs nas blon po chen po'i tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan rnams bshams nas/ gdugs
211a8(mdo sde): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bkur
211b1(mdo sde): sti chen po dang ldan pas nang du sman drangs nas zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas so// de nas ne tse de 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi 'byor pa 'di dag
211b2(mdo sde): thams cad ni bdag gi yon tan yin no snyam du rig nas dga' zhing mgu yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas rgyal po'i mdun logs su phan tshun du lding ba las
211b3(mdo sde): khras khyer te bsad do// bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba skyed de shi bas ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis
211b4(mdo sde): sems rnams gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes mnyam mo// de nas da dud 'gro las sho'i 'phos pa dang / sum cu gsum pa'i lha yul
211b5(mdo sde): bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dag 'a bar gyur pa des mthong ngo // de nas sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nA
211b6(mdo sde): gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyi/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o// snyam mo// de nas sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha
211b7(mdo sde): gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis rgyan pa'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / sprig ka
211b8(mdo sde): la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu de dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man da ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byad
212a1(mdo sde): kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bco
212a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan
212a3(mdo sde): te/ de thos nas sngo ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas/ 
212a4(mdo sde): dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom lda na 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskam/ sa pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnam
212a5(mdo sde): bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni ba dag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal
212a6(mdo sde): pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge slong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lagaso// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por
212a7(mdo sde): ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ shin tu mi bzang khyod kyis thu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spang
212a8(mdo sde): ba'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la rten nas thob// bdag na sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang
212b1(mdo sde): rga dang mchi ba'i nang spangs pa/ srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yis// thub pa khyod ni dang mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dgar gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// ngagra/ 
212b2(mdo sde): thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // lha yi 'jig rten khwa ltas b+ha yul song // de nas sngon tse gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las
212b3(mdo sde): rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bac+doMs kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnasu song // dge slong dag ni srong dang tho rangs ma nyal bar brtson
212b4(mdo sde): pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thadu snang ba chen po byung ba mthong // mthong nas kyang the tso/ dam skyes te/ sangs rgyas bac+doMs la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das
212b5(mdo sde): ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bac+doM sa lo blta ba'i slad du mchis legs sam/ bcom ldan 'das
212b6(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yi no// ne tse gang gis nags khrod
212b7(mdo sde): der nub mo'i dgongs mal la spyan drangs pa de khyed kyis de mthong ngam/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag
212b8(mdo sde): ne co de nyid shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa yin no// dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus las gang dag bgyis na des ne tsor
213a1(mdo sde): skyes lags/ las gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes te/ mthong bar gyur lags bac+doMldas kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa'
213a2(mdo sde): rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyam su myong bar 'gyur
213a3(mdo sde): te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la smin par mi 'gyur te/ las
213a4(mdo sde): dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shi dag la rnam par smin par 'gyu ro// lus nag/ gis las rnams ni// 
213a5(mdo sde): bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin por 'gyur// dge slong dang / sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye/ 
213a6(mdo sde): dgu'i che lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul
213a7(mdo sde): bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA ra na sin rten cing bzhugaso// de nas re shigan
213a8(mdo sde): de na dge bsnyen cig 'dug pa des bslab pa lhod par byas te/ las de'i rnam par smin pas ni ni tsor skye so// nga la sems dga' bar byas pa des ni lhar skye so// des bslab pa'i bzhi lhag ma rnams
213b1(mdo sde): bsrungs pa des ni bden pa mthong bar 'gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par
213b2(mdo sde): dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pan
213b3(mdo sde): dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ce
213b4(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom lda na 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // / pho nya zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po
213b5(mdo sde): rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang 8/ ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod
213b6(mdo sde): sprin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / kla
213b7(mdo sde): dong / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na/ 
213b8(mdo sde): bza' dang / zhol zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams bsnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshe la bya ka lan da ka gnas pa/ 
214a1(mdo sde): dbyar gnas par bca so// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po la rgyal bar gyur cig/ sku tshe ring bar shog
214a2(mdo sde): shig/ ces stong nas gsol ba btab pa/ lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yun ring mo zhig tu ma mthong ngo // bdag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshil bas skom la
214a3(mdo sde): so// bdag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal lo// zhes byaso// de nas rgyal pos khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la smras pa/ khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das de da ltar gang du dbyar gnas pa/ 
214a4(mdo sde): bzhed pa khyod kyis ci thos/ mgon med zas sbyin gyis smra des pa/ lha bdag gi bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab dadu dbyar gnas par dam bzhe so zhes thos lags so// de nas
214a5(mdo sde): ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / khyim bdog mgon / da zas sbyin la sogs pa pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / blon pa rnams kyis mi zhig pho nyas bkug ste/ kye mi khyod tshur
214a6(mdo sde): shog/ bac+doMs ga la ba der song la der phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs lo mgo bos phyag 'tshal la bdag cag gi mchis nas bcom ldan 'das gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bsrung
214a7(mdo sde): pa yang ngam/ 'tsho 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang ldan nam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsol la/ 'di skad du btsun pa ko sa la'i rgyal po dang mnyan
214a8(mdo sde): yod pa na gnas pa pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams bac+doMs kyi zhal mthong bar 'tshal te/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das yun ring po zhig tu mthong bas/ bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong
214b1(mdo sde): par 'tshal bas skom lag so// bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal na/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod par gshegasu gsol zhes mchi'o// zhes gsol
214b2(mdo sde): cig ces bsgo'o// de nas mi des ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / blon po dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / yul mi rnams kyis bsgo ba bzhin du mnyan te/ rgyal po'i khab du song
214b3(mdo sde): nas/ mthar gyis song song ba las/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du phyin to// de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer thad du bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bac+doMs kyi
214b4(mdo sde): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bac+doMs la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// ko/ sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / mnyan du yod pa na gaH
214b5(mdo sde): pa'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams bac+doMs kyi zhabs la mgo sa phyag 'tshal te/ bac+doMs gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam ngapa chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho 'am/ stobs dang ldan na/ 
214b6(mdo sde): bde ba dang ldan nam mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes mchi'o// 'di skad du bdag gis bac+doMs ring mo zhig du ma mthong ste/ bdag cag ni bac+doMs mthong bar 'tshal bas
214b7(mdo sde): skom lag so// bdag cag ni bac+doMs mthong bar 'tshal na/ thugs rtse ba'i slad du/ bac+doMs mnyan du yod par gshegasu gsol zhes kyang mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye gal/ 
214b8(mdo sde): po gzugs can snying pos 'gror ster na 'gro bar bya'o// de nas pho nya des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gsol nas/ bac+doMs la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gshegs par rgyal
215a1(mdo sde): // po gzugs can snying pos dad pa stsal lags na/ bac+doMs kyis du de'i dus la bab par dgongs te/ gshegasu gsol zhes bskul to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la cang mi gsung ba
215a2(mdo sde): gan // de na bcoMtso ldan 'das dbyar zla gsum zlas nas/ chos gos mdzad de/ chos gos zin nas chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ nam ring 'khor mang po dag dang mnyan du yod pa
215a3(mdo sde): logasu chags te gshegs so// pho nya yang shing rta la zhon te chas so// de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhabs kyis gshegs pa mthong nas/ shing rta las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
215a4(mdo sde): de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di daskad ces gsol to// thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag gi/ shing rta bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi su gsol/ bcom ldan
215a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsol pa// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i shing rta dang // yang dag rtsol la ngag gnas nas// nyon mongs tsher/ bas ma snad par// sa steng kun tu rgyu bar byed// pho nyas smras
215a6(mdo sde): pa/ bac+doMs ni rdzu 'phrul gyi zhabs kyis gshegs pa lags kyis kyang bdag la phan gdags pa dang / thugs rtse ba'i slad du bcibasu gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das pho nyal phan gdags
215a7(mdo sde): pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyis shing rta'i steng du bzhug so// de na bcoM ldan 'das shing rta la bcibs bzhin du/ mnyan du yod par byod na sogs kyang rgyal po la sbran to// de nas rgyal po dang / blon po dang / pho
215a8(mdo sde): brang 'khor gyi mi dang / yul mi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das bsu nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mtshan mo rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal de nyid du 'khod de/ pho nya de ni tshe thung ste/ chos thos pa'i
215b1(mdo sde): 'og tu nyid kyi mtshan mo shiste/ de shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skye so// lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyu
215b2(mdo sde): te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes su mo// de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems
215b3(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo // de nas sngon po nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag yon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la bsgo ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni ni ma yin gyis/ bdag nan
215b4(mdo sde): malon par bcom ldan 'das la lte ba'i phyir 'gro'o// snum mo// de nas sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i grwa rna cha gdub kor/ dag cing 'gul bathogs pa/ lus dro shal dang / se mo ngas
215b5(mdo sde): brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pa/ can lus gur kum dang / ta ma la ri lo ma dang / smrig/ ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i ma
215b6(mdo sde): togra ud pa la dang / ku mu de dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man da ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang te/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das
215b7(mdo sde): la me tog gi gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bac+doMs kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / 
215b8(mdo sde): rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur pa de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mngon
216a1(mdo sde): po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khwag
216a2(mdo sde): dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag
216a3(mdo sde): pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun// 
216a4(mdo sde): rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis// dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyi kyang ma bgyis lag so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang po dang ldan pa'i ngan song la mu/ shin tu mi bzang khyod kyi mthu
216a5(mdo sde): bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la rten/ 
216a6(mdo sde): nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// sku dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa stong
216a7(mdo sde): du mthong bar dka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni dang mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal naso// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // lha yi 'dzin/ 
216a8(mdo sde): rten las ltas lha yul song // de nas sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spobs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thaMd las thar pa ban+d+ha
216b1(mdo sde): du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo // de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal khang bzangs kyi steng na 'dug pas/ snang ba ni
216b2(mdo sde): po de mthong nas nam nangs pa dang / bac+doMs la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi
216b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la lta ba'i slad du mchi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten
216b4(mdo sde): skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ khyod kyi pho nya de nga la sems dga' bar gyur nas/ shi ta sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ de mdang sum
216b5(mdo sde): nga'i thang du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song ngo // de nas rgyal po ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ kye ma sangs rgyas/ kye mchos kyi
216b6(mdo sde): ma dge 'dun/ 'di dag la ni chung ngu zhig byas nas kyang rnam par smin pa chen por 'gyur ro// zhes smras so// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bac+doMs kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bsto
216b7(mdo sde): cing rje su yi rangs te/ bac+doMs kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ stan las langs te song ngo // der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag
216b8(mdo sde): 'di gsum ni mchog tu dgas pa yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa dang / chos mchog tu gdags pa dang / dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa'o// sangs rgya
217a1(mdo sde): mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/ sems can rkang med rnams sam/ rkang gnyis rnams sam/ rkang bzhi rnams sam/ rkang mang rnams sam/ gzugs can rnams sam/ gar+b+ha
217a2(mdo sde): can ma yin pa rnams sam/ 'du shes can rnams sam/ 'du shes can ma yin pa rnams sam/ 'du shes yod pa yang ma yin 'du shes med pa yang ma yin pa gang yang rung skye
217a3(mdo sde): de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog yin par bstan to// sangs rgyas la mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag
217a4(mdo sde): mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon// par dga' ba de dag gi ni rnam par smin pa lngaH rnams kyi nang du lhur gyur pa rnams sam/ mi rnams kyi nang du mir/ 
217a5(mdo sde): gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' shig tu gyur par shes pa ra bya ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o// chos mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/ 'du byas so// 
217a6(mdo sde): 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos mchog yin par bstan to// chos la mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag ni mcho// 
217a7(mdo sde): la mngon por dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag gi rnam par smin pa yang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam/ mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi
217a8(mdo sde): mchog 'ba' shig tu 'gyur par shes par bya ste/ 'di ni chos mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o// dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/ tshogs sam/ 'dus pam/ mang po 'am/ 'khor
217b1(mdo sde): gang yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la mchog yin par bstan te/ dge 'dun la mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon
217b2(mdo sde): par dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag gi ni rnam par smin pa yang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam/ mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyis mchog
217b3(mdo sde): 'ba' shig tu gyur par shes par bya ste/ 'di ni dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bac+doMs kyi
217b4(mdo sde): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / bam po bcu bzhi po// ma he zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgya sa bac+doMs la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang
217b5(mdo sde): phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshod/ dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / ga/ nod sprin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha
217b6(mdo sde): lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
217b7(mdo sde): mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang // zhal zas dang / gzims cha
217b8(mdo sde): dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las nags khrod cig tu byon pa dang / nags khrod de na ma ha/ 
218a1(mdo sde): khru chen po dang / ma he'i rdzi lnga brgya 'khod do// de nas re shig na de'i nang na ma he stongs dang ldan zhing stobs kyi mchog dang ldan pa nig yod de/ de mi gzhan dag N+DI nor na phyi bzhin
218a2(mdo sde): rgyug par byed do// bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs so// de nas ma he'i rdzi rnams kyis bac+doMs nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa thag ring po zhig nas mthong // de nas dri de dag
218a3(mdo sde): gris skad chen por bos te/ bac+doMs 'di na ma he ma rungs pa mchis kyis/ shul 'dir mi gshegasu gsol zhe khyog bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye ngas 'dir dus la bab pa shrI kya khyed
218a4(mdo sde): snying ma chung shig/ de nas ma he des bac+doMs thag ring po zhig nas ma thong ba dang / rnga ma ljang du gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la dader brgyug so// de nas bac+doMs kyi mdun log su sing+ge ral pa can ral pa/ 
218a5(mdo sde): g.yengs pa lnga sprul dwa glo g.yas g.yos me chen po lnga sprul to// steng du ni lcags kyi pha 'ongs chen po zhig sprul to// de na sa ma ri des phyogs kun tu 'jigs pa chen po mthong nas/ 
218a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung du song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lces bldags nas/ zhum pa'i bzhin gyis bac+doMs la blta so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la des brda phrad pa'i skad
218a7(mdo sde): du bzhin bzangs 'di ltar 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'o// chos thad ni bdag med pa'o// mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes chos tshig gsum bstan nas/ tshe rabs kyang dran par mdzad de thos nas ngus so// 
218a8(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad gsul nas// khyod ni dud 'grong skyes pa la/ da ning yis ci byar yod// mi khom par ni skyes zin gyis// don meng ngus pas cil phan/ 'dir ni rgyal pa/ 
218b1(mdo sde): snying rje can// nga la dad pa'i sems bskyed la// dud 'gro'i skye gnas spangs na lags// 'on tang mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas ma he ma rungs pa des rang gi lus la smad de// kha 'chos nas dud 'gro'i ske gnas
218b2(mdo sde): su skyes pa'i srog chags rnams ni ma'i drod che bas de skye nad par shi ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por smras so// lha'i bu 'am/ lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sem
