244b5(mdo sde): bzhin du mdzad do// de nas dge slong de dag the tsom skye sa te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa pad+ma'i mig gis las
244b6(mdo sde): gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di che bar grags pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i mig nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan
244b7(mdo sde): ngag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ pad+ma'i mig nyid kyis las byas
244b8(mdo sde): shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ 
245a1(mdo sde): // nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las gadren ma rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / 
245a2(mdo sde): las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
245a3(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // rnga sgra zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
245a4(mdo sde): 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams da dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams/ dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha
245a5(mdo sde): rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur
245a6(mdo sde): bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'i lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis
245a7(mdo sde): mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnam
245a8(mdo sde): brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro de'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la/ longs
245b1(mdo sde): spyod che g.yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ 
245b2(mdo sde): do de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang bu byu
245b3(mdo sde): steng khye'u gzugs bzang zhing lhu na sdug la mdzes po/ che bar grags pa/ byA ka la bing ka m+b+hir skad snyan pa/ rnga sgra ltar gdangs snyan pa zhig bcas so// de nas de btsas pa'i
245b4(mdo sde): btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdag sa shes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na/ re khye'u 'di rnga sgra lta bu'i gdangs dang ldan pas na/ de'i
245b5(mdo sde): phyir khye'u 'di'i ming rnga sgra zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u rnga sgra pa ngan 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma ga nyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i mA ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma
245b6(mdo sde): gaunyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyi 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad bzang ngo cag gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang
245b7(mdo sde): gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de yang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod/ 
245b8(mdo sde): pa/ gtong pa la srid pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ga/ rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/ gtong pa chen po la gnas pa zhig go// de nas phyi zhog na khye'u rnga sgra shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra
246a1(mdo sde): bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes
246a2(mdo sde): par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das
246a3(mdo sde): la sems dga' ba skyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan
246a4(mdo sde): 'das kyis de'i bsamo pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams da nga / rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bde ngan pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba/ de lta bu'i chos bstan pa
246a5(mdo sde): mdzad de/ de nas khye'u rnga sgras 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri/ 'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas
246a6(mdo sde): te des bden pa mthong nas/ sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/ dge slong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas/ pha ma la gsol te// 
246a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan po la rab tu byung ngo // des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi bstan par rig nas/ 
246a8(mdo sde): 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par zad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra
246b1(mdo sde): bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag 'thil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ 
246b2(mdo sde): tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags
246b3(mdo sde): pa dang / bkur bsti la mi blta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes
246b4(mdo sde): te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rnga sgras las ci bgyis na/ des 'di gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par
246b5(mdo sde): gyur to// dgra bcom pa nyid kyang thob par gyur lags/ ba com ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ rnga sgra nyid kyi sa sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub
246b6(mdo sde): pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ rnga sgra nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa/ de dag gzhan su zhig
246b7(mdo sde): gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / 
246b8(mdo sde): rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang // khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig
247a1(mdo sde): rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// 
247a2(mdo sde): dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu cu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ 
247a3(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skas bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya
247a4(mdo sde): ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen nga ldan na/ bzhugs pa la re shig na yang dag par rdzoganges pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi
247a5(mdo sde): 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i/ me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan la// sa 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las 'das so// de
247a6(mdo sde): nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bzhi la byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad cig
247a7(mdo sde): yod la/ 'a phreng du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur bista byas nas/ mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nA
247a8(mdo sde): re shig na khyim bdag gcig gis rol mo'i cha spyad rnam pa sna tshogs dang / mi las rol mo bslabs te/ mchod rten de la phul nas/ de dag mchod rten de la nyin cig bzhin
247b1(mdo sde): du rol mo'i sgra khyad par dag gis bkur bsti byed do// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rnga sgra 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan
247b2(mdo sde): 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la rol mo'i sgra'i cha spyad rnam pa sna tshogs phul ba dwe na rnga sgra lta bu'i gdangs can du gyur la/ rgyu de nyid kyis na da ltar dgra bcom
247b3(mdo sde): pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las
247b4(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni/ rnam par smi/ na pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// / las 'dren ma rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang 'dren
247b5(mdo sde): mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rna mas spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams
247b6(mdo sde): 'ba' shig lnga gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom
247b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // bu zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams
247b8(mdo sde): dang phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lham
248a1(mdo sde): yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / 
248a2(mdo sde): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po
248a3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ na bzo' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ ser skya'i gnas shing
248a4(mdo sde): n+ya glo de'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// de'i tshe ser skya de'i gnas ni shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod g.yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos
248a5(mdo sde): bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan gcig tu rtse zhing dga' la
248a6(mdo sde): dga' dgur spyod pa las chung ma las bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon te/ bu btsas nas sha snag bu chen po zhig byung ste/ pha ma dang / khyim de na gnas pa'i gzhan
248a7(mdo sde): dag dang / g.yog 'khor dang nye du rnams kyis de mthong nas/ 'di lta bu btsas pa ci yin zhes mi dga' bar gyur to// de nas re shig na khyim bdag de mya ngan gyi khang bur zhugs
248a8(mdo sde): te/ lag pa la oM tshugs bcas nas/ sems khongasu chud cing 'dug ste/ 'di ci yin su la bsnyad par bya shes pa su yod snyamo// de nas de'i blo skyes pa sangs rgyas bac+doMs 'di/ 
248b1(mdo sde): ni thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa yin te/ des mkhyen kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyad par bya'o// snyam nas/ de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin
248b2(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyod ma 'jigs shig// ma 'jigs shig/ sha snag bu dengs bal legs par rmal ba'i
248b3(mdo sde): nang du chug la/ zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin cig kyang dus gsuMgasuMdu lag pa brams te/ 'o mas yang dang yang du gtor cig dang / de'i 'og tu rdol te/ bu brgya 'byung bar 'gyur la// 
248b4(mdo sde): de dag thams cad chen po che'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur// / de nas khyim bdag des de thos nas mchog tu ya mtsha don du gyur te/ bsams pa bdag gis bu de lta bu dang / 
248b5(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs pararnyed do snyam nas des de bzhin du byas pa dang / zhag dun len pa dang sha snag bu de rdol nas bu brgya byung ste/ 
248b6(mdo sde): thams cad kyang gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ chen po che'i stobs dang ldan pa sha stag go// de nas re shig na mthar gyis
248b7(mdo sde): bsnyad bsrings nas cher skyes pa dang / de dag thams cad byad gzugs dang / lang mtsho'i rgyags pas dregs te/ phan tshun 'khyam pa las shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra bar song ba
248b8(mdo sde): dang / de dag gi sangs rgyaso bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis lags par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od
249a1(mdo sde): 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de dag gis bcom ldan
249a2(mdo sde): 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// dga' ba bskrad nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi sman sngar 'khod do// de nas
249a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bsam pa dang / bag lo nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan
249a4(mdo sde): pa mdzad de/ de thos nas thams cad kyis 'jig tshogs/ la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rje sa bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum
249a5(mdo sde): du byas te/ de dag gis bden pa mthong nas/ pha ma lag sol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // de dag thams cad kyis brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang
249a6(mdo sde): 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor bI dang / 
249a7(mdo sde): rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par chad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod
249a8(mdo sde): chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ na mkha' dang lag 'thil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig
249b1(mdo sde): pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur bsti la mi lta ga dbang po dang / 
249b2(mdo sde): nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjod pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs
249b3(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa gzhon nu brgya po 'di dag gis las gang dag bgyis na/ des spun du gyur la chen po che'i stobs dang ldan par gyur lags// 
249b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di rnams kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pra dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za
249b5(mdo sde): bar 'ong las de dag byas shing bsngags pas na/ de dag/ gzhan su zhig gis nyamasu myong bar 'gyur te// dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi
249b6(mdo sde): rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dag pa byas
249b7(mdo sde): shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa
249b8(mdo sde): brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa
250a1(mdo sde): la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu
250a2(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang
250a3(mdo sde): gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad
250a4(mdo sde): pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'a dras pa'i dbyingasu yong su mya ngan las 'das so// de nus rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku
250a5(mdo sde): gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas na/ rin po che sna bzhi la/ sa byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag/ tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa
250a6(mdo sde): zhig brtsigs te/ der srog chagaso 'bum phrag du mes bkur bsti byas nas/ mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas re shig na 'dza' bde bo brgya phyi rol du byung ba dang / de
250a7(mdo sde): dag gis mchod rten de mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su dran te/ de dag tu lhan cig tu til mar spos can gyis byugs nas/ me tog dang / me tog phrad dang
250a8(mdo sde): mar me dbul ba dag gis bsnyen bkur byas nas/ lhan cig tu smon lam btab pa/ bdag cag gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der spun du gyur te/ lhan cig tu lto cig kho nas byung / 
250b1(mdo sde): par gyur cig/ chen po che'i stobs kyi shugs thob pa dang / byad gzugs dang ldan par gyur cig/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par
250b2(mdo sde): byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag dza snyam du sems// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ mdza' sde bor gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni chen po che
250b3(mdo sde): 'di dag yin te/ de dag gis lhan cig tu mchod rten la/ bkur bsti byas pa des na/ 'di ltar lhan cig tu skyes te/ chen po che'i stobs kyi shugs thob par gyur to// smon lam
250b4(mdo sde): btab pa des ni gcig tu 'thun par rab tu byung bar rab tu byung na/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// dge slong da dag de ltar na/ las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams
250b5(mdo sde): ni/ rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rna mas ni/ rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar
250b6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na/ las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams
250b7(mdo sde): spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
250b8(mdo sde): bka' stsal pas/ dge slong dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // bam po bcu drug pa// nyi ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs
251a1(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / drug po rnams dang / pho brang 'bor sti bi rnams dang / nod dpo
251a2(mdo sde): rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lA ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lho 'phye chen po
251a3(mdo sde): rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'bye chen po
251a4(mdo sde): rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom lda dani 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza 'a dang / nal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / 
251a5(mdo sde): spun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyed pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ yul ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i
251a6(mdo sde): tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya'i bu phyug cing nor mang la/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang
251a7(mdo sde): 'gran po zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dgar ma dga' mgur spyod pa las
251a8(mdo sde): chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang / bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa nor bu rin po che mgo bo la thogs pa zhog btsas
251b1(mdo sde): nas/ de las kho ra khor yug tu nyi ma'i 'od zer lta bu 'phro ste/ de'i snang bas mtshan mo grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad khyab par gyur pas nyin mo bzhin du snang bar byas so// / 
251b2(mdo sde): de nas pha ma dang / khyim de na gnas pa'i g.yog 'khor rnams dang / nye du rnams dang / ser skya'i gnas na 'khod pa'i shAkya rnams kyis de mthong nas ya mtshan du gyur te
251b3(mdo sde): dga' bas rgyas so// de nas de bcas pa'i bcas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdogs shes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re khye'u 'dri bcos ma thag
251b4(mdo sde): tu grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad nyi ma bzhin du gsol bas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming nyi ma// zhes gdags so zer ro// de'i khyo'u nyi ma pad na 'tsho
251b5(mdo sde): ba'i ma ma gnyis dong / nu ma srun pa'i ma ma gnyis da nga / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad pa gtang na/ dmam da kyi ma ga
251b6(mdo sde): dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snyi nga khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskrad bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de yang dad pa dang ldan
251b7(mdo sde): la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ skye dgu la byams pa/ gtong ba la sred pa/ sbyin pa la dga'
251b8(mdo sde): ga rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/ gtong pa chen po la gnas pa zhig go// de nas phyis re shig na khye'u nyi ma shing n+ya gro do'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom
252a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad nus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan gnyi sa
252a2(mdo sde): stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' bo/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang
252a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyol dang / 
252a4(mdo sde): khams dang / rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos pa dastan te/ des khye'u nyi mas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse
252a5(mdo sde): mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bde na pa mthong nas/ sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag byin
252a6(mdo sde): te/ dge slong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas/ pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // de brtson pa dang / bsgrub
252a7(mdo sde): pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil pa dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang // 
252a8(mdo sde): rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags
252b1(mdo sde): dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i
252b2(mdo sde): sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur bsti la mi lta ba dbang po dang / nye dbang
252b3(mdo sde): dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa nyi ma bsod snyoms la 'gro ba de'i tshe bram ze dang / 
252b4(mdo sde): khyim bdag ma dad pa rnams 'phyang zhing smod la/ lko dag 'phyas byed de/ 'di ltar nor bu rin po che mgo bo de la thogs nas/ lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo
252b5(mdo sde): dang / sum mdo dag tu 'khyam pa las ni/ shAkya'i bu'i/ dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig pa'o// bram ze'i tshul ni tshig pa'o zhe mdzer to// de nas de shin
252b6(mdo sde): tu ngo tsha bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'a
252b7(mdo sde): kyis ni ci nas bdag gi nor bu rin po che ma mchis par mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu 'di ni las las skyes pa yin pas na/ med par byar mi nus
252b8(mdo sde): so// de lta mod kyi ci nas dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni mthong la/ ma dad pa rnams kyis ni mi mthong bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de bzhin du mdzad do// de nas dge slong dag
253a1(mdo sde): the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa nyi mas las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di che bar grags pa dang / 
253a2(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyi ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin
253a3(mdo sde): du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas nyi ma nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su dag gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong
253a4(mdo sde): dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi da sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu/ 'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam
253a5(mdo sde): par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dag pa dang / mi da ge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched
253a6(mdo sde): rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la thob pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin
253a7(mdo sde): par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
253a8(mdo sde): rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ 
253b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re shig na
253b2(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med
253b3(mdo sde): pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal ba gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ 
253b4(mdo sde): rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ dbang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ 
253b5(mdo sde): der srog tshigs 'bum phrag du mas bkur bsti byas nas/ mtho ris dang thar par 'grobar 'gyur ro// de nas mchod rten de'i mchod
253b6(mdo sde): pa la bab pa na/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rgyal mtshan
253b7(mdo sde): dang ba dan dang / rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis mchod pa byed do// de nas re shig na mi zhig rgyal po dang / rgyan pos rtsis nas skugs su nor bu rin
253b8(mdo sde): po che me shel zhig thob bo// de nas de dad pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten gyi char khab la btags te/ zhabs la
254a1(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal nas/ smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/ bdag gis
254a2(mdo sde): kyang 'di lta bu'i yon tan dag thob par gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed pa ma gyur cig/ nor bu rin po che 'di lta bu yang spyi bo la tho/ 
254a3(mdo sde): bzhin du ma'i lto nas 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ cho lo la dor sgyu byed pa gang yin pa
254a4(mdo sde): de ni nyi ma 'di nyid yin te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rna dam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur bsti byas pa da nga // nor bu rin po che gtags pa des na/ de'i mgo bo las
254a5(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che byung la/ rgyu de nyid kyis gzugs bzang / zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur te/ dgra ba/ com pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na
254a6(mdo sde): las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges
254a7(mdo sde): par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na/ las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren
254a8(mdo sde): ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces/ 
254b1(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / gyad kyi ba dan zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
254b2(mdo sde): 'das la/ rgyal po rgyams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / 
254b3(mdo sde): klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas// 
254b4(mdo sde): ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi mchod cing / 
254b5(mdo sde): shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman thob
254b6(mdo sde): rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ yul ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mngal/ 
254b7(mdo sde): longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung
254b8(mdo sde): ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu brtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon
255a1(mdo sde): pa dang / bu grung ste khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na bsdug la mdzes pa mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa zhig bcas te/ gang gi tshe khye'u de bcas pa deng / 
255a2(mdo sde): che lha rnams kyis kho ra khor yug nas lha'i ba dan dag bsgreng ngo // lha'i rol mo'i cha byad dag kyang brdung so// lha'i me tog ud pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po rnams kyis kyang / 
255a3(mdo sde): gtor to// ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer thams cad du grags pas rgyas par gyur to// khyim thams cad du yang de'i phyir ba dan bsgreng ngo // de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u
255a4(mdo sde): 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di btsas pa na 'jig rten thams ca da grags pas rgyas pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming snyan
255a5(mdo sde): grags shes gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u snyan grags pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i
255a6(mdo sde): ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyi 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis
255a7(mdo sde): bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye grag par gyur to// de yang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ 
255a8(mdo sde): snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa zhig go/ de nas phyis re shig na khye'u snyan grags shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skra skyes
255b1(mdo sde): bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis rgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga'
255b2(mdo sde): rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi
255b3(mdo sde): zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag lo nyal dang / khams dang / rang
255b4(mdo sde): bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par gyur pa de lta bu'i chos bstan to// de nas khye'u sA na grags kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ro'i rtse mo mthon po
255b5(mdo sde): po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'a/ bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas/ sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag sbyin te/ dge sbyong dang bram
255b6(mdo sde): ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug tsang phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas/ pa ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang
255b7(mdo sde): 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam pa 'thor ba dang / 
255b8(mdo sde): rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod/ 
256a1(mdo sde): chags thams cad dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong ba 'am/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil ba la
256a2(mdo sde): gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ 
256a3(mdo sde): dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus pAsmra ba'i gnasu gyur to// de yang gsol ba btab ste/ phul ba'i gos spyod do// gsol ba btab ste/ 
256a4(mdo sde): phul ba ma yin pa ni nyung ngu spyod do// gsol ba btab ste/ phu la ba'i zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad ga sos dang / sman zong spyod de/ gsol ba btab ste/ phul ba
256a5(mdo sde): ma yin pa ni nyung ngu spyod do// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skye sa ste/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa snyan grags kyis
256a6(mdo sde): las gang dag bgyis na/ des btsas ma thag tu lha rnams kyis ba dan bsgrang nas/ 'jig rten du grags pas rgyas par gyur la/ rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur
256a7(mdo sde): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag snyan grags nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag du tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la
256a8(mdo sde): gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas/ snyan grags nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gi nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong
256b1(mdo sde): dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi
256b2(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag
256b3(mdo sde): gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa
256b4(mdo sde): gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pra/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu
256b5(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam paragazigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i
256b6(mdo sde): po brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas shing zad pa'i me
256b7(mdo sde): bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la/ sku gdung gi mchod pa
256b8(mdo sde): byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byis pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsegs te/ der srog chags 'bum
257a1(mdo sde): phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas/ mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas re shig na rgyal po gnyen yod kyis mchod rten de la dus ston byas nas/ mchod
257a2(mdo sde): rten gyi dus ston byed pa der gyad 'gyed pa rnams kyi ba dan dag bsgreng ngo // de nas re shig na rgyal po'i gyad gcig gis gyad gcig non pa dang / des gyad kyi ba dan thob nas/ des de
257a3(mdo sde): blangs te srog chags 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs len cing / bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ 
257a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan dran par byas te/ ba dan de mchod rten gyi stang gi srog shing la btags nas/ smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu
257a5(mdo sde): dag thob par gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu bdag gis ma nyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed pa ri ma gyur cig ces byaso// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems
257a6(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gyad du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni snyan grags 'di yin te/ de bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi/ mchod rten la bsnyen bkur byas pa des na/ 'khor ba'i bde ba mtha'
257a7(mdo sde): yas myong bar gyur la/ rgyu de nyid kyi da ltar yang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byaso// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu
257a8(mdo sde): nges por gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren
257b1(mdo sde): mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na/ las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig
257b2(mdo sde): la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyi de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
257b3(mdo sde): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// gang po la sogs pa rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las/ rtogs pa brjod pa sna tshogs shes bya ba ste/ sdom gyi tshogs su brjod pa bdun pa
257b4(mdo sde): rdzogs so// / sdom ni/ 'od bzang ma dang rab sdug ma// dkar mo zla ba u du pa la// mdzes ldan ma dang mu tig dang // ka tsang ga la
257b5(mdo sde): bde byed ma// mi sdug sde tshan bcad de bstan// 'ong bzang ma zhes bya ba ni// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams
257b6(mdo sde): dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma
257b7(mdo sde): yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / 
257b8(mdo sde): dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams
258a1(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
258a2(mdo sde): dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sprin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ tshong dpon phyug cing nor mngal
258a3(mdo sde): longs spyod che ba/ yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs
258a4(mdo sde): nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur/ spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa/ las chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa
258a5(mdo sde): dang / bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa lha'i rgyan gyis klubs pa/ nor bu ri na po che mgu lan thogs pa zhig btsas te/ de nas 'od byung
258a6(mdo sde): ba des mnyan du yod pa thams cad snang bar byaso// de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re bu mo
258a7(mdo sde): 'di btsas ma thag tu nor bu rin po che'i 'od kyis mnyan du yod pa thams cad snang bar byas na/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming 'od bzang mo zhes gdag so zhes zer ro// de nas bu mo 'ong
258a8(mdo sde): bzang ma pang na mtsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu srun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khra ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad de/ ma ma brgyad kyi
258b1(mdo sde): 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag
258b2(mdo sde): par gyur to// bu mo de yang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa zhig ste/ de la blo tha su dang su 'ongs kyang rung ba
258b3(mdo sde): de dang de dag la mgul nas/ rgyan bkrol te sbyin par byed do// byin nas kyang yang brgyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas gang gi tshe bu mo de mthar kyis chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po'i bu
258b4(mdo sde): rnams dang / blon po'i bu rnams dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mang po dag de slong du 'ong ngo // de nas de dag gis ga nod par gyur nas/ de'i pha lag pa la oM tshugs bcas te
258b5(mdo sde): bsam pa/ gal te gcig la byin na ni/ gzhan rnams bdag gi dgrar 'gyur ro snyam nas sems khongasu chud cing 'dug/ de nas re shig na bu mo nges pa sems
258b6(mdo sde): khongasu chud pa mthong nas smras pa/ yab ci zhig gis sems khongasu chud cing bzhugs/ des de'i don rgyas par bsnyad// de nas phyis bu mo de na re yab thugs nganam mdzad cig dang / 
258b7(mdo sde): da ste zhag bdun na bdag nyid kyis khyim thab pa dam par 'tshal lo zhes zer ro// de nas tshong dpon des rgyal po gsal rgyal la gsol pa/ mnyan du yod par dri la bsgrags te/ da
258b8(mdo sde): ste zhag bdun na bu mo 'od bzang mo rang nyid kyi khyim thab 'dam par chad kyis khyed kyi bya ba gang yin pa de gyis shig ces byaso// de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / bu mo 'od bzang
259a1(mdo sde): ma shing rta la zhon te/ chos gos tshon can gyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs ri mor bris te bstod pa 'don cing sa
259a2(mdo sde): du zhugaso// de nas der rgyal po'i bu rnams dang / blon po'i bu rnams dang / tshong dpon gyi bu rnams de la yid smon byed cing lta bo de dag la gtam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shad kyis
259a3(mdo sde): byang bar shad de/ bdag gis khyed la gang gi sgo nas kyang sku brnyas ni mi 'tshal na yong ya ba dag 'dod pa rnams la don du gnyer ba ma lags pa kho na bas so// bdag ni sa
259a4(mdo sde): rgyas la skyabasu song ste/ de'i thad du rab tu 'byung ngo zhes byas nas de dag phyir log go/ 'od bzang ma yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das
259a5(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas ba/ com ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal
259a6(mdo sde): kha dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugasu chud nos/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par gyur pa de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas bu mo 'od bzang mas 'jig chog
259a7(mdo sde): la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob su/ de nas bden pa mthong nas mngon par shes pa yang bsgragaso// de nas
259a8(mdo sde): bu mo 'od bzang ma stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar
259b1(mdo sde): ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag kyang lags par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dag
259b2(mdo sde): slong ma'i dngos po 'thob du rung na bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'di la gdul bar bya ba
259b3(mdo sde): mang po dag des 'dren par 'gyur par thugasu chud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'o stsal pa/ bu mo song la 'khor rnams kyang ltos shig/ de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma rgyal bu
259b4(mdo sde): rgyal byed kyi tshal nas byung ste/ mang po 'dus pa'i nang du song ba dang / der so so nas bsams pa 'di mthus dadabog par bya'o snyam ste/ de dag gis de bzung bar byas/ 
259b5(mdo sde): de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma de dag gis bsnyags pa dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba bzhin du na mkha 'al mngon par 'phags te/ cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs
259b6(mdo sde): bstan to// so so'i skye bo rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyis myur du dad par byed de/ de nas de dag gis lha dang / mi rnams dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang sku
259b7(mdo sde): zing zhes byas nas sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas/ gsol ba btab pa sru mar spyon mar sbron/ khyod kyis chos 'di lta bu mngon du byas pa las
259b8(mdo sde): na khyod 'dod pa spyod pa 'di ni mi srid do zhes byas so// de nas bu mo 'od bzang man mkha' las babs nas/ skye bo phol po che'i gung la 'dug ste/ gang thos pas srog
260a1(mdo sde): chags 'bum phrag du mas bden pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la gtad de/ des
260a2(mdo sde): de rab tu phyung ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so// de nas des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi rtan par rig nas
260a3(mdo sde): 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'dzag pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas
260a4(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom dpa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ na mkha'
260a5(mdo sde): dang lag 'thil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dang na spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes
260a6(mdo sde): pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing
260a7(mdo sde): rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnasasu gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa 'od
260a8(mdo sde): bzang mas las gang dag bgyis na/ des gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / mgul ba nas kyang nor bu rin po che byung la rab tu byung nas/ dgra bcom pa
260b1(mdo sde): nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'od bzang ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ 
260b2(mdo sde): dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ongs pa'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ 'od bzang ma nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis
260b3(mdo sde): nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung
260b4(mdo sde): gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge bu dang / mi dge bo byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zingan pa'i phung po dang / khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba'
260b5(mdo sde): shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag/ gi las rnams ni/ bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi/ tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ 'bras bu nyid du smin
260b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
260b7(mdo sde): rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kho lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
260b8(mdo sde): 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par ga
261a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyu 'dzin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i ma bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbying su yongasu mya ngan las/ 
261a2(mdo sde): 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu
261a3(mdo sde): dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags cig yod pa zhig brtsigaso// de nas re shig na rgyal po gnyen yod kyi btsun mo pad+mo rgas nas rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs lus
261a4(mdo sde): las bkrol te/ mchod rten de la phul lo// de nas zhab sa la phyag 'tshal te/ smon lam btab pa/ dge da ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya
261a5(mdo sde): ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba 'dis na/ bdag gis kyang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ dge slong
261a6(mdo sde): dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po gnyen yod kyi btsun mo dam par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni 'od bzang ma 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par
261a7(mdo sde): gzigs kyi mchod rten la rgyan rnams pa sna tshogs brtags pa de na/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan
261a8(mdo sde): pabapar gyur to// smon lam btab pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byaso// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa
261b1(mdo sde): yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin
261b2(mdo sde): pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig/ 
261b3(mdo sde): la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar brlab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ 
261b4(mdo sde): la mngon par bstod do// / rab sdug ma zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnam
261b5(mdo sde): dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnam/ sa dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin
261b6(mdo sde): rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis/ bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ re mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / 
261b7(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po ldan
261b8(mdo sde): pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyan du yod pa na/ 
262a1(mdo sde): rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla/ 
262a2(mdo sde): ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa na/ bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i skye bo'i
262a3(mdo sde): tshogs kyi snying du rab tu sdug ma zhog btsas so// de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nyid du rnams na re bu mo
262a4(mdo sde): 'di skye bo thams cad kyi snying du sdug pas na/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming rab sdug ma zhes gdag so zhes zer ro// de yang tshe rabs dran te/ btsas ma thag tu tshig su
262a5(mdo sde): bcad pas smras pa/ sbyin pa byin pa mang nyung ci yong / rung // zhing gi khyad par bzhi las 'phel bar 'gyur/ de'i phyir mkhas pas bsgrims te 'jig rten du/ dang
262a6(mdo sde): pas lha mi'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas sbyin// de nas de'i pha ma dang / gzhan yang khyim de na gnas pa rnams kyis tshigs brjod pa de thos nas skrag cing spangs te/ mi dga' bar
262a7(mdo sde): gyur la/ spyi bung zhes byed nas smras po/ kye ma bu mo 'di ni sha za mo zhig go/ des smras pa/ yum bdag ni sha za mo yang ma lags/ srin mo yang ma lags kyis/ bdag ni bu
262a8(mdo sde): mo lags te/ sbyin padag sbyin par 'tshal lo// de nas de'i mas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la bu mo 'di skad mchi'o zhes bsnyad do// de nas khyim bdag de dga' zhing
262b1(mdo sde): mgu la rab tu dga' nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim gyi nang du bshos gsol te/ de'i phyir sbyin rabs 'don du bcug go/ de nas gang gi che bu mo
262b2(mdo sde): mthar gyis lo bdun lon pa de'i tshe/ pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas de dge slong ma thams cad la sdug pa dang / phangs pa dang / snying du
262b3(mdo sde): sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong bar gyur to// re shig na/ de'i tshe mu ge'i bar gyi bskal pa dang 'dra ba'i mu ge chen po byung nas des srog chags 'bum phrag du ma bza' ba dang / btung ba med
262b4(mdo sde): pas shi'o// de nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang da ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song la rab sdug ma lang na re 'khor bzhi po rnams la
262b5(mdo sde): khyod kyis zla ba gsum gyi bar du gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad gsos dang / sman zong rnams phul cig ces gyis shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan
262b6(mdo sde): pa kun dga' bo rab sdug ma'i thad du 'ongs nas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas khyod kyis 'khor bzhi po rnams la zla ba gsum gyi bar du gos dang / zas dang / mal cha
262b7(mdo sde): dang / stan dang / nad gsos dang / sman zong rnams phul cig ces bka' stsal to// de nas rab sdug mas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' spyi bos mnos nas bka'
262b8(mdo sde): bzhin 'tshal zhes smras so// de nas rab sdug ma spyod yul gyi grong blta ba'i phyir mnyan du yod par chas so// de nos re shig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gtam de
263a1(mdo sde): thos nas shin tu rings par rab sdug ma'i mdun du song ste/ smras pa/ rab sdug ma gar 'gro/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zla ba gsum gyi
263a2(mdo sde): bar du zhal ta ba'i las byed par bskos so// mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ khyod kyi de dag thams cad bdag gis sbyar gyis khyod kyis bya mi dgos so// rab sdug mas smras pa/ gal
263a3(mdo sde): te yab bden pa mthong ba lags la/ sa'i 'og thob thag tu sbas pa'i gter rnams kyang mngon du gzigs na sbyar ba 'di ngo mtshar che ba ci mchis/ 'on kyang bdag ni skye bo dbul po la phan
263a4(mdo sde): gdags pa'i slad du zhal ta bgyid do// de bzhin du dge ba snyen lnga brgya dang / btsun mo 'phreng rgyud ma dang / rgyal rigs kyi bu mo dbyar tshul ma dang / btsun mo 'khor gyi bla
263a5(mdo sde): drang srong sbyin dang / gna' mi dang ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal rnams kyis kyang skabs phye ste/ khyod kyis bya mi dgos so zhes byas so// de nas nag
263a6(mdo sde): khung du song nas der ma yin pa'i chu lugs can dag gis kyang skabs phye'o// de ltar skabs phye nas kyang / de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ zla ba gsum gyi bar du na
263a7(mdo sde): bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas so// des zla ba gsum po de nyid kyi skabasu brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang
263a8(mdo sde): 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i
263b1(mdo sde): chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ 
263b2(mdo sde): gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag 'thil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang / tsan dan spangs pa lta bur gsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa
263b3(mdo sde): dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis
263b4(mdo sde): mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnasu gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das zla ba gsum 'das pa dang // chos gos mdzad de/ chos gos zin nas chos gos
263b5(mdo sde): gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu mnyan du yod pa nas// rgyal po'i khab du chas te gshegaso// de nas rab sdug
263b6(mdo sde): mas bcom ldan 'das dang lam du phrad nas/ 'o brgyal mi 'tshal zhes gsol to// de nas re shig na nags khung chu dang ldan pa zhig tu phyin nas dro la bab na rgyags kyang med nas/ 
263b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bzhugs par gsol to// de nas lhung bzed lag pa g.yon pa la bzhag ste/ tshig tu smras pa/ gal te bsod nams
263b8(mdo sde): dag gi rnam par smin pa yod ce na/ bdag gi lhung bzed bza' ba dang / bca' ba la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang bar gyur cig ces byas so// de nas lhas lha'i/ 
264a1(mdo sde): bdud rtsis bkang ngo // de nas rab sdug gis gral rims bzhin dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyi lhung bzed rnams zhal zas kyis bkang nas/ der bcom ldan
264a2(mdo sde): 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong ma bsod nams byas pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste/ dge slong ma rab sdug ma yin no// de/ 
264a3(mdo sde): nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rab sdug mas las gang dag bgyis na des phyug po'i
264a4(mdo sde): rigasu skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la ma 'dzes pa dang / skye bo thams cad kyi bkur la rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lag/ 
264a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ra sdug ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu rma/ gas brnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal
264a6(mdo sde): bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'od pa'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ rab sdug ma nyid kyi las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyam su myong bar
264a7(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la
264a8(mdo sde): rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge pa byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par
264b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// lus can dag gis las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i
264b2(mdo sde): dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes
264b3(mdo sde): bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med po/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srang zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA ra na si na/ drang srong sla ba ri
264b4(mdo sde): dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhug so// de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od bsrung snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ dge slong gi
264b5(mdo sde): tshogs kyis zhabs ring byas te/ mdun du bdar nas bA ra/ na sari bsod snyoms la gshegs pa dang / re/ shig na tshong dpon zhig g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/ 
264b6(mdo sde): bskyed mos tshal du song nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba med pa dag khyer ro// de nas re shig na de'i mngag bzhug ma bu mo zhig 'bras can gyi gzeb khyer te/ rje'o'i phyi bzhin du
264b7(mdo sde): 'gro ba las bu mo mngag bzhug ma des/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa lam khar mthong nas/ de dga' bar gyur te blo skyes pa bdag la rje bos lan
264b8(mdo sde): gnyi su bran mor byar ci yod kyis/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas des gsad pa dang / btsang po dang / brdeg pa dang / bsngos
265a1(mdo sde): nas 'bras can gyi gzeb phye ste/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zhal zas sna tshogs kyis tshim par byas so// de nas tshong dpon gyi thad du so
265a2(mdo sde): ba dang / re shig na tshong dpon gyi bu mo 'bras chan gyi bze ba de ga re zhes dris so// des smras pa/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la zhal zas
265a3(mdo sde): phul lo zhes byas pa dang / tshong dpon gyis de thos nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to// de nas de dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas smras pa/ bu mo khyod deng phyin chad bran mo las phyung
265a4(mdo sde): gis song shog/ khyod kyis bdags gnyid kyis logadapa na mel tshe byas pa yin no zhes smraso// de nas des tha la mo sbyar to// khyim bdag la gsol pa/ bdag bcom ldan
265a5(mdo sde): 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar ci gnang zhesabyas so// de nas khyim bdag des lhung bzed dang tshe/ sa gos kyang byin nas/ de rje bos byin pa'i lhung bzed dang
265a6(mdo sde): chos gos khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snyan pa la rab tu byung na/ des bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi gsung rab la lo dag slong du zhal ta pa'i las byas te/ 'bras can dang / skyo
265a7(mdo sde): ma dang / thug pa btung ba dang / rtag res 'khor dang / mgron du bod pa dang / mar me'i phreng ba dang / chos gos sra brkyang rnams dang / sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa rnams
265a8(mdo sde): kyang phul te/ smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis dka' bas bsgrubs te/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa dag phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems
265b1(mdo sde): bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba 'dis na bdag bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gsungs rab la rab tu 'byung ba thob par gyur cig ces byaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
265b2(mdo sde): stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bu mo mngag bzhug mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rab sdug ma 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la zhal zas phul ba des na phyug
265b3(mdo sde): po'i rig su skyes te gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / skye bo thams cad kyis bkur bar gyur to// smon lam btab pa de ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byaso// dge slong dag de
265b4(mdo sde): ltar las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni/ rnam parasngon po yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni// rnam par smin pa yang
265b5(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren man mas ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / 
265b6(mdo sde): las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
265b7(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / dkar mo zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ 
265b8(mdo sde): rgyal po rnams dang / blon pa chen pa rnams dang / drug po rnams dang / ba drang yi bar gyi mi rnams dang / cheng dpan rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / rna rnams dang / klurnams dang / gnong/ 
266a1(mdo sde): sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod/ 
266a2(mdo sde): pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod
266a3(mdo sde): nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams bsnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ ser skya'i gnas na
266a4(mdo sde): shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// de'i shAkya rnams kyi nad na/ shAkya snar ma zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang la longs sgro/ dad che ba/ yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam
266a5(mdo sde): thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyis bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la/ 
266a6(mdo sde): dga' dgur spyad do// de de dang rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod kyang / bu yang med/ bu mo yang med de/ lag pa o ma tsugs bcas nas bsams pa/ bdag gi khyim bdag nor du ma
266a7(mdo sde): dang ldan du zin kyang / bdag la bu yang med/ bu mo yang med pas bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu ni bu med pa'i phyir ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyur ro snyam ste/ sems khongasu/ 
266a8(mdo sde): chud cing 'dugo// de nas dge sbyong dang bram ze dang / ltas mkhan dang / mdza bo dang / gnyen dang / rtsa lag gzhan dag gis lha la gsol ba thob shig ces de la sgo'o// de nas de bud med de/ 
266b1(mdo sde): bu 'dod pas gu lang dang / lha dang / ku ba ra dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa dang / lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs te/ 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang / 
266b2(mdo sde): nags tshal gyi lha dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang / sum mdo'i lha dang / gtor ma len pa'i lha dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i lha dang / chos 'thun pa dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la
266b3(mdo sde): yang gsol ba 'dab so// 'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam yod mod kyi/ de yang de lta ni ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu
266b4(mdo sde): dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zan na/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin nga du re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigaso// ya ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar
266b5(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrang ba dang / mdus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa ste/ gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las
266b6(mdo sde): bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyuraro// de nas de yang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug la/ sems can zhig kyang sems can gyi ris shig na shi 'phos te/ de'i chung ma'i ltor zhugs nas/ des
266b7(mdo sde): khyim thab lo sbran to// de nas khyim thab kyis smras pa/ bzang mo gal te bu khye'u zhig btsas na ni legs/ de ma yin te bu mo zhig btsas na ni/ de nyid dang bcas te khyod khyim nas bskrad
266b8(mdo sde): de gtang ngo // de nas re shig na de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ma'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa/ 
267a1(mdo sde): gos dkar mo gyon pa mngal gyi dri mas ma gos pa zhig bcaso// de nas re shig na shAkya sbyar mas khyod kyi chung ma la bu byung ste/ bu mo zhig bcaso// zhes thos pa dang
267a2(mdo sde): de khros te nang du song ngo // de nas de'i chung mas lha'i gos gyon pa'i bu mo phul lo// de nas shAkya snar mas bu mi mthong nas/ mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur nas/ de btsas pa'i bcas ston
267a3(mdo sde): byas nas/ bu mo'i ming ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re 'di gos dkar mo gyon bzhin du btsas pas na/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming dkar mor gdag
267a4(mdo sde): sau zhes zer ro// de nas bu mo dkar mo pang na 'tshe ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma brgyad te/ ma
267a5(mdo sde): ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyi 'o ma dang / zho dang mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo gcog gis bskyed
267a6(mdo sde): bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// bu mo dkar mo ji tsam du skye ba de tsam du gro de tsam du gos de dag kyang skye ste/ dri ma can du yang mi 'gyur la/ 
267a7(mdo sde): de'i lus la yang dri mas gos par mi 'gyur ro// de nas gang gi tshe bu mo dkar mo mthar gyos chen por gyur pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po'i bu rnams dang / blon po rnams dang / tshong dpon
267a8(mdo sde): gyi bu mang po de dag de slong du 'ong ngo // de nas de dag gis gnod par gyur nas/ de'i pha lag pa la oM tshugs bcas te bsams pa/ gal te gcig la byin na ni gzhan rnams
267b1(mdo sde): bdag gi dgrar 'gyuraro snyams nas sems khong su chud cing 'dug go/ de nas re shig na bu mo des pa sems khongasu chud cing 'dug pa mthong nas smras pa/ yab ci zhig gis sems khong
267b2(mdo sde): su chud tsang bzhugs/ de nas de'i don rgyas par brnyed do// de nas bu mo na re yab thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/ bdag ni 'dod pa la don du gnyer ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
267b3(mdo sde): kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung gis/ yab kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol// de nas re shig na nges pha ma gnyis la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung
267b4(mdo sde): ste/ gos gang dag gyon te btsas pa de dag nyid chos gos lnga tshang bar gyur to// de nas des brtson pa dang / sbyor ba dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'jo
267b5(mdo sde): lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rlopar 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'dzag pa'i chos can yin
267b6(mdo sde): par chad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gsar
267b7(mdo sde): dang bong bar mnyam pa/ na mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i skabs bcom pa/ rig pa dang
267b8(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bskur sti la mi blta ba/ dbang po dang / nyi dbang bcas pa'i lha rnams
268a1(mdo sde): kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnasu gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
268a2(mdo sde): zhus pa/ btsun pa dkar mos las gang dag bgyis na de phyug po'i rigasu skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / gos dkar mo gyon pa dang / rab tu byung nas dgra brtsa/ 
268a3(mdo sde): ba nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dkar mo nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa'
268a4(mdo sde): rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi zar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ dkar mo nyid kyis las byas shig bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams
268a5(mdo sde): su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / 
268a6(mdo sde): rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam
268a7(mdo sde): par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ 'bras bu nyid du srin por 'gyur/ dge slong dag sngon byung / 
268a8(mdo sde): ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/ skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten
268b1(mdo sde): mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA ra na si
268b2(mdo sde): na/ drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhug so// de nas re shig na tshong dpon gyi chung ma dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang zhing 'dug pa don zhig la drang srong smra
268b3(mdo sde): bar song ngo // de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'ong
268b4(mdo sde): 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mo dnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang dab mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zha
268b5(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'odasrang gis de la chos bstan nas des dad pa rnyed de/ bcom
268b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim gyi nang du bshos gsol nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun la chos gos sra brkyang phul lo// de nas mthar gyis pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan
268b7(mdo sde): 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshong dpon gyi chung mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong ma dkar mo 'di yin te/ des dge slong
268b8(mdo sde): gi dge 'dun la chos gos sra brkyang phul ba des na/ gos dkar mo gyon bzhin du btsas so// tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs pa des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byaso// 
269a1(mdo sde): / dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyuraro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba
269a2(mdo sde): rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyuraro// las 'dres ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dres mar 'gyuraro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par
269a3(mdo sde): gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslabs par bya'o// btso
269a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung sa pa la mngon par bstod do// / 
269a5(mdo sde): zla ba zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshang
269a6(mdo sde): dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye
269a7(mdo sde): chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / 
269a8(mdo sde): 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun
269b1(mdo sde): gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang btsas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas byin gyi kun dga' ra
269b2(mdo sde): ba na bzhug so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ bram ze phyug cing nor mngal longs spyod tsho ba/ yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi
269b3(mdo sde): bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnaso// de yang rigs byed gsum gyi mthar phyin te/ ming gi rnam grangs dang / shes gsal dang bcas pa dang / yi ge'i rab tu dbye ba dang / lnga pa ste/ 
269b4(mdo sde): gtam rgyud dang bcas pa rnams tshig re re nas brda' spro du nus pa zhig go// de nas bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya/ bram ze'i sngags 'don pa'i slob dpon byed do// de nas des bu
269b5(mdo sde): dgos pa'i phyir rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan gcig tu rtse zhing dga'i mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la
269b6(mdo sde): bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang / bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa lta na sdug pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so// de nas
269b7(mdo sde): de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed do// nye du rnams na re bdag cag gi bu tsha phal cher zla ba zhes 'dogs pas na/ de'i
269b8(mdo sde): phyir bu mo 'di'i ming zla ba zhes gdag so zhes zer ro// de nas bu mo zla ba pang na 'tshe ba'i ma mo gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i
270a1(mdo sde): ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de mam brgyad kyi 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad
270a2(mdo sde): bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de nas bu mo zla ba mthar gyis chen mor gyur pa dang / de mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa
270a3(mdo sde): dang / bya ba la gsal ba dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / thos pa 'dzin par gyur to// de nas re shig na ngari ba bram ze'i khye'u rnams slob pa na de thos pa tsam gyis lob so// thos nas kyang
270a4(mdo sde): bstan chos de dag lta 'og dang sbyor zhing 'chang nus so// de nas de'i grags pas mnyan du yod pa thams cad rgyas par gyur te// mu stegs can dag kyang nyid gcig bzhin du de la
270a5(mdo sde): lta ba'i phyir 'ongs te/ de dang lhan cig tu gtan la 'bebs par byed do// de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog
270a6(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ mnyan du yod par gshegs nas mkhas pa rnams dang sakhas par bgrang ba de dag las phal cher bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir der dong bar byed do// de nas
270a7(mdo sde): de dag mi snang nas nang mi rnams la smras pa/ kye ci'i phyir de bstan chos shes pa dag mi 'ong ba 'di la rgyun ci zhig yod/ de dag gis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa
270a8(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa 'dir gshegs te/ de dag thams cad de la gzhol bar gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma byung ba thos nas/ de spu thams cad zing zhes byas so// 
270b1(mdo sde): de nas bu mo zla bas sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i sgra thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo // de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis lag/ 
270b2(mdo sde): par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mngar ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun
270b3(mdo sde): nas bzang ba mthong po nas/ mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan
270b4(mdo sde): 'das kyis bu mo zla ba'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba drang / khams dang rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs por 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ 
270b5(mdo sde): de thos nas bu mo zla bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des
270b6(mdo sde): bden pa mthong nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo'i thad du rab tu byung ngo // de nas des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid
270b7(mdo sde): g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa
270b8(mdo sde): thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ na mkha' dang / 
271a1(mdo sde): lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa dang / rig pa dang / mngon par shes
271a2(mdo sde): pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus
271a3(mdo sde): par smra ba'i gan su gyur to// de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la dge slong dag khyed cag gis zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo bshad pa gdon par gyis shig
271a4(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal pa dang / de'i tshe skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis so sor thar pa'i mdo lung dbog tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas so/ 
271a5(mdo sde): sor thar pa'i mdo lung dbog tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'a/ des kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang gra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni
